Title: Flurius
description: This is what happens when you do not brush your teeth.

Title: Lazy Girl
description: Action-platformer with puzzles for the most hardcore gamers! Help the young wizard to save her loved one. Use your reaction, intelligence, and some gravity-changing magic to complete ten dungeons and fight the evil technomage.

Title: Craftica
description: Craftica is an elegant block-based sandbox game with ultra high degrees of freedom for creative building. Here you can build smooth and beautiful architectures, or construct advanced devices and machineries such as computers, vehicles and robots. Try it out and start exploring your imaginations!

Title: Tactical Combat Department
description: Tactical Combat Department is a tactical turn-based strategy game inspired by Swat games. You command a special intervention squad that intervenes in various situations and environments.

Title: Kingdom Heroes 8
description: The " Kingdom Heroes" series is a classic horizontal battle single-player game developed by Userjoy, which has been released seven generations since 1998. The latest sequel, " Kingdom Heroes 8", will feature a new look and exciting battles, interpreting the magnificent era of the Three Kingdoms.

Title: ICEY
description: ICEY is a 2D side-scrolling action game and a META game in disguise. As you follow the narrator's omnipresent voice, you will see through ICEY's eyes and learn the truth about her world. The narrator will constantly urge you in one direction, but you must ask, "Why? Why am I following his directions?â Obey? Rebel?

Title: Underground Keeper
description: Underground Keeper is a logical 3D puzzle game from a first person view, inspired by Minesweeper. You will enjoy hours of excellent entertainment in a 60 levels and 4 different environments. Level generator included!

Title: Tribe: Primitive Builder
description: Chill out as you explore the beautiful, realistic island of exiles. Gather resources, craft tools, construct buildings and settlements. Manage tribe and automate your gameplay. Discover 4 lands, a storyline and save the inhabitants of the island.

Title: House of Lizards
description: Unique Ancient Knight Simulator with Horror Elements. Get Intelligence for Knight Brothers, return to the base Ancient Manuscripts, drink Baikal Water and Destroy the base of Lizards!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Diceheart
description: Diceheart is a roguelite dungeon-crawler with turn-based tactical dice battles. Delve deep into the Quantum Realm, gather powerful reality-bending items, upgrade your dice, and conquer luck itself!

Title: Mobile Empire
description: This may be the world's first stand-alone simulation game that can âdevelop a mobile phone"! There are more than 60 models for you to develop! Develop your own mobile phone now!Support sharing with IOS version of the game archive!

Title: Robot Soccer Challenge
description: Robot Soccer Challenge is a football game in which robots on remote control stand against each other. Show your abilities and skills in robot control and bring your team to victory. Dynamical and fast game, in which there is no lack of exciting and amusing moments.

Title: Explomania
description: Explomania is a physically based game with untraditional gaming mechanics. You place property modifiers within the level to determine property, strength and direction of the action.

Title: The Life of One Dog
description: A heartwarming story about the dog life. You will watch, life of our four-legged friend from it`s birth till death. Experience love and hate, joy and disappointment, loyalty and betrayal.

Title: Ark of Artemis
description: Half a year passed since the world was destroyed by the angels ââ Claudia decided to set off for the Demon Continent, but she was attacked by angels on her way. After gaining the power of the divine weapon, she was able to repel the angels.

Title: The Emperor Penguin Keita
description: Keita, a brave emperor penguin, lost its way during the migration and would start an extraordinary adventure on the ice alone.

Title: Hero of the Demon
description: The protagonist is a new adventurer, but he has the ability to destroy Warcraft alone. One day, because of the invitation of a mysterious voice, he embarked on the journey of crusading against the Demon King. On the journey, he meets demonic girls of different races one after another.

Title: SuperTotalCarnage!
description: Slay never-ending legions of monsters while running in circles! SuperTotalCarnage! is a gory and dark horror casual game with rogue-lite elements. Choose from a variety of weapons and perks and make every playthrough a different experience. Unlock many characters each one with different abilities.

Title: The Monstrous Horror Show
description: Four girls find their way into an abandoned hospital, each for her own reasons. Will they manage to unravel the dark secrets hiding within, escape safely, and return to their normal, peaceful lives?

Title: Grassland defender Keita
description: It's a mix of shooting and running, shooting enemies with bows and arrows, saving animals with parachutes, and dodging cacti and crocodiles by jumping.

Title: PRIPRI
description: "PRIPRI" is an ADV game where you explore maps, interact with characters, and uncover an escape plan as a prison staff member. Choose to befriend female prisoners and aid in the escape or ignore it, all while enjoying a relaxed gameplay experience without quest markers or time limits.

Title: Exit Limbo: Opening
description: Exit Limbo : Opening is the first chapter of a neo-retro side-scrolling beat âem up with adventure elements, elaborated fighting mechanics, memorable enemies and a truly unique setting and visual art style

Title: From Frontier
description: By an accidentï¼the protagonist set out on a journey to the "Lemuria Continent" with the second princess of the demon country who was running away from home.Awaiting in the pioneer land is encounters with dangerous monsters, unexplored land, and fascinating beauties.

Title: LAST EMBRYO -EITHER OF BRAVE TO STORY-
description: The young girl "Sill", who longed to become an adventurer, came to the Developing City Aletia. However, shadows came quietly... No one had expected what kind of crisis Sill would encounter. But every footprint left by her will soon become mythology...

Title: Do Not Feed the Monkeys
description: A digital voyeur simulator where you watch strangers through surveillance cameras. Invade their privacy and witness their most intimate moments, but donât interact with the subjects â anything could happen if you dare feed the monkeys!

Title: Stayin' Alive
description: Do your best to die or save your enemies from death in this frantic team multiplayer game about health issues. Death is in the air.

Title: Space Robinson: Hardcore Roguelike Action
description: You think you are a die-hard? Here you will die quick! A proper hardcore RPG-action where you will die a million times across a myriad of procedurally-generated levels. Extremely difficult, but highly addictive Indie Gem in your Steam game collection!

Title: Tyler
description: Tyler is a puzzle/arcade videogame. Solve all the puzzles by drawing the right combination of flows and destroying all the obstacles on the Grid! You can also play in 1vs1 or team coop 2vs2 multiplayer mode.

Title: Cryptid
description: Cryptid is a single-player horror fps game that chronicles an experienced hunter and a creature's encounter from the perspective of the Body Cam.

Title: Pricia Defense
description: One day, the North Fortress of the kingdom Eneluffe is invaded by northern sorcerers. The princess of the kingdom Eneluffe, "Pricia", with "trap magic" in her hands, which is only available to the royal family of Eneluffe, stands up.

Title: Distrust: Polar Survival
description: DISTRUST is an isometric survival adventure with procedural generation on an Arctic research station lost in the endless dark of a polar night. A story-rich fiction with multiple endings that suits both singleplayer fans and co-op enthusiasts.

Title: FALL IN LABYRINTH
description: Accidentally, you obtained a legendary sword and traveled to the "Labyrinth City of Veria-pool". What awaits you, is not only the wonderful dungeon "Labyrinthos", which can obtain unlimited treasure, but also the encounters with beautiful and mysterious heroines.

Title: Sheep in Dreams
description: One day, mysterious sheep began to appear in Hitsuji-chan's house! And strange things happen around everyone in the city... When you dream, you can enter the dream dungeon. Let's capture the dream dungeon and solve the mysterious phenomenon!

Title: Dragon Princess is Hungry
description: Eva, the half-dragon, half-human princess. Pfel, the steward, who serves Eva. They visit a mysterious isolated island infested with monster girls, and Pfel collects food for Eva on the island. However, there is a secret hidden on the island.

Title: Gates Of Nowhere
description: Gates Of Nowhere is a Fantasy/Horror adventure for Vive & Oculus.You play as Lother, a Seeker, who is looking for the lost knowledge of the Alchemists. You'll be projected in a huge fantasy dungeon filled with dangerous creatures. You must find the way out revealing at the end the mystery behind your journey.

Title: Detective Super Star
description: Join the famous Detective Doyle to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game.

Title: Blazing Aries
description: The game tells the story of a new adventurer named Aries. She visits all kinds of cities, travels around the unknown world, fights against the "Calamities" that spread all over the world. This game's core is the orthodox action fighting mode!

Title: Relax Simulator
description: Just stop and relax. Forget about all the fuss and feel the magic of music in this game. Four different modes.

Title: Chasing rabbits in snow
description: Aliens will release rabbits with plague in the North Pole in order to conquer the earth. As the guardian of the North Pole, you need to catch the rabbits in the shortest time to protect the North Pole.

Title: Dimensions: Dreadnought Architect
description: Unleash your creativity, design your dreadnought with a variety of modules, and have complete control over the function and style of each module. Command your battleship with wisdom and decisiveness. Gallop in the vast galaxy and destroy all enemies.

Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as an Orc
description: Okubo Tatsuya is a 35-year-old convenience store clerk. He is an introvert, has no friends. One day, he received a text message signed "The Goddess": "Do you want to be a hero in another world?" Accidentally, he reincarnated in another world and became an orcâ

Title: Shikokushi ~food and sightseeing and beauties~
description: In order to avoid the financial failure of Kagawa Prefecture, and aim for traveling around and all-you-can-eat-gourmet, Jiro Urashima, the governor of Kagawa Prefecture, and Deputy Governor, Onohime Megi, will push forward to unify Shikoku!

Title: Nightmare Hunter
description: One day in the dream, some one showed up and claimed there is a dream called paradise. From that day, dream demons that can suck human memory and spirit increased. In order to make everything return to its original state, Yoru, who awakened as a demon hunter, decided to challenge the initiator.

Title: Ayase, the Sexy Archer
description: Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court with the task of traveling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase confronts a nest of monster in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. Follow Ayase and see how far you can go.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: erozld
description: Mio is an adventurer who dived into a dungeon, dreaming of getting rich. She falls into a pit and, battered and bruised, obtains a holy sword called Aphrodite. However, the holy sword is a magical sword with special powers.

Title: How a Retired Strategist Saved the Country
description: How a Retired Strategist Saved the Country is a real time strategy simulation game where you manage resources to develop your country. The player is asked by elves, beastmen... Etc. various heroines ask you for help, and then you take command of their country's army.

Title: Slave Princess Finne, why did she sell out her own kingdom?
description: War of Paragons. A war for world dominion waged by "paragons", the representatives of their races. Once, it was the human paragon who won the war, damning elvenkind to the fate of slavery. A thousand years has passed. Another War of Paragons is about to begin.

Title: Madorica Real Estate
description: Unique escape room game that uses pen & paper. Search for hints, jot down notes on the maps, and seek out magic to exorcise all the ghosts to escape!

Title: Witch It
description: Witch It is a multiplayer hide & seek game set in a vibrant, magical world. Brave hunters seek hidden witches that curse their villages!

Title: UndercoverAgent
description: Undercover agent Saki has been given a new mission. She has to locate the headquarters of a criminal organization, steal their secret data, and destroy their facilities.

Title: Merry XMerge
description: Merry XMerge is a good board game for all ages this Christmas. Put together Christmas cakes and candies to make them more attractive. Merry Christmas.

Title: Oyabu Clinic Deathcare Corporation
description: Alchemy with patients' lives and health insurance! A quack doctor simulation game. DON'T imitate any of this!

Title: Bloodecay
description: A deadly plague known as erosion broke out in the land of Elworth. It corrupted all life, bringing pain and destruction â Idonia, as the knight accepting the bloodthirsty imprint set out on a path to redemption, exterminating plague minions and destroying ancient evils

Title: Madorica Real Estate 2 - The mystery of the new property -
description: The note-taking, floor-plan based real estate mystery game is back and bigger than ever, with even more puzzles to solve!In this game, visit properties and solve puzzles by noting down information and clues on a printed floor plan.

Title: Nursery Slime
description: He was an adventurer who standing at a dead-end. Because he had to return to his old business as his livelihood, he met a strange slime in a quest. The slime, which is brought his home, not only suddenly became a beautiful girl, but even fell in love with him at her first sight.

Title: Archmage Ricka
description: In order to retrieve the illegal property embezzled by the evil Lord, Ricka received a mission to capture the Lord. But it was a trap. She fell into a dungeon arranged by the Lord in advance. Although the demons in the dungeon are weak, the existence of various traps makes it difficult to escape!

Title: Hot Spring Hero
description: It's a hot spring hotel in the mountains. Goofy hostess, greedy dog ear cook, and cat ear fisher, even the goddess of hot spring were involved, to revive this hot spring hotel! The adventure life with lovely heroines day and night, is waiting for your coming!

Title: MudRunner
description: MudRunner is the ultimate off-road experience putting the players in the driver seat and dares them to take charge of incredible all-terrain vehicles, venturing across extreme Siberian landscapes with only a map and compass as guides!

Title: RectRacer
description: Racing on rectangular platforms! In the world of RectRacer, you can design your own levels and compete with your friends in a fun and exciting race on rectangular platforms with four game modes: Solo, Simple Play, Online and Party.

Title: The eagle keita
description: An eagle is about to lay an egg. She has lost her mate and has to face the rest of her life alone: constantly getting food and bringing it back to the nest.

Title: Home and Dungeon
description: Embark on an adventure in a fantasy world where you can collect items, build towns, and live the slow life of your dreams - these are the main features of this RPG game! Beyond the standard RPG gameplay, there are various other elements to enjoy.

Title: 3D Hentai Puzzle
description: 2 games in one - classic puzzle, where you need to put all the fragments of image in the right places and the game "40 numbers", in which you need to guess a random number between 0 and 40. And as a reward you will receive nude images.

Title: Poseidon - Project Dark Sky
description: Poseidon is a naval war simulation video game and is a precursor to the massive concept of Aegis 2 which is in production. The game concept for Poseidon is "Navies of the world unite against terrorists who are hell-bent to destroy an oil rig with a classified cargo".

Title: The Legend of Yan Loong 1+2
description: A nostalgic collections of the chapter 1 and 2 of âYan Loong Legendâ series. Pick up your sword again, transform into Yan Loong, Zhi Loong or Shui Yan with your friends to have a battle of light and darkness with the final boss Bai Loong and regain the occupied Green Hill Lake.

Title: BegieAde ~a lyric of lie and retribution~
description: Tereza, the captain of kingdom knight, was defeated by the bandit boss Duardo who has got evil power after Tereza's team captured him. The succubus girl, Lyric, who gave the evil power to Duardo, said she needs Tereza's help to defeat Duardo.

Title: MECHANICA: A Ballad of the Rabbit and Mercury
description: 5029 AD, "Guillotine", the Japanese territory on Mercury, a city full of neon signs and drunks. You will explore the beautiful cyberpunk-style 2D world, play music to the residents of Mercury to gather intelligence, and finally achieve the goal of saving the world.

Title: The fairy tale you don't know
description: ãLittle Red Riding Hoodãï¼ãSnow Whiteãï¼ãAlice in Wonderlandãï¼ãThumbelinaãâ¦â¦ï¼ Let's travel to these well-known fairy tales' world, and play hide and seek with the heroines! In this game, you can rewrite the ending of these well-known fairy tales.

Title: I'm a sardine Keita
description: The game tells the story of friends of sardine Keita who were captured by other animals on the way of migration, and Keita rescued his friends.

Title: Beholder 3
description: When a high-ranking security officer saves you from prison, you end up a pawn in her schemes. Now you must eliminate anyone standing in the way of her secret plans and try to get your life back while working two jobs. No tenant, employee or superior is safe from your spying.

Title: I am not a Monster: First Contact
description: Retro sci-fi tactical turn-based strategy with an exciting storyline. The Albatross space liner is overrun by lizard-like monsters that can infect humans and turn them into their own kind. Save the passengers and defeat the hostile creatures.

Title: Phantom Alchemy ~Silvia's Dynamic Urban Planning~
description: In order to make up for the corruption committed by her father, Silvia had to help the development of the border city as an alchemist. But if she wants to use alchemy, she must convert the spiritual power of residents into energy.

Title: The Winning Secret of the Newbie Strategist Princess
description: A neighboring country has declared war! The first war in a long time. Due to a shortage of personnel, Estelle, the princess, has taken command of the army. She can't afford to lose this war, but... What will she do, Estelle!?

Title: Atomic Heart
description: In a mad and sublime utopian world, take part in explosive encounters. Adapt your fighting style to each opponent, use your environment and upgrade your equipment to fulfill your mission. If you want to reach the truth, you'll have to pay in blood.

Title: Beholder 2
description: You are an intern at the central ministry of a totalitarian state with your whole career ahead of you. Work your way up the ladder by scheming against employees, spying on your boss, and completing paperwork. Or do you turn against the state and expose corruption. The choice is still yours to make!

Title: Love Is All Around
description: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

Title: EXIT KUN
description: You are trapped in the IKUN passage. Carefully observe: singing, dancing, rap, and basketball so you can leave here. Look carefully and reach the "Exit Kun ".A meme game inspired by Exit 8.

Title: Maumau and the Labyrinth
description: Maumau, an adventurer, found a huge treasure chest in an ancient ruin. However, she was taken into the other dimension by the girl who appeared from the treasure chest. Maumau's unique adventure to survive begins.

Title: Gypsy Retro TV Media Player
description: Gypsy Retro TV Media Player as its name suggests offers an experience of viewing any movie in the TV frame of the bygone era. To enthuse the viewers, an environment of wilderness, with flora and fauna is present. The viewer is reminded of the glories of the good old days and nostalgia is aroused.

Title: HAITENAI RPG
description: The amnesiac protagonist awakens in the world of Dehaina, a land where all nature is supported by the power of mysterious "Orbs". Not all is well, however, as a demonic invasion threatens the balance and the Orbs' power is fading away.

Title: Is It Wrong to Repay the Debt in a Dungeon?
description: To repay the debt, both Akane and her mother have to earn a lot of money! Explore the dungeon, challenge strong enemies, and even use her own body! Everything she is trying to do is for saving her family!!

Title: Abnormal Status ~Tattoo / Prohibited Books / Parasites~
description: In the present day, the majority of the human race has become capable of using magic. The sudden rise of this power has not been met with adequate laws and regulations, and the world is rapidly becoming a wasteland as crimes and discrimination intensify.

Title: Strazeal
description: A digital strategy board game for 2 - 4 players. Capture your opponent's bases while protecting all of your own using land, water and special weapons.

Title: ANONYMOUS HUNTING SIMULATOR
description: ANONYMOUS HUNTING SIMULATOR is a dynamic first-person shooter. Your task is to explore the location and collect ten masks to complete the level.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Midnight Mahjong
description: Somewhere in Tokyo, in an exclusive mahjong Club. Rei is a clerk in this club. Her job is to play Mahjong with the guests. Players will operate Rei and play with 3 guests in the authentic Japanese Mahjong. Dead wall draw and Last tile from the wall... It all depends on your skills!!

Title: YAKIMOCHI STREAM
description: ãã¤ã­ã¢ãã¹ããªã¼ã ãã¯ãã¾ã©ããµã¨ããçºå£²ãããå­¦åã³ã¡ãã£ã¼ã¢ããã³ãã£ã¼ã²ã¼ã ã§ããæ¬ä½ã¯ã¾ã©ããµã¨ã®2ä½ç®ã«ãããä½åã§ãã¨ã¦ãäººæ°ãé«ããçºå£²å½åæ¥æ¬èãã²ã¼ã¢ã¯ã¼ã2014ã«ã¦éè³ã»ãã­ã¢ã¼ã·ã§ã³è³ãåè³ãã¾ããã

Title: Anime And Your Life
description: This is more than a game. This is your whole life!

Title: Guns of Succubus
description: You will play as Nico, a kind-hearted boy, using an assault rifle transformed by a succubus called Millfeuijonk, You can enjoy high-speed "Bullet Hell" when you dodging the enemy's bullets coming from all directions.

Title: High School Odyssey
description: A campus simulation game full of tons of surprising interactive gameplay elements along the way.

Title: Enatus Radi
description: After the protagonist wakes up, he finds that he has lost his memory. The first girl he met named Ena also lost her memory. In order to find the reason and the truth, they embarked on a journey to the world.

Title: Tiny Jump
description: Tiny Jump is a first person precision platformer, in this game you will control a ball but in first person perspective, The main goal of the game is to climb all the way to the top while facing difficult types of jumps & challenges.

Title: Worms W.M.D
description: The worms are back in their most destructive game yet. With a gorgeous, hand-drawn 2D look, brand new weapons, the introduction of crafting, vehicles and buildings plus the return of some much-loved classic weapons and gameplay, Worms W.M.D is the best worms experience ever.

Title: Crisis Brigade 2 reloaded
description: Crisis Brigade 2 reloaded is about covering, pointing and shooting, fast-paced pure action. Intense shootouts, powerful weapons, challenging levels, fierce enemies... Like the 90's classic arcade machines, but with the immersion that Virtual Reality is capable of.

Title: Ninja Stealth 4
description: He's back!

Title: Gardens and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

Title: Hentai Cuties
description: The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you ;-)

Title: Murder In Tehran's Alleys 2016
description: This is the story of the time when narcotics impair the brain; the time when a fatherâs hallucination becomes the dawn of his familyâs demise by slicing them into pieces for a sin they have not committed; the time when revenge is the only reason to live.

Title: Victorian Admirals
description: A steam-ship period naval combat games focusing on fleet-scale battles in real time. The naval combat game allows you to set up battle squadron groups, their formations and management, with realistic ship models and characteristics, as well as advanced ballistic and weapon models.

Title: Stellar Warfare
description: Space RTS with base building and ship customization. Personal passion project. More than 200 available ships, weapons and modules to design your fleet with. Contains a small campaign, several single and multiplayer game modes and a coop game mode. Also contains Wave defense!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Fallen girl - Black rose and the fire of desire
description: The lady of the noble was taken to prison by the countess "I don't want to be reduced to a plaything without consciousness." ââIn the face of the bad taste of the countess, how to use their body and wisdom, in order to avoid suffering? "Before I lose my mind, I want to find that life."

Title: ZigZagging Ski

description: The world of Gloriana, with all its wonderful diversity, awaits you.

Title: Ghost MasterÂ®
description: Grim spectres, howling banshees, and sly gremlins are yours to command as you unleash ghastly spirits on the town of Gravenville and scare the wits out of its citizens. In the world of the Ghost Master, spooks do your bidding, as you solve puzzles and unlock mysteries in a challenge that combines the best of strategy, adventure, and...

Title: Put Your Stamp On
description: Welcome back Mr. Director! Many things remained undone in your absence. It needs to be solved immediately.

Title: King's Questâ¢ Collection
description: Seven classic games in one collection. Celebrate the golden age of adventure games all over again with the return of King's Quest.The bravest knight in all of Daventry, Sir Graham, is appointed by the dying king to embark on a Quest for the Crown.

Title: Starena
description: Starena is a boss rush arena game with RPG elements in 3D voxel-art. As the robotic gladiator Mecha Reaper J3, fight all kinds of robots in the most thrilling intergalactic fighting tournament! Customize your weapons, choose your fans, and give the audience a good show to get their support!

Title: SPOREâ¢ Galactic Adventures
description: Take Your Creature From Zero To Galactic HeroGet out of your starship and turn your Spore creatures into legendary Space Captains. For the first time, beam down with your allies to take on action-packed, planetside adventures. Complete quests, collect rewards, and even create your own missions.

Title: Call of Duty: World at War
description: Call of Duty is back, redefining war like you've never experienced before. Building on the Call of Duty 4Â®: Modern Warfare engine, Call of Duty: World at War immerses players into the most gritty and chaotic WWII combat ever experienced.

Title: NUKITASHI
description: Seiran Island. Even here in paradise, there are those who work in the shadows to bring it down... Confront the tyranny of a twisted system in this long-awaited visual novel adventure.

Title: Making History: The Calm & the Storm
description: Making History® delivers the open-ended gameplay of strategy-game classics, but with compelling new economic, military, and diplomatic systems and deep research that lets you play with real historical challenges.

Title: Three Kingdom: The Journey
description: Craft a legendary deck and lead your troops to protect the Kingdom for the glory of the Han Dynasty in this fast-paced deck-building strategy roguelike. The Kingdom is on the verge of disaster against the Yellow Turbans rebellion, and only you â and your skills as a general â stand in their way!

Title: Overdungeon
description: A completely new style real-time card battle "Overdungeon" Overdungeon combines rogue-like, tower defense and card games. More than 100 cards are Attack, Animal, Building, Spell, Trap, etc..Build your creative and crazy deck!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy

Title: Golf Club Nostalgia
description: Human life is wiped out. Earth is now a golf course for the ultra-rich. In this dystopian sports puzzler, play through destroyed brutalist monuments, crumbling shopping malls, and abandoned museums as you piece together the full story of how humanity fell.

Title: Fantasy of Caocao 2
description: The most enjoyable Chinese-style Roguelike card game! Play as Cao Cao and conquer the Central, Japanese, and Western waifu with your allies, save the world!

Title: Platonically Mauled by a Magic Cougar
description: As nuts as Jun is about his wife, he canât help but drool over Towaka Minefuji. So when Jun is asked to attend his wifeâs school committee meetings in her place, his brain goes into overdrive at the thought of him and Towaka being in the same room together...

Title: Takedown: Red Sabre
description: TAKEDOWN is a thinking-personâs shooter; brutal, hardcore and deadly - like the real thing. Not for the faint hearted, Takedown requires you to bring your 'A' game - FPS fans looking for an ultra hardcore experience only need apply!

Title: Ghost Road Awakening
description: âGhost Roadâ is the first installment in the Ghost Road series of games, and is a visual novel game about the myth of ghosts and monsters in the Chinese underworld. The player plays the role of the Ghost Detainer in the underworld to investigate the past deeds of the three female leaders.

Title: Yukiiro Sign
description: A story of three girls and one season in the snowy town of Minamiouse.

Title: The Book Of Hiro
description: âThe Book of Hiroâ is a 3D visual puzzle game where players solve challenges and puzzles using illusions and perspective to find the hidden key in the map. The game tells the story of a brave villager named Hiro who was ordered to meet the king and encountered various challenges and puzzles.

Title: Soldier
description: Un juego de disparos en primera persona con bombas y zombies Â¿A que esperas para probarlo?

Title: Holy Paladin Cynthia
description: A classic RPG about one girl's journey to save the worldâand become a true Holy Paladin!

Title: Dongo Adventure
description: NOW IN OPTIMIZED VERSION AND BUGS FIXED! Embark on a great adventure and help Dongo escape from dangerous enemies and challenging scenarios!

Title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII
description: "The ultimate depiction of the Three Kingdom. A heroic drama of a gathering of Legends. "With this as the concept behind Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13, we have compiled an experience that will immerse you even deeper into the world of the Three Kingdoms, with "human drama," seen through the interactions of the...

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Modern WarfareÂ® II
description: Call of DutyÂ®: Modern WarfareÂ® II drops players into an unprecedented global conflict that features the return of the iconic Operators of Task Force 141.

Title: Need for Speedâ¢ Unbound
description: Race to the top, definitely donât flop. Outsmart the cops, and enter weekly qualifiers for The Grand: the ultimate street race. Pack your garage with precision-tuned, custom rides, and light up the streets with your style.

Title: Thriving City: Song
description: In 960 A.D., the Zhao Song Dynasty was established. As the mayor, you'll need to help the townspeople settle down, cultivate the land and expand. However, when the emperor issues a national mandate, conflicts between factions threaten city developmentâwhat strategy will you adopt?
genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Darkilson
description: Due to a terrible curse, the BA Bear was locked down in an asylum for meek and hairy bears. Help him get out of this not-so-delicious place!

Title: Singularityâ¢
description: FIGHT THE PAST TO SAVE THE FUTURE. STOP THE SINGULARITY. Learn the truth behind a massive cover-up of the catastrophic SINGULARITY, an event that fractured time and threatens the world as we know it. Armed with powerful, advanced weaponry and the experimental Time Manipulation Device, fight enemies from the past, the present, and...

Title: Shio
description: âShioâ is a challenging platformer game in which you deep and moving story by jumping from lantern to lantern. If you are big fan of Super Meat Boy, you will like Shio as well!

Title: LONE RUIN
description: Venture into an old, magical ruin to seek an ancient power in this highly replayable roguelike twin-stick shooter. Optimise spells and build ultimate combos to defeat twisted monstrosities and delve deeper into the Lone Ruin.

Title: Nope Nope Nurses
description: Hospital â  hospitality...?! You're stuck on a medical bed with nurses tending to your every need. The only problem? Their personalities... Experience life with demons in white dresses in this visual novel misadventure!

Title: Soul Elegy
description: This is a very challenging war chess + roguelike game, with random mazes, free combination of teams, and turn-based combat. In the game, players will lead all kinds of undead to counterattack the human world!

Title: Atelier Rorona ~The Alchemist of Arland~ DX
description: First release in the Arland series. The main character Rorona must save her Atelier from being closed by the Kingdom. Using Synthesis, Exploration, and Battle, gain recognition for the Atelier and save it from being closed.

Title: Hydrofoil Generation
description: Hydrofoil Generation is a realistic sailing and foiling simulator. An exciting and accurate first-person simulation of multiplayer "in-shore" regattas, now featuring official Global Racing League SailGP content. Put your skills and heart to the test!

Title: Atelier Meruru ~The Apprentice of Arland~ DX
description: Third release in the Arland series. Princess of the small frontier country of Arls, Meruru plans to use alchemy to stimulate the growth of her small country. Use Synthesis, Explore, and Battle to increase the population within the time limit and boost the advancement of the kingdom.

Title: The Territory of Egg
description: The Territory of Egg is a unique twist on tower defense game. You need to build defense lines with egg warriors to protect the Holy Egg, the core of all eggs. Remember to upgrade your Tech Tree with the resources you've collected and unlock more skills to fight against the evil monsters.

Title: Atelier Totori ~The Adventurer of Arland~ DX
description: The second release in the Arland series. In a search for her missing mother, Totori tours the world of Arland as an adventurer accompanied by her friends. Use Synthesis, Explore, and Battle to fulfil requests, raise her rank as an adventurer and venture into brand new lands.

Title: Strike Force Heroes
description: Strike Force Heroes is an oldschool arena shooter rebuilt with modern mechanics with full co-operative and PvP online multiplayer. It melds over the top action with epic story-telling in this intense remake of the hit Flash game.

Title: Mr. Pumpkin 2: Kowloon walled city
description: Mr. Pumpkin 2: Kowloon Walled City is a sequel to the Mr. Pumpkin franchise. Our protagonist, an insignificant guy with a pumpkin head, will explore the Kowloon Walled City of Hong Kong, and witness the stories happening within these walls.

Title: Valkyria Chronicles 4 Complete Edition
description: A Continent Engulfed in the Bitter Flames of War! Commander Claude Wallace and his childhood friends set out to fight in a desperate war, but bone-chilling blizzards, waves of imperial soldiers, and the godlike powers of the Valkyria stand between them and victory.

Title: Richman 11
description: Richman 11 is a casual game in Monopoly genre, it is the 11th episode of the franchise. In the game, players could select maps, characters and group play, creating free play or challenge play. Try to earn money and win the play by investing properties, using cards, etc.

Title: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars
description: Embark on a journey full of danger in this action RPG, inspired by Greek and Roman mythologies. Explore the breathtaking city of Aphes and forge your way through legions of unique foes and mythical bosses to discover the truth behind the cityâs curse.

Title: Quizz
description: Call your friend and start engaging in a simple and cozy experience while discovering all the questions that wait for you. Quizz is a game for everyone, having multiple question domains I am sure that some will fit you. Test your knowledge and luck to be the number one in the lobby.

Title: Xuan-Yuan Sword: Mists Beyond the Mountains
description: This Game is one of the most popular RPGs in the Chinese Speaking Area and has won many awards around Asia. The game story takes place in an era of collision between East and West, covering a wide range, spanning Eurasia, the Arab World, Francia, and China.

Title: Aseprite
description: Aseprite is a pixel-art tool to create 2D animations, sprites, and any kind of graphics for games.
genre: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Game Development

Title: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV
description: Triumph over the land, take charge of the fate of China! Conquer territories and fly your colors!

Title: Magnet Block
description: A simple 3d sokoban puzzle game in which you push monopole magnets to solve puzzles and enter the exit teleporter.

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Modern WarfareÂ® 2 (2009)
description: The most-anticipated game of the year and the sequel to the best-selling first-person action game of all time, Modern Warfare 2 continues the gripping and heart-racing action as players face off against a new threat dedicated to bringing the world to the brink of collapse.

Title: A Guidebook of Babel
description: A plot adventure game with the butterfly effect at the core. After death, you will soon realize you've boarded the Babel...and while this may feel like the twilight zone, you will be given a pen to rewrite the past so future events can unfold.

Title: The Endless Journey
description: In this puzzle game featuring a 19th-century world where steam interlaced with magic, a magician named Valjean set foot on a journey of atonement with the mechanical puppet "Cosette" he made. On their way, they meet 4 animals in a fairy tale town who are going to be musicians in Bremen...

Title: Traffic Master
description: In the bustling city of Metroville, traffic congestion has reached unprecedented levels, causing frustration and delays for its residents. To address this issue, the city council introduces the traffic control initiative. you are responsible for managing traffic flow and resolving gridlock.

Title: Red Line
description: Moving into a shabby apartment, a saturnine girl with hidden secrets finds a notebook that allows her to communicate with another world. A thrilling adventure taking place across multiple timelines ensues.

Title: Let 's be a Mouse
description: Let's Be a Mouse is a fun and engaging game that allows players to experience life through the eyes of a mouse.

Title: Big Bia
description: BIG BIA is a pixel art style dungeon adventure game with some rogue elements. Players can form different strategies, collect different cards and even build their own exclusive dungeons to challenge.

Title: Santa World
description: Join the festive adventure and help Santa Claus in his quest to save Christmas in this captivating platformer game, Santa World!
genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Prototypeâ¢
description: You are the Prototype, Alex Mercer, a man without memory armed with amazing shape-shifting abilities, hunting your way to the heart of the conspiracy which created you; making those responsible pay. Fast & Deadly Shape-Shifting Combat: Reconfigure your body to the situation at hand.

Title: A Perfect Day
description: Revisit and repeat the final moments of China's turn of the century in this narrative puzzle adventure. Play a 6th-grade student and greet classmates, explore secrets, play mini-4WD, or just wander around town. Make your choices to create a perfect day for everyone!

Title: Lighthouse Simulator
description: You are forced by your girlfriend to participate in a program: staying at a lighthouse on a haunted uninhabited island for ten days can earn you 100000 dollars, and your girlfriend will come to the island to comfort you when you win

Title: Box Maze Extreme
description: Think you got what it takes? Challenge Yourself with 30 Extreme levels! More enemies and obstructions, checkpoints instead of saves. Box Maze Extreme is not for the faint-hearted. Includes FREE skins!

Title: The Deadly Tower of Monsters
description: Fire up your ray guns, crystal swords, and laser whips, and get ready for thrills and chills! With three incredible movie stars playing out decidedly B-level sci-fi exploits, Dick Starspeed, Scarlet Nova, and Robot will have you ready to jump off the side of the towerâright into adventure!

Title: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
description: The definitive edition of the Atelier "Mysterious" series at a new price, with brand new content and various DLCs! "Atelier Sophie" is the 1st instalment: a chance encounter between Sophie and a sentient book Plachta takes them on an adventure to recover Plachta's memories.

Title: Yakuza: Like a Dragon
description: Become Ichiban Kasuga, a low-ranking yakuza grunt left on the brink of death by the man he trusted most. Take up your legendary bat and get ready to crack some underworld skulls in dynamic RPG combat set against the backdrop of modern-day Japan.

Title: Exorcist Fairy
description: The player will play the role of nine JiuTianXuannu, who will fight with many demons, meet and help the innocent in six different and interconnected worlds, and finally go deep into the hinterland of magic city to uncover the truth of the ancient mystery between magic seal city and Xuannu family.

Title: Far Away
description: Far Away is a visual novel full of dark humor depicting immersive storylines rather than romantic drama. You will play as Krosa, a typical girl who experiences gang conflicts, crimes, conspiracies, and family grudges in the port city of Bedjan.

Title: Kingdom of Aurelia: Mystery of the Poisoned Dagger
description: In this steam punk adventure you have to help young Sam to save Princess Aurora and stop the villain, who intended to seize power in the Kingdom of Aurelia.

Title: Guardians of Holme
description: Guardians of Holme is a tower defense game with deckbuilding and roguelite elements. Players must use the terrain to their advantage and formulate defensive tactics by strategically placing powerful traps to repel endless waves of enemies.

Title: Bareback Reincarnation - It's Just That Easy to Brave a Different World
description: The protagonist, a weary corporate slave, found himself unexpectedly transported to an Isekai during overtime work. Embark on an exciting adventure as a wandering traveler in this fantasy realm, wielding the powers of a "Demonoid" to conquer the hearts of the girls.

Title: Return to Krondor
description: Return to a world of danger, magic, and betrayal.

Title: Street Clean TD
description: Protect the streets from the living trash.

Title: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition
description: "Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends" introduces entirely new levels of fun to the refreshing gameplay vanquishing swarms of enemies with mighty warriors found in "Dynasty Warriors 8."

Title: My Own Little Planet
description: 'My own little planet' tells the story of a lost boy who is trapped on a dark and strange world. Fight your deepest fears and find an exit to this madness!

Title: Vengeance: Lost Love
description: When an urban legend comes true, Amada's family gets caught up in the haunting secrets of the mysterious lone miner. Uncover secrets long forgotten in this intense and enticing hidden object adventure!

Title: Life is Paradise
description: "Life is Paradise" is an RPG life management simulation game with a high degree of freedom, where you can build your own village, breed livestock, venture into mines, and make friends with all kinds of people! As the protagonist, you can do whatever you want here!

Title: Galaxy Tales: Story of Rapunzel
description: Fight space pirates with Rapunzel, the Android with the best hair in the world! To protect the precious shelter where the Jimo race lives, the cute alien Rose and Android Rapunzel must go up to the ground floor.

Title: Ember
description: Ember is a homage to classic role-playing games (RPG) that features a deep branching story, endless exploration across dynamic and living environments, a robust skill system, and an intricate crafting system.

Title: Zork: Grand Inquisitor
description: Join forces with Dungeon Master Dalboz and travel throughout the Underground Empire's many locations, such as Hades, Flood Control Dam #3 and The Dungeon Master's Lair.

Title: TEMBO THE BADASS ELEPHANT
description: Shell City is plunged into a state of emergency after coming under attack from the devastating forces of PHANTOM. As the National Army struggle to contain the terrifying war machines, they call upon the only thing that stands between Shell Cityâs obliteration and its salvation; the peanut chompinâ, villain stompinâ, TEMBO THE BADASS...

Title: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream
description: A mysterious story of a mysterious dream ... This is a story about one of the adventures Sophie the Alchemist had after she left her hometown of Kirchen Bell.

Title: Hybrislave
description: The sudden appearance of monsters called "Burana" invaded human territory, and a war between humans and Burana broke out. ãââThis is the story of a girl living in such a world.

Title: iFAction Game Maker
description: iFAction is a visualized game making software.You can create your own games without programming. It offers many kinds of game modes like ACT,ARPG and AVG. It also supports MOD to make your wonderful ideas realized here!

Title: Get Me Out, Please
description: Work together with friends to escape an abandoned school in this horror escape action game for up to four players, but beware: one of you will become a monster.

Title: Metroplex Zero: Sci-Fi Card Battler
description: Neo-cyberpunk team card battler. Assemble a team that fits your playstyle to take on evil MegaCorps. Customize your decks and choose your cards wisely to defeat tough foes. Power up your heroes with cards, implants, and augments.

Title: Warlords Under Siege
description: Warlords Under Siege is a mix of RTS and Roguelike genre, where you build a small city and defend it against continuous waves of enemies. Improve your assortment of weapons with each playthrough, unlocking new possibilities to beat the ever-increasing threat.

Title: Princess&Blade
description: A Clothing collection ARPG. Create set properties according to your clothing. Hundreds of clothes for the protagonist to enjoy, experience different battle strategies based on different outfits. Dress sexy or suit up like a heavily armoured angel of death.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Black Sheep
description: Black Sheep" is a 2D story-driven adventure game, you will play a high school student who explores the flooded school ruins, trace the shadow of the past, and unveil the evil those buried in the bottom of the river to see the light of day.

Title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms II" is the second in the series and was first released in 1989. Experience the strategies of the Three Kingdom. A variety of strategies brings the world of the Three Kingdoms to vivid life. Players take the role of a Ruler of the time and strategize their way into total control.

Title: Under the Sky World~Another~
description: "Under the Sky World' is another story of IF.If KARIN in the main plot infected with [virus], so on the wrong path of words ......This is a small story about KARIN "if" -

description: "Claris" is the knight princess who likes to kill bandits the mostâ¤ But because of the vengeful spirit of the bandit, she became the knight princess of the miscellaneous fish. This is a short side extra story of "Claris the Princess Knight"!

Title: The Far Kingdoms:  Magic Mosaics
description: "The Far Kingdoms: Magic Mosaics" takes you on a challenging mosaic puzzle journey where you gather magic elements. These magic elements are refills for 4 mystical runes. These runes are the pillar of protection from the invasion of the evil dark magician that threatens the kingdom.

Title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms V with Power Up Kit
description: Released in 1995, "Romance of the Three Kingdoms â¤ with Power Up Kit" is the enhanced version of the 5th release in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms series. It places more focus on the common people with "Fame," which was an indicator of how well the Ruler grasped the hearts of the people.

Title: Immortals of Aveumâ¢
description: Immortals of Aveum is a single-player first person magic shooter that tells the story of Jak as he joins an elite order of battlemages to save a world on the edge of abyss.

Title: Absolver
description: Absolver is an online multiplayer combat game where players are placed behind the mask of a Prospect under control of the Guides, the new rulers of the fallen Adal Empire, who will determine your worth in joining their elite corps of Absolvers.

Title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV with Power Up Kit
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms â£ with Power Up Kit" was released in 1994 as an expansion to the 4th release in the series. About 450 officers appear in the game and "Frontier Tribes" have been added as a diplomatic element.

Title: Noobs Want to Live
description: Noobs Want to Live is a fast-paced roguelike featuring several characters and a large pool of skills to choose from (that synergize with one another, too!) Fight, kill, grow. Each run is a new chance to create a steamrolling build!

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops II
description: Pushing the boundaries of what fans have come to expect from the record-setting entertainment franchise, Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops II propels players into a near future Cold War

Title: Masarada Town Story
description: This is Masarada Town. It is a lonely town that few tourists visit. That's why I, Takarayama Jewel, were sent to this small town to work hard to mine rare ores!

Title: Joe Dever's Lone Wolf HD Remastered
description: For Sommerlund and the Kai! Lone Wolf is back with an exclusive storyline, stunning graphics and a deep combat system. Make meaningful choices and carve your own path.

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Modern WarfareÂ® Remastered (2017)
description: One of the most critically-acclaimed games in history, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is back, remastered in true high-definition, featuring improved textures, physically based rendering, high-dynamic range lighting and much more.

Title: Lucky Tlhalerwa - IMS Death Squad
description: IMS Death Squad is A Third-Person Story-Telling Game. Its Story Takes Place In & Runs Parallel With The Original Super Incursion. IMS SGT David Grimmes Tries To Save Himself And His Team As Their Commander Has To Kill Them All, As A Requirement To Transition Into The Enemy Side.

Title: I Am Fish
description: I Am Fish is a charming, physics-based adventure starring four intrepid fish friends, forcibly separated from their home in a pet shop fish tank. Swim, fly, roll and chomp your way to the open ocean in a bid for freedom and to re-unite once again.

Title: Geometry Warsâ¢ 3: Dimensions Evolved
description: Experience the full evolution of the award-winning Geometry Wars franchise and battle through waves of enemies on 3D grids in this frenetic arcade shooter!

Title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms III
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms III" was released in 1992. The battle for unification moves from a Force base to a City base. Players issue orders to their retainers to effectively protect and expand their city, while simultaneously trying to unify the 46 main cities spread across China.

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops
description: The biggest first-person action series of all time and the follow-up to critically acclaimed Call of DutyÂ®: Modern Warfare 2 returns with Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops.

Title: The Trials of Olympus II: Wrath of the Gods
description: Play the epic match3 saga, that tells the tale of Angelo and help the outcast god from Olympus continue his quest and save his true love, princess Amara...

Title: Rain City
description: Rain City is a point-and-click adventure game. The player is taking the role of a cat who comes to the Rain City - where it rains all year round - to find his missing sister. During the journey, the player will meet different people and witness various, bizarre stories.

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops III
description: Call of DutyÂ®: Black Ops III Zombies Chronicles Edition includes the full base game plus the Zombies Chronicles content expansion.

Title: ISOLAND: The Amusement Park
description: ISOLAND: The Amusement Park is the latest installment of Isoland series from CottonGame, featuring the classic and unique art style, and intriguing puzzles. As always, Isoland: The Amusement Park has a second-run mode, which presents puzzles and paths different from the first play-through.

Title: Ancient Warfare: The Han Dynasty
description: Ancient Warfare: The Han Dynasty is a wargame demonstrating ancient warfare in China and combining elements of Big Strategy, RTS and RPG. You can learn little-known stories of heroes in ancient China by experiencing battles accommodating thousands of soldiers.

Title: Sim Junta
description: Sim Junta â A game of dirty politics! You are the new dictator of Risuena, a small and poor country of the third world. You have just seized power after a bloody coup and your intentions are to stay in power as long as you can, to rip this country off, transfer the money to your secret Swiss bank account and of course, stay alive and...

Title: Kuroinu 2 Redux
description: As the Nation faces invasion from the peoples it has pillaged for a century, one man defends it: Derek Rondo, the second coming of the Mercenary King Vult. He fights for his country, but plots to seize the throne for himself... A new visual novel betrayal epic begins from within!

Title: Timeray
description: it is a openworld game, you have to survive using time your time powers.

Title: PlateUp!
description: Cook and serve your dishes, design and decorate your restaurants, and expand your culinary kingdom with new unlocks, abilities and dishes in procedurally-generated locations. Classic cooking action with permanent roguelite progression. Hire your friends - or do it all yourself!

Title: Great Deceiver
description: Marie Mamiya reigns supreme, and by her whim, she'll train an ordinary man into shapeâin the pursuit of beauty.

Title: Insomnia: Theater in the Head

In this Point & Click puzzle game "Insomnia", the show in the head is rolling on again. Alas, any sleep tonight...

Title: Rivais Em Batalha
description: Play as an animal warrior and experience the feeling of playing in a sci-fi environment with weapons and different characters and fun audio in a nice third-person gameplay.

Title: Zork Anthology
description: Once you step through the door to Zork, you leave the world of arcade games and trite fantasies behind and enter the dimension of your imagination.

Title: Persona 4 Arena Ultimax
description: A Persona 4 Smackdown!

Title: The Far Kingdoms: Forgotten Relics
description: In this Solitaire game you have to travel through 4 kingdoms and find stolen relics - play 150 Solitaire and Hidden Object levels!

Title: Gabriel KnightÂ® 3: Blood of the Sacred, Blood of the Damned
description: Play as both Gabriel Knight and Grace Nakimura as you learn more about what is hidden in the hills of France.

Title: Juicy Realm
description: Juicy Realm is a roguelike game in which players must square off against bizarre fruits all across the world. The line between the animal and the plant world has become blurred, and the food chain has been completely disrupted.

Title: Once Again
description: Make up for lost time with Once Again, If you could travel through time, whoâs the first person youâd meet? An interactive story about a boy who spends his summers wandering between past and present... After meeting her, summer will never be the same again...Who is she, and what journey awaits you?

Title: Raid on Taihoku
description: Raid On Taihoku is an adventure game with the backdrop of WW2 Taiwan. By controlling the characters pass through different danger and safe zones, you will experience the struggles of human nature and cruelty of war.

Title: PersonaÂ® 5 Strikers
description: Join the Phantom Thieves and strike back against the corruption overtaking cities across Japan. A summer vacation with close friends takes a sudden turn as a distorted reality emerges; reveal the truth and redeem the hearts of those imprisoned at the center of the crisis!

Title: Weapon Shop Fantasy
description: A shop game with RPG? Or is it RPG with a shop? Collect materials, Craft weapons, Train your staff and defeat your enemy! This is Weapon Shop Fantasy!

Title: Battlefieldâ¢ V
description: This is the ultimate Battlefield V experience. Enter mankindâs greatest conflict with the complete arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and gadgets plus the best customization content of Year 1 and 2.

Title: Battlefield 3â¢
description: Enjoy total freedom to fight the way you want. Explore 29 massive multiplayer maps and use loads of vehicles, weapons, and gadgets to help you turn up the heat. Every second of battle gets you closer to unlocking tons of extras and moving up in the Ranks. So get in the action.

Title: Moolii's Dreamland
description: Mooliiâs Dreamland is a Bullet-hell game. Players will play as the little fox Moolii to fight against monsters in her dream. This game features whimsical level designs, monsters, and powerful bosses, along with combos of ammo skills and magical tricks. Help Moolii wake up from her nightmare!

In the harbour town of Astella, a mysterious adventure is about to unfold along with the investigation of an unusual crime...

description: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Dawn of Kagura: Hatsuka's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG! It's one quest after another for Hatsuka, who's off to investigate a case of seriously unseasonable snowfall...

description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" was first released in 1985. It was the first historical simulation game released in Japan based on the Chinese classical literature "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". Players become the leaders of their countries and strive to unite the land under their rule.

Title: Battlefield 4â¢
description: Embrace unrivaled destruction in Battlefield 4â¢. Revel in the glorious chaos of all-out war packed with rewarding, tactical challenges in an interactive environment.

Title: Dawn of Kagura: Natsu's Story
description: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Dawn of Kagura: Natsu's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG! The goddess Natsu descends from her shrine to fight evil and free the nearby village.

Title: Dawn of Kagura: Keika's Story
description: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Dawn of Kagura: Keika's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG! Strict big sis Keika wants to set a good example by exorcising evil with her priestess powers...

Title: Kuroinu Redux
description: Desperate to end a bloody war, the Seven Shields Allianceâled by an elven goddess incarnateâseek out the assistance of the protagonist Vult and his Black Dog Mercenaries. He turns on them and takes control in this visual novel story of betrayal.

Title: Battlefieldâ¢ 1
description: Battlefieldâ¢ 1 takes you back to The Great War, WW1, where new technology and worldwide conflict changed the face of warfare forever.

Title: Persona 5 Tactica
description: Join the Phantom Thieves as they lead an uprising of the heart! Assemble an all-star team of heroes in a brand-new story in this thrilling combat adventure set in Personaâs iconic universe.

Title: Unravel Two
description: When you cut ties to the past, new bonds form. Build relationships with other Yarnys in local co-op or as a single player, fostering friendship and support as you journey together.

Title: Unravel
description: UnravelÂ is a physics-based puzzle platformer. Yarny, a character made from a single thread of yarn, must embarkÂ on a larger than life adventure.

Title: Call of DutyÂ®: Ghosts - Digital Hardened Edition
description: Outnumbered and outgunned, but not outmatched.Call of DutyÂ®: Ghosts is an extraordinary step forward for one of the largest entertainment franchises of all-time. This new chapter in the Call of DutyÂ® franchise features a new dynamic where players are on the side of a crippled nation fighting not for freedom, or liberty, but simply to...

Title: Sea of Solitude
description: When humans get too lonely, they turn into monstersâ¦ Set sail across a beautiful and evolving world of darkness and light, and discover what it means to be human.

Title: Battlefieldâ¢ Hardline
description: Strategy. Speed. Story. These are the core pillars of Battlefieldâ¢ Hardline, a cops vs. criminals experience unlike any other.

Title: Fe
description: Run, climb and glide your way through a dark Nordic forest and explore its living, breathing ecosystem filled with secrets and mystical creatures. Become Fe and discover a world that you will never want to leave.

Title: Need for Speedâ¢ Most Wanted
description: The open-world action in Need for Speed Most Wanted gives you the freedom to drive your way. Hit jumps and shortcuts, switch cars, lie low or head for terrain that plays to your vehicleâs unique strengths. Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech and tons of nitrous.

Title: Need for Speedâ¢
description: Ready to own the streets? Get behind the wheel of iconic cars and floor it through Ventura Bay, a sprawling urban playground. Explore overlapping stories as you build your reputation â and your dream car â and become the ultimate racing icon.

Title: Arms Evolution: ZOMBIE DESTROYER
description: "Arms Evolution: ZOMBIE DESTROYER" is a unique Roguelite tower defense game. You will slaughter thousands of zombies in the game and enhance your weapon towers through build character in the RPG way. and , the game also offers an idle mode, so you can enjoy building weapons anytime and anywhere.

Title: The Enthralling Realms: The Blacksmith's Revenge
description: A challenging fantasy match-3 game! Help the Blacksmiths daughter Ara to avenge her village and defeat a vicious dragon.

Title: Lucky Hero
description: "Lucky Hero" is a Roguelike symbol-building game. Your weapons and equipment have transformed into symbols, and by spinning the Wheel of Fortune, you will face various powerful enemies. This game offers a vast array of symbols and character skills for players to explore and combine.

Title: Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition
description: Explore a stunning world, make complex moral choices, and engage in bone-crushing combat against massive and terrifying creatures. The Ultimate Edition includes Dragon Age: Origins, Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening and all nine content packs.

Title: The Chronicles of Hercules II - Wrath of Kronos
description: The Titan Kronos has broken free from Tartarus and raised an army of giants to attack Olympus and defeat the gods! Help Hercules in the second part of the epic Match3 game defeat Kronos and save the Olympus!

Title: Need for Speedâ¢ Payback
description: Set in the underworld of Fortune Valley, you and your crew were divided by betrayal and reunited by revenge to take down The House, a nefarious cartel that rules the cityâs casinos, criminals and cops. In this corrupt gamblerâs paradise, the stakes are high and The House always wins.

Title: Yakuza 6: The Song of Life
description: Step into Japan's criminal underworld in this explosive action brawler starring legendary yakuza, Kazuma Kiryu, who is hellbent on unraveling the truth around his daughter's tragic accident.

Title: Wadality
description: Multiplayer VR Shooter platform with unique vertical gameplay! Here you can literally fly around using "flapping" locomotion!

Title: Call of DutyÂ® 4: Modern WarfareÂ® (2007)
description: The new action-thriller from the award-winning team at Infinity Ward, the creators of the Call of DutyÂ® series, delivers the most intense and cinematic action experience ever. Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare arms gamers with an arsenal of advanced and powerful modern day firepower and transports them to the most treacherous hotspots...

Title: Sword and Fairy Inn 2
description: âSwords and Fairy Inn2 â is a game developed by Softstar Entertainment. It includes the type of RPG, casual, simulation in it. Many roles of Sword and Fairy series come from different place to work in this Inn, live and build a warm peace family together.

Title: WARRIORS ALL-STARS
description: A battle of heroes where everyone is the lead! The very first all-stars title for Koei Tecmo! For the first time in Warriors series, flashy action combines both the traits of the original series and new exiting elements such as âMusou Rushâ, open scenarios and multiple endings!

Title: Jet Kave Adventure
description: Jetpack through the prehistoric world in this Stone-Fiction adventure platformer. Enjoy challenging boss fights, flying over pitfalls, smashing through walls, knocking out enemies, and manipulating objects as you halt the alien threat once and for all.

Title: Candy Disaster - Tower Defense
description: Candy Disaster is 3D trap-style tower defense game where you guard candies against alien thieves! Unlock powerful and clever traps, choose your arsenal for different bases, and find the deadliest trap combination - then watch those space goons walk into their death!

Title: O Holy Knight
description: Master the art of formation and lead your medieval squad in strategic battles. Command, level up, and triumph over monstrous waves in this thrilling roguelite adventure!

Title: Aces & Adventures
description: Aces & Adventures is a deckbuilding RPG with poker-powered combat. Craft your deck, combining poker hands with powerful ability cards. Journey through 13 fully-voiced campaigns to save the Life Tree, or tackle procedurally-generated runs in this strategic deckbuilder unlike any other.

Title: The Voice from Heaven
description: A charming match3 game! Help Aurora heal the sick king with her magical voice and remove the curse from the kingdom.

Title: Pro Rugby Manager 2015
description: Take the lead of your favourite rugby union team.Pro Rugby Manager 2015 covers all aspects of the challenges of a real rugby union manager: guarantee sporting success on the field and financial success off it and be the next Champion!

Title: Edgar
description: Edgar" is a 2D hardcore platformer game which you'll play as Edgar through challenging levels looking for your missing girlfriend Eve.

Title: Tomato Jones - Episode 3
description: Tomato Jones - Episode 3 is a physics based ball-rolling platformer. The third sequel of its greatly fun predecessors - "Tomato Jones" and "Tomato Jones 2", already available on Steam.

Title: Sword and Fairy 7
description: An action RPG based on Chinese art style, as the 7th lineal sequel of this series, it earns a lot of anicipations. Better gaming experience than any of its previous episode will be brought to all the players.

Title: Murder Is Game Over: Deal Killer
description: Murder Is Game Over: Deal Killer takes you on an immersive journey through the Italian Alps. Unravel the murder mystery amidst an alpine backdrop, exploring opulent settings and unmasking the killer in this thrilling detective game.

Title: The Trials of Olympus
description: Banished to the mortal realm, Angelo must prove his worth to the Grecian king by building the most majestic palace. Play 79 thrilling match-3 levels in 5 unique worlds.

Title: Afterimage
description: Afterimage is a hand-drawn 2D action adventure that emphasizes fast-paced combat with diversified character builds, non-linear levels, and a gripping story set in the ruins of a fantasy world.

Title: Beyond the Long Night
description: Explore a whimsical underground world whilst being chased by a mysterious corrupting force in this charming twin-stick action roguelike! Befriend loveable characters, fend off enemies with chaotic abilities, and uncover the secrets of this subterranean kingdom caught in a time loop.

Title: RPG Time: The Legend of Wright
description: It's time for an adventure! Once classes are over, RPG Time begins! Game master Kenta's notebook holds a handwritten RPG made just for you.

Title: Warriors of the Nile 2
description: Warriors of the Nile 2 is a fast-paced Roguelite strategy game. This time our Warriors are equipped with a more unique combat style. Freely choose the adventure route, use the skill tablets to strengthen characters, lead your squad to repel the Roman legion.

Title: PuPu's Adventure Park
description: Build an Adventure Park from the ground up! The PuPu clan had just rented a new "playground" from the Dark Goblins. Manage the park, construct park facilities, and grow your clan to serve the expansion of the Park for "hero" customers summoned from other planets!

Title: Lost & Found Agency Collector's Edition
description: Play this great new hidden object game from AVI Games. Get and fullfill orders from the detective agency âLost & Found Agencyâ to search for missing objects. Go to fascinating locations and explore dangerous places, decipher clues and uncover secrets. Find the missing objects and solve crimes.

Title: Castle Morihisa
description: "Castle Morihisa" is a roguelike featuring strategic deckbuilder. You need to build up your deck through constant battles, acquire powerful talents, and wield the power of the Fallen Heroes to unveil the truth behind the rebellion in Castle Morihisa.

Title: Need for Speedâ¢ Rivals
description: Erase the line between single player and multiplayer in this street-racing rivalry between Cops and Racers. Seamlessly join a world where your friends are already racing and chasing.

Title: TEVI
description: Embark on an epic action-adventure as you slash, dash, and combo your way through a vast, vibrant world. Explore and uncover hidden secrets. Customize your build to triumph in spectacular boss battles. Experience a tale of mystery, magic, and mayhem in TEVI, a bullet hell metroidvania!

Title: Dead Spaceâ¢ 2
description: Three years after the Necromorph infestation aboard the USS Ishimura, Isaac Clarke awakens from a coma, confused, disoriented, and on a space station called The Sprawl. Explore this world and its zero-g environments to discover the truth about the Unitology and its role in the Necromorph epidemic.

Title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania
description: Go Bananas with your favorite monkey gang in the ultimate Super Monkey Ball adventure!

Title: Station to Station
description: âStation to Stationâ is a minimalist & relaxing game about building railway connections. Grab your conductorâs hat and bring the voxel-art world to life through the magic of trains!

Title: Valdamour
description: Valdamour is a multiplayer asymmetric PvP where the exorcist player performs rituals in a haunted mansion, while the ghost player tries to stop him by using his arsenal of spooky abilities. Avoid the ghost's attempts at killing you before you can complete the final ritual and exorcise it for good.

description: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 Empires is part of the "Empires" series, in which you aim to conquer ancient China using both strategy and the one warrior versus one thousand tactical action the WARRIORS series is known for.

Title: Valkyria Chroniclesâ¢
description: The critically acclaimed Valkyria Chronicles is now available on PC in 1080p True HD, including all previously released DLC!

Title: How to Survive
description: âA real Gemâ â Destructoid at E3 âOffers a different experience for zombie game veteransâ â Co-OptimusâHas a lot more going for it than smashing brains and gory, red goo ... With a surprisingly deep crafting systemâ â GamesRadarYou're shipwrecked on an isolated island, a desperate castaway in a total freakshow world. How will you survive?

Title: Jane's Realty
description: Help Jane to build the best city in the neighborhood and enjoy hours of addictive gameplay!

description: Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure is a point-and-click puzzle game. The main character of this game is Mr. Pumpkin who lost his memories. During the adventure, you will help him solve all the puzzles, which will eventually unveil an evil plot.

Title: DiabloÂ® IV
description: Join the fight for Sanctuary in Diablo IV, the ultimate action RPG adventure. Experience the critically acclaimed campaign and new seasonal content.

Title: Underworld Ascendant
description: From the creative minds behind the System Shock, Thief and UnderworldÂ® series. Enter The Stygian Abyss, a dangerous, highly interactive dungeon world. Mix and match dozens of combat, stealth and magic skills to develop your own unique style of play. Become The Ascendant.

Title: Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborvilleâ¢
description: Kick some grass in Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville, the wackiest shooter yet!

Title: Space Garbage
description: Do you like Tetris? Doesn't matter. Space Garbage is here to rotate Tetris 90 degrees on its head and add a little car to it. Blast and stack your way to the top of the leaderboard with this farm-to-table, indie, retro, solo, arcade... experience!

Title: Gone Rogue
description: Gone Rogue is a tactical stealth game with RPG elements. Get into the role of a thief from the city slums. Lurking in the shadows, sneak unnoticed past enemies, get behind any locked doors, and carry off rich loot.

Title: Yakuza Kiwami

Become Kazuma Kiryu, an up-and-coming yakuza who takes the fall for the murder of a crime boss, only to emerge from prison ten years later to a changed world. Remastered from the ground up, now in 4K and uncapped framerates on PC.

Title: Witch's Pranks: Frog's Fortune Collector's Edition
description: Evil witch decided to marry a prince. And everyone, who rejected her, she turned to frogs. Help bewitched princes to reach their brides to cure the spell with a kiss of love.

Title: Tony Hawk'sâ¢ Pro Skaterâ¢ 1 + 2
description: Play the fully-remastered Tony Hawkâsâ¢ Pro Skaterâ¢ & Tony Hawkâsâ¢ Pro Skaterâ¢ 2 games in one epic collection, rebuilt from the ground up in incredible HD.

Title: Fireworks Simulator: Realistic
description: This is the best fireworks simulator, lighting fireworks will bring good luck, and your world will be colorful.

Title: Jumping Cat
description: "Jumping Cat" is a simple and straightforward platform jumping game. In order to revive the lost kingdom, our cat hero puts on his cape and overcomes many obstacles to collect Gold Coins and Paw Gems in dungeons full of traps!

Title: The Secret of Rooms
description: "the Secret of Rooms" is a drama-oriented puzzle-solving game in a modern setting. By searching for the item clues in each room,find the truth of the case in the game.Different choices in the game will unlock different endings and bring players a new puzzle solving experience.
