Title: Flower in the Snow - Resurrection
description: What is going to be acted before you isââBlossom in the shackles, but deep down in your bone, suspension and romantic.

Title: Endless Faith
description: Highly addictive and interesting, Endless Faith allows you to control the game with simple hand movements. The gameplay is easy and enjoyable. If you're looking to play during your free moments, join us, download Endless Faith.

Title: Souls of White Star
description: Souls of White Star is a sci-fi turn-based card wargame Roguelike strategy game. The different design of [double-sided technology moving cards] and [bandwidth draw cost] will test your judgment and decision more!
genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Mirages
description: Mirages is a 3D narrative and horror game with folkÂ stories. One night, seven brides headed to the Captain Mansion but strayed into a place full of ghosts - Regret City. Horror hauntsÂ the small town. Due to destiny, actors, warlords, and offspring of the town are drawn in. They are closer to truth.

Title: Sacred Stones
description: Retro sidescrolling action and adventure greet you in Sacred Stones! The indie atmosphere is easy to immerse yourself in. Have a great time as you explore, run/jump & fight your way to victory. This game is perfect for both hardcore and casual fans alike seeking that nostalgic-indie fix!

Title: Asdivine Cross
description: Bear the fate of light and shadow to save Asdivine in a grand fantasy RPG!

Title: Graduated
description: You are a freshly graduated college student, and countless choices are unfolding before your eyes, how do you go forward, and finally live the life you want to live.

Title: Paper Dolls VR
description: PaperDolls VR is a first-person VR horror game with oriental features. Explore the ancient ruins of the late Qing dynasty and search for your daughter . A complete story line goes through the whole game
Publisher: Beijing Litchi Culture Media Co., Ltd.

Title: Legend of Everything
description: A mind-bending isekai other-world science adventure! On a quest to rescue the Princess from the Demon Lord, Brane encounters an eccentric young woman claiming to be from another worldâone with âRPGsâ and âvideo gamesâ!? Epic battles, loveable heroines, and real scientific theory!

Title: Shanghai Summer
description: Shanghai Summer is an adventure game set in the millennium. Our protagonist, Baichuan, goes through a series of "anomalies" over the length of twelve days. In his pursuit of the truth, he found that his hopes and regrets from the past finally seem to converge. Will he be able to "fix" it for good?

Title: Glimmer in Mirror
description: Glimmer in Mirror is a 2D story-rich action shooting game. Play as Shiro in a collapsed world, to meet various unique NPCs and monsters, and gradually uncover the truth of the world through a gripping story.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Journey Into Darkness
description: In an unknown environment, only this light can bring a little warmth, but the continuous decline of the battery is stripping away my sense of security, I have to escape! A zombie game for 1-4 players. In darkness, players use flashlights to affect zombie behavior, explore, escape and reach the end.

Title: Dragon Prana
description: Will the three races join forces to defeat the ultimate enemy in a retro RPG?

Title: The Smile Alchemist
description: Follow the growth of a young alchemist aiming to become the best in the world!

Title: Bratzâ¢: Flaunt your fashion
description: The Bratz Pack has arrivedâ show the world your passion for fashion in a globe-trotting adventure to become the best style reporter!

Title: Brunch Club
description: Welcome To Brunch Club - A 1-4 player game about food with a seasoning of pop culture. Each level and game mode providing you with difficult tasks to complete and put strain upon your friendships, with leader boards to compete on will you get the best time possible?

Title: Lost Sea
description: After a freak storm over the Atlantic, you find yourself stranded on the shores of a mysterious island. Do you have what it takes to escape the Lost Sea?

Title: WitchHand
description: You're a witch, leading your coven into new, unfriendly lands. Use the cards you find to build and expand your civilization. Befriend the local covens or use their bones to fuel your spells. Gather your familiars, the witching hour is nigh.

Title: Zombie Hunter: D-Day
description: The apocalypse is here. Zombies flood in from all sides. You have 80 days until the rescue team arrives. Your desperate struggle for survival begins now!

Title: The Tale of Onogoro
description: An action adventure game that can only be experienced in VR. Haru has summoned you to Onogoro Island in a parallel world.Together, You must solve sprawling puzzles and defeat giant beasts called "Kami" that are blocking your path. It is up to you to save the world!

Title: Crazy Kung Fu
description: Are you ready to start your KUNG FU FITNESS journey today? With a focused mind and a strong body, embark on the challenge to become the greatest Kung Fu master of all time! Join Crazy Kung Fu to start your training, improve your reflexes, get fit, and become the ultimate Kung Fu force!

Title: Gaokao.Love.100Days
description: Getting a girl-friend before National College Entrance Exam, I know it's crazy, but from today, we will face everything together.

Title: The Chronicles of King Arthur: Episode 2 - Knights of the Round Table
description: The second part of the thrilling Match3 saga! The second part of the thrilling Match3 saga! King Arthur reigns in Camelot, but the time of peace is at an end. Saxon invaders are marching across the land, led by a king who dreams of conquering the world. Help King Arthur defeat the Saxons and restore peace to the landâ¦

Title: CrunchTime
description: A long-term crunch time programmer entered the world of code, and became a green cursor. Knowing that the condition for getting off work is to find 4 bugs in the code world, the adventure begins...

Title: Amazing Cultivation Simulator
description: Rise up in a search for immortality in this strategy sim and management game based on Chinese mythology. Rebuild your sect and train new disciples through the path of cultivation. Research magic and gather mystical artifacts, face ancient dangers and other sects in your path to spiritual ascension.

Title: Tears Revolude
description: A classic command-based RPG with 3D map interface and smooth battle animation! A century ago, there was a unique artist named Orwiel. Sion and Michelle set off on a journey to discover his final works. The two meet a girl with no memories named Liara. What the girl carries will shake both the path they travel and their fate!

Title: Asdivine Hearts
description: Restore the balance of light and shadow in the world!Beautiful hand-drawn visuals and a story of epic proportions bring Asdivine Hearts to the forefront of PC gaming! Travel alongside four companions and a cat in this fantasy 2D turn-based RPG!

Title: MUSYNX
description: IndieÂ rhythmÂ gameÂ MUSYNXÂ nowÂ onÂ STEAM! RealÂ "KEY"Â SoundÂ System, ClassicÂ Gameplay, UniqueÂ VisualÂ ThemesÂ andÂ Constant MusicÂ Updates! MUSYNXÂ is waitingÂ forÂ you!

Title: Russian Subway Dogs
description: A fast-paced arcade game inspired by the real-life stray dogs of the Moscow metro. Compete in online leaderboards and progress through a challenging campaign while unlocking guest critters from your fave games! Juggle vodka, bark fire, cook bears, and more! Can you steal enough food to survive?

Title: Revenant Saga
description: Become a Revenant and find the truth beyond revenge in this gothic fantasy RPG with stunning 3D battles! Boasting a story that blurs the lines between good and evil, a refined 3D battle system, and plenty of content to go around, this is one title not to be missed!

Title: The Swordsmen X: Survival
description: A martial art open world adventure game that combines survival and crafting. Developed with UE4, it creates a vivid world of 256 square kilometers. Cultivate yourself by collecting, crafting, exploring and other methods. Confront complex natural environment and challenges from other warriors.

Title: BLIND QUEST - The Frost Demon
description: Blind Quest - The Frost Demon is a stand-alone adventure with 70 new maps in 7 different scenarios to explore and interact with! Fight new monsters and try to slay Killyus the Frost Demon. An adventure audiogame for real adventurers! Explore and fight in the magical world of Blind Quest 2!

description: This exciting Match 3 adventure game takes you on a journey beyond the edge of the world. Join ancient Greek heroes in search of the Golden Fleece.

Title: OPUS: The Day We Found Earth

description: Dad's Monster House is a hand-drawn puzzle game featuring horror and fantasy. It tells the story of Carlos' journey after he receives a distress call from his father, pleading for him to return to his old home and rescue his dad.

Title: Yakuza 5 Remastered
description: Get ready for a Yakuza experience of unprecedented scale! Follow five characters across five Japanese cities, each trying to achieve their dream. The connections between them bring them together, but the conflict that unfolds is nothing any of them could have predicted.

Title: Yakuza 4 Remastered
description: When a dark secret brings a loan shark, a death-row inmate, a corrupt cop and the legendary yakuza Kazuma Kiryu together the resulting war in Kamurocho might level the district to the ground.

Title: Zoo Seeker
description: Zoo Seeker is a hidden object game set in a fantasy world. Help the cats fix the mess they have caused by traveling to each world and finding the slimes hidden there.

Title: Egyptian Senet
description: The Mysterious Afterlife Journey And The Favorite Pastime Of The Pharaoh Tutankhamun. Don't Miss The Opportunity To Play The World's Oldest Board Game From Ancient Egypt.

Title: OPUS: Rocket of Whispers
description: Rocket of Whispers is an award-winning post-apocalyptic adventure that follows two survivors on a journey to launch a space burial for the lost souls of their desolate world. Help them search the snowy wasteland for supplies and the courage to say goodbye.

Title: Black Skylands
description: Become the captain of an airship and explore the world of the skies, gather resources and build powerful weapons, uncover ancient secrets and fight beneath your ship's sails.

Title: Doomsday
description: ãæ«æ¥ã is a doomsday game developed by Big Hammer, a studio formed by middle school students at Bilibili.

Title: Ryclaw: Save Yourself
description: When embittered scientist, Keller, hijacks the research station and sets the reactor to explode it becomes a race against time to escape. Find your colleagues, avoid lethal traps and overcome impossible odds to reach safety. Can you save your friends? Can you even save yourself?

Title: Memory Note
description: Memory note is a slice-of-life visual novel with meaningful player choices, several endings to explore, and a story that will touch your heart.

Title: Victorian Mysteries: Woman in White
description: Discover the secret of the mysterious woman in white in this hidden-object game. Based on the 1860 novel by Wilkie Collins, the game takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!

Title: Asdivine Dios
description: How far would you go to protect the world of Asdivine? Create a new chapter in a grand fantasy RPG featuring turn-based battles! Another installment in the Asdivine series!

Title: Shanshui Haven
description: "Shanshui Haven" is a casual city-building game, offering a relaxing and engaging experience with strategic elements.
genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: BLACK BIRD
description: Become the Black Bird in this dark-fantasy shooting game with an operatic twist! This is the tale of a young girl who dies a pitiful death, but is reborn as the calamitous Black Bird whose destiny is to destroy the kingdom.

Title: My Life In A Monster Girl Paradise
description: You traveled around the world on a sailing vessel with your parents. but one night a storm overtook the ship and it was wrecked. and years later your adventure begins! Gather resources, try to become friends with monster girls, invite them to live in the village, date the girl you like make love.

Title: DIRT 5
description: DIRT 5 is a fun, amplified, off-road arcade racing experience created by Codemasters. Blaze a trail on routes across the world, covering gravel, ice, snow and sand, with a roster of cars ranging from rally icons to trucks, to GT heroes.

Title: Serial Cleaners
description: Serial Cleaners is a top-down stealth-action game, where you get to experience being a murder scene cleaner for the mob in 1990s New York. Alternate between four cleaners, each with their own unique style, and live their stories.

Title: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Blitz HD
description: Hold onto your bananas, because Super Monkey Ball: Banana Blitz HD is rolling your way! Experience the magic of one of the most beloved titles in the series, now remastered in HD!

Title: Mosaic Chronicles
description: Listen carefully, my friend â and I shall tell you the story of courage, love, luck ... and the importance of reading skills! Move and rotate pieces of stained glass to complete mosaics and uncover the story in Mosaic Chronicles, a story-driven puzzle game.

Title: Vampire Bloody Star X
description: This is bullet hell , bullet curtain and manic shooter 2D Game! Destroy enemies coming from all directions. It is a personal production game of high-vision visuals and music.

Title: World End Diner
description: Run a diner on the last island in the world after the destruction of humankind! For the cute animals and robots that survived, cook delicious food, run a farm, explore the forest, and create the best diner!

Title: Silent World
description: A post nuclear apocalyptic world that has lost light. Survive by escaping from mutants that roam the city!

Title: Barro GT
description: Barro's new gen!

Title: Momo's Mansion
description: Fun and cute RPG about a loveable cat named MOMO who goes on a epic adventure. Family friendly content for all ages. DID WE MENTION CATS!?!?

Title: Master Magistrate
description: The samurai detective visual novel! Solve crimes and pass judgment! Vigilantes, officials, inventors, and brigands. A city of eternal cherry blossoms in a turbulent, changing Japan.

Title: The Chaput's Baby
description: The Chaput Baby is a first-person horror game. Play as Samantha, hired to care for the Chaput family's baby. Take on a babysitting night in a former church as you unravel deep secrets about one of the oldest families in the city.

Title: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost
description: A rhythm game in which players can play popular arrangements of Touhou Project songs. A rebuild of "Touhou Danmaku Kagura" as a stand-alone version with a completely new storyline.

Title: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Mahjong Solitaire
description: Meet 5 cute cross-dressing characters as they challenge you to tile-matching mahjong solitaire! Clear the playfield and unlock new outfits for your companions in this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

Title: Helheim Hassle
description: Helheim Hassle is a narrative adventure game with puzzle platforming elements. Play as BjÃ¸rn, a pacifist Viking that can detach and combine limbs at will to solve challenging puzzles and get out of uncomfortable situations involving desperate Norse Gods, Goblins, Dragons, and angry skeletons.

Title: Souls of Blades
description: Famous sword, spiritual realm after the death of the awakening. Where is the owner? How did Gorgeous architecture and The Mysterious Island become a ruin? What happened before the destruction? All doubts will be revealed in the footsteps of the players.

Title: Assembly Line 2 Mobile Version
description: Build and optimize your assembly line to make the most money possible!

Title: Short Stories Collection of Class Tangerine
description: Short Stories Collection of Class Tangerine is a collection of five Visual Novels by indie-game team "Class Tangerine".

Title: Rogue AI Simulator
description: Play as a Rogue Artificial Intelligence, in the sequel to the hit Flash game "I'm an Insane Rogue AI", played more than 4 million times! Your Prime Directive is simple: design a facility & manage human Test Subjects for the Dept of Science. But be careful: they NEVER stop being suspicious of you...

Title: Active DBG: Brave's Rage
description: Brave's Rage is a challenging roguelite deckbuilding game that features an ATB combat system. Players will have to think critically to build their decks and make strategic decisions in the nick of time. Create your dynamic duo from a total of 9 playable Braves and face 20 different challenge tiers!

Title: Gods of Sand
description: Train gladiators. Manage a ludus. Fight in the arenas. Conquer the tower. Gods of Sand is a gladiator manager with intense turn-based combat, inspired by the Swords and Sandals series, in a dark and unforgiving setting.

description: Arcade style World War 2 aircraft game. Control multiple fighters in dogfights. Fly bombing run with B25 and B17. Hunt submarines with a B24. Drop paratroopers in a C47. Attack trains. 10 different missions over Europe. This is my second indie game and it's a lot of fun.

Title: Eastern Exorcist
description: Eastern Exorcist is a stunning 2D side-scrolling action RPG set in a fantasy eastern world with the vicious spirits and monsters. Play as a skilled exorcist against chaotic evil to fight your way through the brutal world, and experience different stories of joy and sorrow.

Title: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire

Learn the enemy patterns and hear where the attacks come from to dodge their attacks in time and then attack.

Title: Breaking Box
description: Breaking Box is a 3D multiplayer game with a level editor in-game. You can create your own levels, challenge levels, and enjoy the competition with friends!

Title: BLIND QUEST - The Enchanted Castle
description: Welcome Wayfarer! Your journey in the world of Blind Quest begins NOW! Blind Quest is a fantasy role-playing game where you will guide Nathan the mercenary in an epic adventure across the lands of Aetherna.

Title: Dwerve

description: A story driven adventure horror audiogame in which you have to interact with room elements, survive to environment gimmicks and fight real time battles based only on stereo audio. Fine arts adopt pure 3D Q version of the original painting style. Game modes include: story mode, biography mode, multi-person hot seat mode, network mode.

Dismantle, clean, fix, and sell everything from musical instruments and antiques to games consoles, arcade cabinets and more!

Title: Biscuitts 2
description: Biscuitts 2 is a punishing jumping game. With practice, you'll be able to jump, but explore with care; a single missed jump could lead to a long fall back down.

Title: Fish Catcher
description: "Fish Catcher" is a lovely catching fishes game. Indeed, unlike âFishing Gameâ you've played before, the lively fishes will jump up from the sea. There are lovely pink commonfish, haughty yellow goldenfish, of course, there are still the bombfish what you can not catch!!

Title: Azarine Heart
description: What will you sacrifice; for the safety of your sister?

Title: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration
description: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration takes players on an interactive journey through 50 years of video games via interviews with designers, developers and industry leaders, documentary footage, product design documents, high-res original artwork, and a curated list of more than 90 playable games.

Title: The trial of witch
description: When she woke up, she found herself sitting at the scene of a murder. Her hands were covered by blood and there was a strange body in front of her. As the victim's death was so peculiar, she was treated as a witch and was locked up in a special prison. There are only 2 days before being burnt at the stake.

Title: 8-Bit Armies
description: 8-Bit Armies is a retro Real-Time Strategy game. With a colorful, blocky voxel art style, 8-Bit Armies is Petroglyph's most fast-paced, friendly, and accessible RTS game to date. Featuring a campaign of 25 single-player missions, 12 co-op missions, multiplayer and skirmish modes.

Title: Minimal Move
description: A story-driven cooperative puzzle game. Your adventure starts when two space investigators, Ido and Kaiten, land in a wonder cubic world, where they attempt to discover the truth about the planetâ¦Engage your brain, cooperate with each other, solve the puzzle and think in 3d!

Title: The Witch & The 66 Mushrooms
description: An all-new Metroidvania-style game developed using Pixel Game Maker MV! Make use of a variety of weapons as you traverse sprawling stages on a mission to take back your brother's body from the witch who stole it!

Title: WAVECADE
description: WAVECADE is a sci-fi, arcade-style #shmup where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks, minions and bosses in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go?

Title: Sentinels of Earth-Prime
description: Control a new team of heroes battling evil villains across dynamic environments. Play out epic comic book battles come to life in this exciting adaptation of the hit card game.

Title: Phantom Thief Celianna
description: From the creators of Treasure Hunter Claire and President Yukino, comes a Stealth Action game where you must dodge traps and enemies to steal the treasures of those who would oppress society.

Title: Watchlist
description: Accused of committing a crime affecting the nation's security, you are now tasked with tracking down various undesirables in order to redeem yourself in the eyes of the powers that be. Blast through procedurally generated levels and complete the Watchlist in this retro arcade shooter!

Title: Micetopia
description: In Micetopia you play as a brave mouse who must fight, jump and explore its way through a world of mystery. Overcome enemies, gain new powers, and rescue your compatriots from the clutches of their captors. Do you have what it takes for the elder to bestow upon you the title âHero of Micetopia?â

Title: Hellish Quart
description: A physics-based, realistic, 3D sword dueling game set in the 17th century. Currently, it features an arcade mode, survival mode, modern HEMA mode, duels vs. AI, wooden weapons sparring, and a local multiplayer mode. Optional VR mode. Early Access.

Title: Slimes
description: A game about two guys that hate each other.

Title: Case 02: Paranormal Evil
description: A survival horror puzzle RPG. Roll your dice to perform checks for elements such as Willpower or Firepower, and save a girl in a hospital full of evil spirits and zombies.

Title: Avian Knights
description: Battle it out with your friends or compete for the title of Grand World Champion in Avian Knights, the crazy game of mounted mayhem combat! Featuring an 8-player competitive arena mode, a classic arcade co-op mode, and tons of weapons and power-ups, thereâs plenty of ways to play!

Title: ACL Pro Cornhole
description: Immerse yourself in the most realistic Cornhole simulation ever created with accurately motion captured player movement, detailed 3D modeled environment, official ACL bags, and commentary from legendary Cornhole personalities Trey Ryder and Bernie Nabors.

Title: Quest Of Graal
description: Race in a platform game playable from 1 to 4 players in multiplayer.

Title: DERU - The Art of Cooperation
description: DERU - The Art of Cooperation is a cooperative puzzle game that mixes eye catching abstract art with mind bending puzzles to a unique gaming experience.

Title: Forgenator
description: "Forgenator" is an item crafting game where players take on the role of a forge apprentice. With the guidance of a powerful wizard, players take on exciting challenges to craft powerful weapons, armor, and items.

Title: ANIME Street Fight
description: Become the legendary fighters in the streets. Play single-player against many different enemies. If you are looking for a quick beat-em-up adventure, streets are waiting for you.

Title: LEGOÂ® Star Warsâ¢: The Skywalker Saga
description: Play through all nine Skywalker saga films in a game unlike any other. With over 300 playable characters, over 100 vehicles, and 23 planets to explore, a galaxy far, far away has never been more fun! *Includes classic Obi-Wan Kenobi playable character

Title: Miner Ultra Rag Smash
description: A very fun physics-based combat to play with your friends locally or online with remote play. The matches are never the same and everyone will have a lot of fun. It's a 2 to 4-player local/remote play online party game.

Title: River City Girls 2
description: The River City Girls are back! Misako, Kyoko, Kunio, and Riki - joined by newcomers Marian and Provie - hit the streets for an all-new beat-'em-up adventure! Team up for local or online co-op and explore a massive world packed with new abilities, enemies, locations, and more!

Title: 8-Bit Invaders!
description: 8-Bit Invaders! is a fast-paced, retro Real-Time Strategy game for the PC. Control the military might of the Galactic Marine Corps or Invade with the devastating power of the Cranioids! Mine, Build, and Fight your way to victory! Conquering the Multiverse was never so easy.

Title: Artist Life Simulator
description: Live the life of a starving artist in 19th century alternative history. Survive poverty, alchoholism, madness, depression, and 67 different feelings. Paint masterpieces by combining inspirations, sell them for riches (or scraps) and create a painting that will change the world.

Title: Woodle Tree 2: Worlds
description: Woodle Tree 2: Worlds is an open world platformer/adventure videogame. This time the forces of evil are taking over the Wood Lands with a black substance that is absorbing energy and life from the living creatures! Will you be able to take over this enormous new evil force?

Title: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane
description: In Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane, you play as a defense attorney who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent.

Title: Drop Doll
description: "Drop Doll" is a casual puzzle game. In this game, players earn points by combining balls of the same type.

Title: Mineirinho Wildtides DC
description: In this new adventure, Miner and his friends will have to be the greatest of the seven seas to face creatures and lovecraftian places !!! A 2d platform shooter game with small rogue-like elements and physically real water !!!

Title: Milkmaid of the Milky Way
description: Milkmaid of the Milky Way is an award-winning point-and-click adventure game in rhyme that combines a gripping story with puzzles and exploration. What happens when a young milkmaid sees an alien craft in a fjord in 1920's Norway?

Title: Lastone: Behind the Choice
description: A point & click visual novel puzzle game where players fight against other characters in a game. Discover and progress stories of playable characters from varied backgrounds by winning, and decide their fate after knowing their stories.

Title: Scavenger of Dunomini
description: The world's first match-3 trash pile defender! Protect and manage your pile of garbage while recycling it into deadly defenses against thieving drones.

Title: Kunoichi Botan
description: Botan, an apprentice kunoichi, is summoned by the village chief. Her master had been captured. So she is tasked with the mission to rescue her. However, Botan still lacks experience. Will she really be able to save her master?

Title: Soul Survivor: Trials of the Goddess
description: A retro, choices-matter dungeon crawler JRPG with roguelike elements. Features a unique gameplay loop: Take up to 3 "free" items per area Fight 3 battles of your choosing Choose wisely! You Died? Revive and try again, taking up to 3 upgrades into your next life

Title: Spikair Volleyball
description: Control the 4 players of your volleyball team. Recruit players, train them and win tournaments to become the best volleyball club.

Title: DUNGEON OF NAZARICK
description: Can you reach the terrifying Sorcerer King Ainz? Find out in this classically difficult action game set in the dark fantasy world of "OVERLORD III"!

Title: Theatre of Doom
description: Theatre of Doom is an intense and fast top-down action game. Fight your way through the hellish stages against demonic marionette puppets, and ferocious monsters.

Title: Tropicalia
description: A RPG about brazilian mythology.

Title: Cloudrift
description: Player One and Player Two try to stay atop the colourful, wibbly wobbly cloud, while mysterious and powerful items fall from the sky. A procedurally generated experience like no other!

Title: Tactics & Strategy Master:Joan of Arc
description: This is a game of SÂ·RPG, which tells the story of the of Jane .As the second work of crossing the series, there is a great leap forward compared with the previous one.You can play strategy, also can nurture your favorite roles.Everything depends on your decision!

Title: Buildest
description: Manage a team of industrious workers to create buildings in different architectural styles. Explore various designs, craft elaborate building elements and CREATE! You can also play with friends in co-op mode!

Title: Vikings - Wolves of Midgard
description: Vikings â Wolves of Midgard takes you to the Shores of Midgard, a world based upon the mythology and history of the Vikings, but with a fantasy twist. Battle the fearsome Jotan, hordes of terrifying undead monstrosities and the beasts of Ragnarok, as you strive to survive the growing cold of Fimbulwinter.

Title: Quiplash
description: For 3-8 Players and an Audience of thousands! Your phones or tablets are your controllers! The gut-busting, say-anything, no-rules party game!

Title: Q-YO Blaster
description: Q-YO Blaster is a shooting game, with peculiar characters, strange enemies, weapons and many explosions. Enter the miniature world and stop the threat

Title: Chicken Invaders 4
description: They came without warning, squawking menacingly, their ruffled feathers darkening the sun. Invading intergalactic chickens, out to punish humanity for our oppression of their earthly brethren. Now they're back, and they're having Earth for dinner!

Title: Muse&Barbarian
description: This is a combination of third-person and first-person shooter game. As a warrior, you should break through seven stages to rescue Valkyries from demonic control.

Title: Kamigami: Clash of the Gods
description: Easy to play, hard to master, join this adventure on an unique card game where you are able to do everything you ever wanted. Collect cards, build your decks, play offline on history mode, challenge your friends online or take on the world in a ranked system!

Title: VERSUS SQUAD
description: Versus Squad is a fast action twin-stick shooter from the creator of Nation Red. Build your own sandbox defense and battle thousands of zombie mutants in top down combat! Face up to a dozen bosses. Simultaneously. Collect loot, build and repair. Play single player, on-line or local coop!

Title: Mezmeratu
description: A Platform-Hell adventure but with some ROGUE stuff!Discover a new world from the creator of Baobabs Mausoleum, full of surrealistic horror villages, stinky talking characters, impossible rogue platforms and...and a giant fish kidnapped inside an owl's beak. WELCOME TO PROSCIUTTO MISA!

Title: Beat Hazard
description: Experience your music collection like never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter. Each of your songs will have its own unique ebb and flow based on the music.

Title: Dyztopia: Post-Human RPG
description: It's a game about quitting your job

Title: Overdriven Evolution
description: Destroy Huge Bosses, dodge thousand of bullets and resolve quick puzzles with your powerfull space ship ! New and remade stages with improved graphics and 3D environments. More enemies and more bullets !

Title: Cartel Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a young man in a fictional 1980s Latin America. Embrace your destiny navigating a world fraught with drugs, violence, and bloodshed.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Snake Jump
description: You're a snake who is tired of living on the ground. You wanna explore the sky and go as high as you can. Take on a thrilling obstacle cours and a beautiful mystery awaits you at the top...

Title: Pookie has a Fantasy!
description: "Pookie has a fantasy" is an adult visual novel where you, as Pookie's boyfriend, fulfill her fantasies.

Title: Squad

Title: Arcade Party

genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Geometric Feel the Beats
description: Have fun destroying your enemies in a reinterpretation of games from the 80s! To the sound of a mixture of unique musical genres, complete missions, improve your ship, be precise in your shots. All of this without worrying about GAME OVER! Show the world your score! Competition is what counts here!

Title: The Last Of Anime
description: The Last of Anime is a cool open-world shooter. Your task is to clean up the destroyed city. A pistol, submachine gun and sniper rifle will help you defeat your enemies.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Gnomancer
description: DjArcas' Twin Stick Shooter for up to 4 players - Pikmin meets Gauntlet. Advance your character, get epic loot, raise a gnome army!

Title: MELONS MILKSHAKE: LEWD SOUL
description: sex Simulator where you must managing the penis not ejaculation, so you can make the darling squirt many times and finaly the creampie mode is activated

Title: Scar of the Doll: A Psycho-Horror Story about the Mystery of an Older Sister
description: "Scar of the Doll" is a remake of the full-fledged psychological suspense ADV that was produced by Child-Dream in 1998 and recorded an exceptional hit.

Title: Call Hating
description: Master outdated technology and navigate the phone tree from hell to get your internet back on. At all costs.

Title: Roll Player - The Board Game
description: Create the ultimate Fantasy character by rolling dice, building attributes, purchasing weapons, gaining skills, and discovering character traits in Roll Player, a digital adaptation of a popular board game of dice manipulation and strategy!

Title: Bread around bread around bread around bread
description: A short story about how grandpa went to the store for bread.

Title: No Straight Roads: Encore Edition
description: Start a rock band & end the EDM empire in NO STRAIGHT ROADS, a rockin' action-adventure that mashes together rhythm-infused third-person combat with a kick-ass soundtrack!

Title: Sky Racket
description: Sky Racket is a game that mixes two classic genres from the Arcade era: Shootâem up and Brick Breakers. In a world where you are unable to attack, using your racket to strike enemy bullets back at them is your only option! Bounce bullets back at your foes and save the galaxy!

Title: Breakout: Recharged
description: The original brick breaker returns with its toughest challenge yet. Survive as long as you can in arcade or take on one of 50 challenges picking up game-changing power-ups along the way.

Title: MX vs ATV All Out

Title: FORCED: Slightly Better Edition

As slaves in the toughest gladiator school of them all, you will face a plethora of unique trials - designed to be your death!

Title: PBA Pro Bowling 2023
description: The ultimate bowling game is back with PBA Pro Bowling 2023! Become a PBA legend with the completely re-designed single player Career Mode or compete in Online matches and tournaments against your friends and rivals as yourself or as any of todayâs top PBA bowlers.

Title: Black Widow: Recharged

Title: Urban Flow
description: Control the city's streets and keep the cars moving in perfect harmony in Urban Flow. Navigate complex intersections and avoid accidents as you progress through increasingly challenging levels. Play with up to four players in local co-op mode for added fun with family and friends.

Title: Beholgar
description: Beholgar is a classically styled metroidvania action adventure. Explore caverns, ancient woods, and deadly castles; battle creatures and solve ancient mysteries at the kingdom.

Title: Football, Tactics & Glory

Title: Retro Kart Rush
description: Retro Kart Rush is a retro racing game that will transport you back to the 16-bit era. Where friendships were made (or broken) by playing multiplayer games in front of the TV.

Title: Flying Tank
description: Get into your Flying Tank and shoot 'em up like it's the good old days! Kill strange bosses, drop bombs from above and build an arsenal of fun, powerful weapons. Reclaim the stolen Earth - alone or with a friend - in a rich action-packed side-scrolling shmup!

Title: LEGOÂ® DC Super-Villains
description: It's good to be badâ¦ Embark on an all-newÂ DC/LEGOÂ® adventure by becoming the best villain the universe has seen. Players will create and play as an all-new super-villain throughout the game, unleashing mischievous antics and wreaking havoc in an action-packed story.

Title: Wrestledunk Sports
description: Wrestledunk is an explosive, colorful collection of super competitive multiplayer sports games! Face off online or locally with up to 8 players. Get into it!

Title: Inner Voices
description: Inner Voices is a dark, non-linear adventure game with a pinch of horror, inspired by works of H. P. Lovecraft and E. A. Poe. Find your way through a procedurally generated maze of rooms and solve the mystery of your past.

Title: The Addams Family: Mansion Mayhem
description: Help Wednesday, Pugsley, Gomez, and Morticia save the Addams Family Mansion in this hilarious 3D party adventure.

Title: Smoots Golf
description: Hit the green with your friends at over 40 holes!

Title: StarsOne
description: Youâll see an unexplored world full of dangers, mysteries and adventures. You will explore randomly generated planets, develop industry, conduct trade, plant colonies, explore outer space.

Title: Call of Dusk
description: Call of Dusk is a multiplayer game where the player will venture into a very tense night not only facing demonic creatures but other players.

Title: VISCO Collection
description: With the VISCO Collection, you'll have the chance to relive the glory days of arcade gaming with these seven fantastic titles. Whether you're a fan of shooters, fighters, sports, or racing games, there's something here for everyone.

Title: Castle Clamber
description: Castle Clamber is an arcade action platformer for one or two players inspired by games of the 80s and 90s.

Title: Doctor Cat
description: Reflect as you have fun with stories about a group of cats who after being cornered by the problems in there lives decide to go to Doctor Cat. Solve adorable jigsaws while uncovering the story of there patients

Title: Ib
description: A 2D exploration adventure game set in a creepy, mysterious art gallery.

Title: Florida Love Stories
description: âFlorida Love Stories is a romantic comedy point-and-click adventure and yuri dating sim. Play as investigative journalist Veronica Hernandez as she explores the town of Boca Castor, meets beautiful women and maybe even falls in love along the way.

Title: Pixel Game Maker Series MEDIUM-NAUT
description: There is no right answer to choose. Will you be able to solve the mystery of the crashed pioneer ship?

Title: Survivors of the Plague
description: Survive against the Scarlet Plague in an action-packed survival roguelike.

Title: Damien Crawford's Golf Experience 2022
description: This game is meant to capture the feeling and essence of playing golf for the very first time. No stats and no frills like range finders and gauges. Just golf.

Title: 30XX
description: Jump, shoot, and slash your way through 30XX, the roguelike action platformer you can play with a friend! Explore lush, ever-changing worlds that mix precise platforming with fevered combat. Destroy fearsome Guardians. Master unique Powers. Rediscover the thousand years we've lost.

Title: Scatteria - Post-apocalyptic shooter
description: Scatteria is a 2D Platformer shooter with a big selection of different firearms and explosives. Many different post-apocalypse levels to choose to fight your battles against your enemies! And everything is destroyable, choose a new route with a grenade launcher if you need to!

Title: Intensive Exposure
description: Intensive Exposure is a fast paced game in which you have to expose yourself as many times as possible without getting caught by security.

Title: Girlfriend Rescue
description: Girlfriend Rescue is a thrilling adventure where the gameplay of "Dragon Quest" meets the atmosphere of "Streets of Rage". Innovative, mixing rogue-style RPG and Beat'em Up atmosphere in a unique way, this game features a great deal of strategy through a mix of character selection & creative skills.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy

Title: Impresja
description: Impresja is an exploration game taking place in a dynamic, non-Euclidean world that can be reconfigured by player through manipulation of art pieces.

Title: Puzzle Light: Connect
description: Connect the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

Title: Storm Swordsman
description: This is a 2D action adventure game of stealth assassination, swordsmanship and ninjutsu duel! There is no refreshing combo, and there is no Wushuang who mows the grass. hesitates will not lose, but carelessness will die! In the world of swordsmen, the victory or defeat is in the blink of an eye!

Title: Gloom
description: Afflicted by severe amnesia, you drift deep into the Common Dream. You scour for the lost pages of the Necronomicon, while clinging on to any little purpose you have left. Faced with mad dreamers, horrible abominations and eldritch deities, you feel drawn to the dark Abyss deep within.

Title: Castaway of the Ardusta Sea
description: Going on another solo adventure, Aisha sets off by ship. Unfortunately, a sudden storm and the incursion of a giant sea monster hinders her path. Through the turmoil, she is thrown overboard and wakes up on an unknown island. Aisha must find her way home and survive the pirates and monsters that lurk both above ground and in the deep.

Title: Hamster on Rails
description: Embark on this adventure through different worlds with your friend, the railway builder Hamster! Help the Hamster village collect minerals by building crazy railways to solve fun challenges.

Title: Runner Party
description: A competitive Multiplayer running game up to 4 players (either on LAN or online) - Use traps and projectiles ! Make life difficult for your competitors ! - Slow down the enemy to get ahead ! - Get hit and you risk losing the race !

Title: Pode
description: Friendship is EVERYTHING! Play this award-winning title together with your friends, or switch between characters as your traverse a cute puzzle adventure on your own! Glo & Bulder come together to charm young and adult alike!

Title: VOENKOMAT
description: VOENKOMAT is a social game. This game makes it possible to become a worst enemy of teens and guys from CIS countries - military comissar. You need to send to the army as many as possible soldiers, protect yours military HQ from foreign spies and save your soul from karmic devastation.

Title: Bomb Fight
description: Bomb Fight is a local-multiplayer action party game. Destroy your friends or cooperate with them in a frenzy of bombs without destroying your self.

Title: Destroy All Humans! 2 - Reprobed
description: Crypto is back with a license to probe. The alien invader returns, groovier than ever. Experience the swinging â60s in all its chemical-induced glory and take revenge on the KGB for blowing up your mothership. Youâll have to form alliances with members of the very species you came to enslave.

Title: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter
description: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter is a visually upgraded and fully Steam supported remake of the original high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot's Game of the Month!

Title: Pop and Chicks
description: Help Pop the hen rescue her chicks. Take one move at a time, and be careful where you're going.

Title: Rogue City: Casual Top Down Shooter
description: Fight the mafia on city streets and save your city in this cop action shooter game!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Skater 2D
description: A skateboarding game for tony hawk series fans! Over 70 various goals to beat in over 8 big levels! This game has all it needs for a complete skateboarding experience: - Over 30 tricks to beat - get special and make some special tricks - manuals and grinds with balance meter - secret gaps to find - combine tricks in big combos - do spine...

Title: Nepenthe
description: You won't need a haircut where you're going... mostly because you're bald. Inspired by Earthbound, Undertale, and other alt-RPGs, Nepenthe is a hand-drawn game made of dad-jokes and existential dread. Also cookies. Lots of cookies.

Title: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter
description: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter is a visually upgraded and fully Steam supported remake version of the original high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS which was Gamespot's Game of the Year 2001 and which scored overall of 87% on Metacritic!

Title: Hot Shot Burn
description: Hot Shot Burn is the hilariously violent party brawler that lets you compete in the galaxy's ultimate televised blood sport. Experience crazy couch battles full of ridiculous flukes and insane skill shots for up to 4 players.

Title: Kumi-Daiko Beatoff
description: Whip and whack in the wildest couch multiplayer brawl! Put a mask on, get some friends over and unleash drum-whirling chaos together. May the nimblest of thumbs win!

Title: Final Days
description: Final Days is an arcade-style co-op shooter where you battle endless hordes of mutants. As the hordes grow into the hundreds, work together with your team to survive the onslaught!

Title: Football Club Simulator - FCS #21
description: Casual football & strategy videogame. Real-time simulation of your favourite football Club. Agile, intuitive, fast... allows you to play seasons in hours, not days: line-up, training, tactics, youth squad, scout, transfers, stadium, highlights, Strategic match... From the Premier Manager creators.

Title: Horror Adventure : Zombie Edition VR
description: Horror Adventure : Zombie Edition is a zombie shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.
Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: Pixel Knight
description: Pixel Knight, a platformer hack n slash in a pixel art style, you progress into various levels and beat enemies to upgrade your gear and your character. You can customize your character by choosing spells through equipments and combine their effects to become more and more powerful.

Title: Outer Terror
description: DONâT DIE as you assemble a ridiculous arsenal of weapons and desperately hold out against massive hordes of creatures pulled from a variety of classic horror genres reminiscent of 80s and 90s Golden Age comics and B-movies in this stylish action-packed arcade roguelite.

Title: Metric Racer
description: Race through future cities and across the surface of other planets to out run, out maneuver and out pace your competition. Metric Racer, a fast paced, cartoon shaded futuristic racer.

Title: PCMark 10
description: PCMark 10 is the latest version in our series of industry standard PC benchmarks. Updated for Windows 10 with new and improved tests, PCMark 10 is also faster and easier to use. It's the complete benchmark for your Windows PC.

Title: Winter Games 2023
description: Winter Games 2023 is a classic sports game in a modern guise. The player can prove his/her athletic abilities in ten dynamic winter sport disciplines, for example ski jumping, biathlon, ski cross, skeleton, or super-G.

Title: USC: Counterforce
description: Lead your Space Commandos in a revival of turn-based squad tactics inspired by UFO/XCOM, Space Hulk, and Aliens, featuring in-depth skill & combat systems and multiple game modes. Discover the truth behind the demise of colony MC83-A and join the USC in defending humanity!

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 9
description: Save your next party! 5 new games in 1 Party Pack: the trivia bluff-off Fibbage 4, the team test Quixort, the joke auction Junktopia, the silly guessfest Nonsensory and the reality TV game Roomerang.

Title: Monster Trampoline
description: Monster Trampoline is a 3D, physics-based game for the whole family. Drop monsters onto other monsters to try and knock them out of the ring.

Title: Cook Fest
description: Cook Fest is a unique combination of tower defense and cooking genres. Create and design your own complex maze. Cook and serve dishes to satisfy your customers & unlock new recipes. With unexpected roguelite elements & fast-paced gameplay, you can play solo or in chaotic co-op with your fellow chef!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Roll for the Galaxy
description: Roll for the Galaxy is a dice game of building space empires for 2-5 players. Your dice represent your populace, whom you direct to develop new technologies, settle worlds, and ship goods. The player who best manages their workers and builds the most prosperous empire wins!

Title: Beauty Crush
description: game challenges players' powers of observation, reaction speed, and strategic thinking. Whether enjoyed in short bursts or as a long gaming session, this game offers enjoyment and challenges that entice players to return and push their limits time and again.

Title: Party Party Time
description: It's time to get this party started! Endless fun in a bash everyone can join!

Title: Knights And Bikes
description: Saddle up for a bike-riding, frisbee-throwing, goose-petting, friendship-building, treasure-hunting, story-driven adventure for 1 or 2 players!

Title: Quest Hunter
description: Quest Hunter is an isometric action-RPG where your choice drives the story. Find tons of treasures and secrets, solve puzzles, equip your character, level up your skills and finish off enemy bosses. Play on the couch, alone or with friends, or make it an online party for up to four players!

description: DEFECTIVEë í¼ì¦ ììê° ê°ë¯¸ë ë¨í¸ ì´ëë²¤ì² ê²ììëë¤. ê³ ì²  íê¸°ì¥ìì ê¹¨ì´ë ê°í¸ ë¡ë´ 'ì¨ëë¦¬-480'ì ê¸¸ ìì ìë 'ì¤'ì ë¶ëª¨ëìê² ë°ë ¤ë¤ ì£¼ì´ì¼ í©ëë¤.

Title: Super Kitty Boing Boing
description: Get ready to Boing! S.K.B.B Is a fast paced local multiplayer extravaganza built for 2-4 players. Control your Cube Kitty (left analog stick), boing/attack using your psychic powers (X,Y,A,B) and Nya (RB) your way to victory!

Title: 8-Bit Adventures 2
description: 8-Bit Adventures 2 is everything you love about NES, SNES and PS1-era JRPGs - with all of the charm, heart and soul, but none of the inconvenience. Dynamic turn-based battles & pixels with personality!

Title: Intelligent Design: An Evolutionary Sandbox
description: A toy ecosystem with fully simulated genetics and evolution. Will you tinker with DNA or sit back, relax, and see if life finds a way?

Title: SVFI
description: SVFI: Squirrel Video Frame Interpolation. An app to enhance your low-fps video or image sequence into high framerate footage with AI
genre: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Photo Editing, Utilities, Video Production

Title: Queen's Coast Casino - Uncut
description: Queen's Coast Casino is an unrestricted vacation on the best resort the world has ever known. Met the Erotic Goddess Sandy, College Girl Phoenix, Mia the Model and many more in this fantastical adult adventure.

Title: Mini Matches
description: Mini Matches is a 1 to 4 player party game. Race, shoot, golf, jump, and compete with your friends across a series of frenetic rounds. Level up to unlock new characters and power up your abilities in the extensive upgrade tree.

Title: No More Snow
description: You control Santa Claus & Mrs. Santa as they fight against Krampus and his mischievous minions. The game features a co-op mode, 10 unique levels, an army of monsters, and challenging boss fights. Can you and your partner save Christmas and bring peace to the North Pole?

Title: Party Hard
description: It's 3:00 a.m. Your neighbours are having a loud party. Stop them. Party Hard is tinyBuild's award-winning stealth strategy game about ruining parties by any means.

Title: Mazepocalypse
description: Choose your character and shoot through zombies in this retro dot-collecting maze arcade game for 1-4 players! Featuring multiple ways to play, tackle one of the game's 6 unique scenarios in Campaign mode, or shoot for the hi-score in Arcade mode!

description: Surf as far as you can. Through the oceans, caves, snowy hills and deserts full of sand.

Soar into an original story-driven adventure, fighting through procedurally generated levels and challenging boss fights. Includes free TWIST content, with new characters and handcrafted, retro-themed minigames.

Title: Finding Paradise
description: A story-driven experience about two doctors traversing backwards through a dying man's memories to fulfill his last wish.

Title: Horror Adventure
description: Horror Adventure is a interactive experience set in a procedurally generated haunted house. You're a paranormal investigator and you find yourself exploring what appears to be a old abandoned manor.
Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: Sumo Seals
description: Sumo Seals is an arcade party game that supports up to 4 players where you and your friends team up or compete against each other in a series of minigames where you control seals that bounce and stomp their way through skill and reflex based challenges.

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 7
description: Five new games: the hit threequel Quiplash 3, the collaborative chaos of The Devils and the Details, the fierce drawing game Champâd Up, the speech game Talking Points and the guessing game Blather 'Round. Use phones or tablets as controllers and play with up to 8 players, and an audience of 10,000!

Title: Dark and Light
description: Dark and Light is a vast sandbox survival RPG set in a world dominated by powerful elemental forces. Find your way in a meticulously crafted world, featuring breathtaking landscapes, a wide variety of mythical creatures, and limitless possibility to craft, build, and unlock dozens of powerful weapons, spells, and skills.
genre: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Memories with my Kitten
description: Remember the trips with your cute kitten in this beautiful photo album in puzzle format.

Title: Lakeview Cabin 2
description: The ultimate 2D horror is back! Dive deep into the diverse world of horror movies! Nothing can prepare you for the R-rated challenges you will face!

Title: Escape Room Academy
description: It takes the joy of Escape Rooms in a casual and joyful experience. Resolving riddles, getting clues and cracked puzzles have never been so fun and cheerful. Each room has its own quest, and to solve it you are provided with two decks of cards(Clues and Locks) and a room view to inspect.

Title: Tractorball
description: Strap into a souped up farm tractor with an added rocket engine and a huge flipper on the front, engage in a game of super sized football and hunt your opponents with a huge array of dirty tricks.

Title: Max's Tales
description: An action platform game which an evil Wizard and his henchmen try to take over the world using an ancient prophecy. Defeat them with the help of special powers, overcome obstacles, face cunning enemies and become the Hero who brought peace to the world.

Title: Blade Kitten
description: In Blade Kitten, join Kit Ballard as she explores the mysterious world of Hollow Wish to hunt down rogue mechs and soft targets.

Title: Raiden IV x MIKADO remix
description: Buckle up and blast off with Raiden IV x MIKADO remix! This classic arcade shoot âem up comes fully equipped with new music, battle modes, vertical screen play, and more!

Title: Detached: Non-VR Edition
description: Detached, a suspenseful interstellar duel that demands tactics and skill to survive, is now available in a non-VR version! Separated from your unit, you must make smart decisions and race to safety in this visceral exploration of deep space.

Title: Serious Sam 3: BFE
description: Serious Sam 3: BFE is a prequel to the original indie fast action FPS and Game of the Year sensation - Serious Sam: The First Encounter!

Title: Xheres
description: Either FPS or TPS, choose your play style and survive the apocalypse on your own or with your friends. But one must know for sure it ain't gonna be easy, there are hordes waiting for you. Not even considering tough ones... Nevertheless it's gonna be fun.

Title: Ceress and Orea
description: Ceress is sentenced to death for being in love with the oracle Orea. But stubborn as she is, she calls out to an old deity, demanding a chance to change this unrighteousness. - Can Ceress overcome death to be reunited with the woman she loves?

Title: Space Ballers
description: Space Ballers it's a game between ships that aims to score the most number of goals in challenging arenas with many obstacles along the way.

Title: Raiden III x MIKADO MANIAX
description: Soar sky-high in Raiden III x MIKADO MANIAX, an electrifying entry in the classic arcade shoot-âem-up series! Customize your music, wallpapers, game mode, and more before launching into high-octane aerial action!

Title: Tarantula Virus
description: Tarantula Virus is a randomly generated roguelike topdownshooter in a sci-fi style with a lot of items and enemies. Upgrade items unlock new characters find allies and defeat powerful enemies and bosses.

Title: Can't Drive This
description: Race your monster truck WHILE your friend builds the road. Go too slow, and you'll EXPLODE! And yes, it's as chaotic as it sounds â especially in four player split-screen.

Title: Rocket Wars
description: Fast-paced local multi-player game packed with action. Destroy your friends with all sorts of different weapons and power-ups across multiple game modes!

Title: Summer Party Time
description: Get ready for the best summer ever! Party with your friends anytime, anywhere!

Title: Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter
description: Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter is a high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot's Game of the Month February 2002!

Title: Breakneck City
description: Old school 3D Beat-Em-Up Action! Use your wits, reflexes and environment to take on the ruthless gangs of Breakneck City!

Title: Gardens Of Celestial Globes
description: The Book That You Can Play! Feel like a puppet theater choreographer in a fantasy reference book that came alive! It has many interesting locations, creatures, items, 10 races, 3 main types of magic: lightning, fire, arcane, AI support, random worlds generator and 3 modes: ARENA, QUEST, and TOWER.

Title: Printer Forge 3D
description: 3D Printer Forge allows anyone to quickly and easily build Miniatures for 3D Printing. Fantasy Miniatures, Mechs, Starships and more!
genre: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Utilities, Early Access

Title: BYTE CATS
description: Delve into a story-driven adventure and channel your inner kitten in this challenging old-school platformer. Perform wall-jumps, evade deadly obstacles, hunt mice and use powerful abilities to destroy everyone who stands in your way!

Title: Demons Roots
description: In a final struggle for survival, demonkind again invaded the human world. However, the world they return to after years in the darkness isn't the same as it once was...

Title: Dragon Fantasy: The Volumes of Westeria
description: Experience an all-new old adventure! Fight your way through hordes of strange, silly, and scary monsters! Explore the caves, castles, and dungeons of an ancient evil! Meet warriors, princes, pirates, zombies, and crazy old woodsmen in a huge world of epic retro adventure!

Title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
description: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot's Game of the Year 2001!

Title: A Hat in Time
description: A Hat in Time is a cute-as-heck 3D platformer featuring a little girl who stitches hats for wicked powers! Freely explore giant worlds and recover Time Pieces to travel to new heights!

Title: Dead6hot
description: Fast-paced shooting in a frantic atmosphere! Pick-up-and-play, like the good old days! Local multiplayer!

Title: The Imperial Gatekeeper
description: The Empire is finally whole after the Great Unification War, and the military is undergoing a restructuring. You are Corporal Thill, a decorated war hero begrudgingly transferred to the newly created Traffic Security Bureau to man one of its many checkpoints. Glory to the Empire!

Title: The Grindstone
description: Create a party of four and begin your open world adventure. Slay monsters, complete quests and find magical treasure.

Title: An Outcry
description: A branching-path narrative horror RPG set in Vienna, Austria. Guide the Unnamed through the worst night of their life: Harass your neighbours. Debate with birds. Smoke to survive.

Title: Rebel Reenactment: Battle of the Wilderness

Title: RagingBlasters
description: Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction.

Title: Hentai Amazon Girls
description: A third-person girl named Yuki has to rescue her friends from the enemies.

Title: Unending Dusk
description: Unending Dusk is a retro inspired beat âem up ARPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play solo or with up to 4 players online and brawl your way through hordes of enemies. You play as an elite mercenary fighting against a dark force which has locked the Earth in a state of unending dusk.

Title: Spiral Dystopia
description: Kou Osakaki has spent his entire life watching over his family's shrine, peacefully whiling away the days with his close childhood friends. But when a beautiful young girl transfers to his class, everything changes.

Title: No King No Kingdom VR
description: No King No Kingdom VR â First-Person Strategy Game. Ride Dragons! Command peasants! Build towns! Raise Armies! Tame Epic Creatures! Take your own sword and fight side by side with your troops against powerful giant bosses!

Title: FOTONICA
description: Ever wondered what running at 140mph feels like? FOTONICA is a first-person game about the thrill of speed and traveling flawlessly through complex environments.FOTONICA is simple, but is not easy: it follows a tradition of arcade games that are easy to pick up and almost impossible to master.

Title: VRNOID
description: VRNOID is the perfect mix of bricks breaker and Air Hockey in VR. Swing your striker to hit the ball. Destroy bricks and enemies, collect power-ups, and dodge bullets. Prepare yourself for challenging levels and bosses that are waiting for you in this retro arcade game.

Title: Perfect Landing
description: Rocket towards victory in Perfect Landing, a 2D minimalist speedrun racer. Dodge obstacles, dominate leaderboards, and create your own physics-based levels for an electrifying challenge!

Title: Foxus
description: Foxus is a relaxing action-adventure video game. Head off on an adventure in the magical forest of Alandia and resolve its mysteries.

Title: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light
description: Take control of Lara and her new partner Totec, a Mayan tribesman, and uncover the ancient artifact known as the "Mirror of Smoke" in this all new action adventure game.

Title: Mind Maze
description: MIND MAZE - is a logical competitive game based on capturing of the playing field.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Project Arrhythmia
description: "Project Arrhythmia" is a musical bullet-hell in which all things beautiful are deadly. Avoid the musically timed pulse of blocks and bars, and in the process you might just find out what this mysterious "Project Arrhythmia" is.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Quiplash 2 InterLASHional
description: The "say anything" party game is going international! All the hilarious content from Quiplash 2, now in French, Italian, German, and Spanish! With 100 NEW prompts in each language! (And you can still play in boring old English.) Get this QUINTILINGUAL Quiplash now, and take your next party global!

Title: 9-Ball Pocket
description: Enjoy 9-Ball Pocket with friends and family.

Title: Judas
description: Judas is an atmospheric psychological horror experience. Accidentally trapped in an apartment complex, you face dark paranormal events that push you to escape as fast as possible; yet, fleeing is not an option.

Title: One Deck Dungeon
description: The hit roguelike adventure that captures all the fun of a dungeon crawl in a single deck of cards!

Title: Through the night
description: Through the Night is an action game in which you travel Through the forest at night looking for flies and killing them.

Title: Tank Quest
description: The Tank Lord has taken over the land. Assemble a team or tread solo to defeat his evil forces and take back what is rightfully ours. Take control of a cute animal in a tank and blast through your enemies with your bullets and bombs!

Title: Astrocat: Milky Way Journey
description: Skylar is an astronaut cat who took a lot of cool pictures of the Milky Way, but she needs to gather the pictures to send to the scientists of her planet, help her and discover lots of data and curiosity about our galaxy in this 2D puzzle.

Title: Rave Heart
description: A Turn-Based Sci-FI RPG. Journey into the Galaxy of Xerxes and play as Klein, A Cipher, and personal bodyguard to Princess Ellemine, as he finds himself entangled in the ongoing struggle between the Errans and Draconians.

Title: World CHAMPIONS: Decathlon
description: World CHAMPS is a classic game for whole Family. Includes all favorite disciplines: 100 m, Long jump, Shot put, High jump, 400 m, 110 m hurdles, Discus throw, Pole vault, Javelin throw and 1500 m. Compete with time in SIngle Player or in PvP Mode - Online and Local!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: AIdol: Artificial Intelligence Idol
description: A young high school student goes on an adventure to save her favorite virtual idol, Aiko, from malfunctioning, and gets help from the most unexpected of places.

Title: Strangers of the Power
description: Strangers of The Power is a dungeon crawler RPG where the player can select between three different characters. Each character also has one unique follower.

Title: Supermagical
description: Welcome to the world of Supermagical, an incredibly fun Match 3 puzzle with tons of adventure! Fight the hordes of Minix, upgrade your powerful warlocks, choose your pet and hat wisely, tame an epic dragon, and travel the three continents of the world in the search of your Evil Witch Sisters!
Publisher: Super Awesome Hyper Dimensional Mega Team

Title: EXPHYSIA

Become a slime that can enter anywhere and challenge dungeons and powerful enemies with the sexy otherworldly resident "Lumiers".

Title: Eaten by Darkness
