Title: Frincess&Cnight
description: Frincess&Cnight is a single-screen puzzle-platformer game about struggle and love between Frog princess and Cat knight.

Title: TZOMPANTLI
description: TZOMPANTLI is a fast paced fighting game based on the comic books written and drawn by Mexican author Edgar ClÃ©ment, about Angel Hunters, Archangels, Nahuales, Mexican policemen, japanese robots and ancient demons as they battle each other trying to collect the price on the Head of the Archangel Michael .
genre: Nudity, Violent, Action, Indie, Early Access

Title: BlazeRush
description: BlazeRush is a dynamic arcade racing survival game with no health, no levelling and no brakes! You can assemble a team of friends to play in local or online multiplayer, choose a car to your taste and chase, blow up and cut off! Adapt your style and tactics to new enemies, obstacles and tracks.

Title: Dungeon Golf
description: Itâs mini golf in a dungeon (duh). Whack your way through lava, traps and monsters using a lute, your fists, or your own skeletal leg. You can even score a hole-in-none! Compete with your friends online or together to be the true Dungeon Golf champion.

Title: Betrayal
description: The West Marches is a corrupt land ruled by immoral leaders. You are one of four Knights with a lust for power, and in the pursuit of power, the end justifies the means. Betrayal. A web of intricate possibilities - but fair play isn't one of them.

Title: Cube Raiders
description: Cube Raiders is a fun puzzle game for one or two players where you have to combine groups of dice using the energy of MagnetoGloves. Thanks to this power, it is possible to push or rotate the dice to solve the levels while trying to avoid the traps of each temple.

Title: FukTopia
description: FukTopia is a post apocalyptic beat em up game.

Title: Gladiator School
description: Gladiator School is a Tycoon-style simulation game. You play as the master of a newly formed school for gladiators. Your job is to prepare and train recruits before you send them away to fight for their survival and entertain the crowd in the arena.

Title: Mealmates
description: Get your friends together or play by yourself. It's a minigame mayhem!

Title: Space Docker VR
description: A hardcore flight simulator for VR! Get in the cockpit, pilot a ship, and navigate hazardous environments on a journey to become an expert docker!

Title: Extreme Offroad Racing
description: Extreme Offroad Racing is ultimate 3D Offroad Racing game for all age group. There are 10 Racing Challenges in which player has to face different hurdles and difficulties to complete that challenge.
Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: Gun to the Zone
description: Find powerful weapons, fight monsters and discover the secrets of the Zone. Each weapon is different.

Title: My Life as a Cult Leader
description: After you lose your job and apartment, you're left with nothing. Forced to spend the night on a cold park bench, you curse your fate, only for a beautiful woman calling herself Shima Itsuki to appear and ask you to be a cult leader...

Title: Grass Cut
description: Grass Cut is a casual puzzle game where the main objective is to place the lawn mower in the correct place to cut all the grass.

Title: Spread: Transmission
description: Charge, spread and take over your opponentsâ cells in the turn-based casual strategy board game Spread: Transmission! Assert your dominance across various unique islands. The game is not over until the last charge is captured, so flip the board with a single thought-out move.

Title: JOIN tiles - Anatolian game to play
description: JOIN tiles - Anatolian game to play is a puzzle game whose aim is to combine broken tiles. Our game, which offers a pleasant and fluent gameplay, contains the works of Anatolian Tile art of hundreds of years.

Title: Snares of Ruin
description: You are detective Hank Anderson , and youâve just been transferred to another city to help solve a series of unusual crimes. Upon arrival, you are greeted with a gory scene and a revelation of several instances of a deadly disease that turns people into savage zombie-like husks.

Title: Rockets are Super Hard
description: You and your teammates (local co-op) are armed only with a guide book (100+ pages) to instruct you in your task of launching rockets. Work together to complete complex puzzles by entering codes, pushing buttons, flicking switches and turning knobs in order to win the game!

Title: Full Metal Furies
description: From the creators of Rogue Legacy comes a "true-cooperative" action RPG. FULL METAL FURIES puts an emphasis on team play with a unique combat system where everyone is important. Play on the couch, alone or with friends, or make it an online party for up to four players!

Title: Daydream Mosaics 3: Shards Of Hope
description: Help Juliette in her new venture onto foreign lands.

Title: Lose Ctrl
description: A game that literally makes you lose control by changing the way your keyboard and mouse work. Also: Dark humor in a sarcastic and philosophical story and a fun/chaotic/weird multiplayer that you can play with your friends.
genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Early Access

Title: Obscurite Magie: The Blood of Kings
description: Adventurer Lietta Fane's mentor and guardian Negel was murdered. She swears vengeance against his murderer and sets off to confront her destiny.

Title: Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure
description: BBR2: Island Adventure is a mayhem-filled kart-racer with an emphasis on split screen fun and game rule customization. Customize and save your own zany race rules for epic contests with up to 8 local players.

Title: Kingdom Of Explorers
description: Kingdom of EXPLORERS is an adventure RPG game for up to 2 players. Each player needs to explore, collect, manage shared resources to unlock new terrains, upgrade weapons to defeat the enemies, Bosses and save the Dwarves Hidden Island!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Hunter Girls
description: Hunter Girls is an action-packed 2D running platformer. Prince Alex has been kidnapped, and now three beautiful girls set out to rescue him. Each has a different reason for starting this adventure that you will discover as you meet each; adventurous Agnes, stern Kim, and shy Flora.

Title: Daedalus
description: Choose your champion and enter the Labyrinth, survive if you can. Hades has taken over the Labyrinth, forcing souls through an arduous trial to reach the afterlife. Do you have what it takes to succeed, or will you be doomed to guard the Labyrinth for eternity?

Title: Tasty Planet: Back for Seconds
description: Control a tiny ball of grey goo with the ability to eat anything smaller than itself. The more it eats, the bigger it gets! Eat rats, dinosaurs, gladiators, samurai, pyramids, volcanoes... Everything! Soon you'll be eating the entire planet.

Title: Braveland Wizard
description: Braveland Wizard - old school turn-based strategy game is back! The graduate of the Academy of Magic is ready for new adventures.

Title: Thief Town
description: Thief Town is a local multiplayer stealth action game set in a pixel-perfect rendition of the Wild West. Lurk in the crowd, emulate non-player characters, and achieve backstabbing victory.

Title: Rock of Ages 2: Bigger & Boulderâ¢
description: The greatest rock-racing, tower defense, art history game is back! Like the title says, Bigger & Boulder cranks up the surrealism and gameplay with chaotic 4P multiplayer, new time periods, and improved graphics, physics, and destructibility powered by UE4 to be, wellâ¦ BIGGER AND BOULDER.

Title: I commissioned some bees 7
description: I paid 10 more artists to hide bees in their artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

Title: Pixel Game Maker Series Biggerman.io
description: One left-stick rules them ALL! Biggerman - a simple yet satisfying action game for everyone! Easy but exciting combat in 1 min! Smash! Absorb! And Get Bigger!

Title: Shutshimi
description: ShÃ¼tshimi is a randomized shoot'em up about a muscle-bound fish with memory problems defending the seven seas. Defeat or navigate through waves of enemies, collecting new upgrades every 10 seconds that change up the gameplay as you battle your way through each of the game's bosses.

Title: Mystery Solitaire Cthulhu Mythos
description: Solve the most mystical layouts you've ever seen!

Title: Sel Mounta-Siege the Demon Castle
description: A single player RPG about directing a seven man party in their ongoing travels across a fantasy island in their efforts to save the world from an impending invasion!

Title: Just Shapes & Beats
description: "Just Shapes & Beats" is a chaotic co-op musical bullet-hell based on three simple things: avoid Shapes, move to the kick-ass Beats, and die, repeatedly.

Title: Smoots Summer Games
description: Smoot Summer Games is a sports arcade game for 1-4 players where you can play 18 athletics events.

Title: TENS!
description: Combining sudoku-style number puzzles and block-dropping gameplay, the aim of TENS! is simple: place dice on the board, make âtensâ in any row or column and clear the board to win.

Title: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD: Remake
description: THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD: Remake is a remade version of the game introduced in 1997 in arcade platform. A classic arcade rail-shooter receives a whole new entourage and gameplay changes to suit modern gaming standards.

Title: Unit 4
description: Fast paced platforming action, cooperative gameplay up to 4 players, an elite squad of agents with amazing skills, space travels, exploration, unique missions, fancy characters, incredible fights with huge bosses, trade, minigames and much more!

Title: Upwards, Lonely Robot
description: Simple to play but difficult to master, Upwards, Lonely Robot combines addictive âone more goâ gameplay with quirky and endearing art direction and an intriguingly cryptic story to bring you a gaming experience unlike any other.

Title: Evening Starter
description: A classic dungeon crawler RPG. When Ren Nosogi gets caught up in an incident that puts her in massive debt, she must use her skills as a Sweeper to take down an evil cult in order to pay it off.

Title: Little Friends: Puppy Island
description: Get ready for a pawsome puppy adventure in Little Friends: Puppy Island! Discover exciting locations, dig up hidden treasures, build and expand your holiday resort, and meet plenty of lovable little friends to care for on your very own un-paw-gettable, tropical island adventure!

Title: Heli-Cats
description: Dual elevation horizontal 2D arcade shoot 'em up co-op helicopter action!

Title: Seven Mysteries: The Last Page
description: A horror RPG story-driven game about a group of students from the only school in a small strange town.

Title: Cold Ground
description: Save the homeland of Dalina on an one-man army mission in this MSX-inspired action RPG.

Title: Mage of the Olekta Desert
description: Aisha takes on a mission to deliver a letter to a mage living in the Olekta Desert. To her dismay, she must traverse the dangerous ruins and defeat the bandits and cultists that roam inside... or somehow get through unnoticed.

Title: VARIABLE PICTOGRAM JUMP
description: An instant death action game with flying pictographs. Use jumping and zooming in and out to reach your goal! In addition to the single mode, there is also a mode that allows up to four players to compete.

Title: Super Toy Cars Offroad
description: Super Toy Cars Offroad brings the series off the beaten track and into the mud, sand, snow, and more! Find your own way in this fast-paced arcade racing game where you control miniature offroad cars that speed through amazing tracks populated with supersized everyday objects.

Title: Soccering
description: Soccering is the little sibling of Volleying! Thus, as another physics-based game, it also gives the players more control over their moves, delivering unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

Title: CASTILLO: The Nine Circles
description: CASTILLO: The Nine Circles is an FPS Collectathon. Collect power shards in each circle of hell to unlock new areas and progress on your quest through 9 diverse worlds. Embark on a journey through the circles of Hell, using unique abilities and weapons.

Title: Frayspace
description: Fraypace is a local multiplayer top-down space arena shooter for up to 8 players. Choose your fighter, select your weapons, and enjoy the fast-paced and physics-based action with friends or AIs in fully destructible maps.

Title: Matchpoint - Tennis Championships
description: The season starts now â grab your racket and become the worldâs next tennis champion! Your opponent is on the court and the crowd waits for a promising challenger for the grand finaleâ¦ Are you ready for Matchpoint?

Title: Leanna's Slice of Life
description: In a world where demons exist, Kain and Leanna live in a relatively peaceful village. The two eventually get married. However, due to the incessant demon attacks, Kain becomes careless and falls into a lot of debt. It'll be up to Leanna to help pay off Kain's debts in this Slice of Life RPG!

Title: Splendor
description: The OFFICIAL digital adaptation of the best-selling board game. ** ONLINE MULTIPLAYER NOW AVAILABLE !!! **

Title: City Climber
description: City Climber is a silly physics-based game about a floppy ragdoll climber, who has to save the world. Find your way through diverse hand-crafted environments and enjoy funny challenges full of falling and destruction.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports

Title: Oh...Sir!! The Insult Simulator
description: A Hilarious Insult-âem up in which players must verbally take-out their friends and family in different game modes. Assemble witty insults using different word strings, and employ combos, criticals, continuations and more to battle your opponents both offline and online across multiple devices.

Title: Cook, Serve, Delicious!

description: Uniquely satisfying puzzle game spread out over different graphical themes. The puzzles get harder as you advance, giving you the pleasing sense of accomplishment. Collect arcade tokens to unlock new machines. Over 125 levels for hours of play.

Title: Mineralis
description: Make an impact in the living, breathing world of Mineralis. Think, talk and fight your way through challenging combat and moral dilemmas. A hyper-meaningful JRPG with rich characters and unique encounters awaits your decision...

Title: Infinity Saga
description: You play as Tetra, a teenage boy living his days out as an college student. Tetra meets Autumn; a girl he first met on a social networking site and has grown fond of. Tetra is invited over to Autumn's house for the first time for a date night. However, the two find out that they are out of Autumn's favorite chips.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy

Title: The Musketeers: Victoria's Quest
description: Guide a young woman on her quest to become a musketeer in this thrilling arcade adventure! With lush visuals, a captivating story, and addictive time management gameplay, The Musketeers: Victoria's Quest offers an unforgettable saga of high adventure!

Title: GeminiArms
description: GeminiArms is a side scrolling 2D shoot'em up.

Title: Horror inside the forest
description: Plunge into the captivating realm of "Horror Inside the Forest," an exhilarating game that tests your bravery. Explore a mysterious forest, confront supernatural forces, uncover secrets, survive the darkness, and escape its shadowy embrace in this immersive horror experience.

Title: Sydney's World
description: Sydney's World is a family-friendly JRPG. Game focus is on the intersecting story arcs of a young girl seeking her father and a king in search of redemption.

Title: Star Dynasties
description: Take the reins of a feudal dynasty in a divided galaxy following the destruction of earth. Star Dynasties is a turn based, procedurally generated narrative of human drama and personal politics, mixed with a light empire management layer. Your choices. Your legacy.

Title: Chronicon
description: Use the magical device known as the Chronicon to travel into the souls and memories of fallen heroes to re-live their grand tales! Epic adventures full of loot and monsters await!

Title: Gigantosaurus: Dino Kart
description: Race around Cretacia as your favorite dino in a prehistoric kart championship almost as big as Gigantosaurusâs appetite!

Title: Magical Drop VI
description: Follow the story, battle a cast of whimsical characters, set new records, solve puzzles, engage your friends and family in local multiplayer, or compete against players from around the world through online play.

Title: A Shaman's Ballard
description: Explore the mysterious world of Erenblad to protect the land from demonic entities and perform your shanar to become the new master shaman of Aahkray in this tactical turn-based RPG.

Title: Summer Fling
description: You are entering your summer break before university begins. And what better way to spend a summer break than at the lake with two friends, will the summer become an unforgettable time or will it just fade away. Welcome to your Summer Fling.

Title: 4th Generation Warfare
description: As the leader of a nation, dispatch and control your team of characters all around the world to destabilize your enemies and establish your supremacy. All methods are fair game: hacking, sabotage, political interference, military strikes, corruption, treachery, assassinations, data theftâ¦

Title: Let's Cook Together
description: Let's Cook Together is a cooperative, family-friendly game for 2 - play with your spouse, kid, (grand)parent or friend.

Title: Colossus Down
description: Join forces with Nika, MechaNika, Agatha and the Great Bleeding Pig in this peculiar and crazy mission of destruction of everything that isn't cool.

Title: Mobile Forces
description: Mobile Forces is a first person shooter game where you battle against the opposing AI team or against your friends over a LAN network.

Title: Lessons with Chii-chan
description: Kouta, a timid university student is tasked with tutoring the outgoing yet dense Chieri to help her get through her exams. However, they couldn't be more different. Find out what hijinks ensue in Lessons With Chii-chan!

Title: REDSHOT
description: Multiplayer Update now available! Quick reflexes and clever strategies are required in REDSHOT, a bullet-time metroidvania where everything is deadly, but you are deadlier. Can you save the royal city from total destruction? ...Can you do it with style?

Title: VRMark
description: Is your PC ready for VR? Find out with VRMark, the virtual reality benchmark. VRMark includes three VR benchmark tests and a free-roaming Experience mode to enjoy with a VR headset or on your monitor.

Title: Pawn of the Dead
description: A 3D game based on chess, in the style of Battle Chess. What makes it a unique game is its mechanic: When a Black (undead) piece captures a White piece, that White piece turns into a Black one!

Title: Tinboy
description: Tinboy is a puzzle-platformer, with a massive difficulty level.

Title: Animaddicts 3
description: Animaddicts 3 is a punishing jumping game. With practice, you'll be able to jump, but explore with care; a single missed jump could lead to a long fall back down.

Title: Sweet Surrender VR
description: Sweet Surrender is a roguelike VR shooter in a dystopian megatower. Explore levels. Discover secrets. Maneuver through treacherous environments. Collect an arsenal of weapons, upgrades and explosives to mount a major assault on the machine overlords. Fight your way to the summit!

Title: Project Heartbeat
description: Project Heartbeat is the ultimate cute community-driven rhythm game, featuring music from top artists of the Eurobeat genre made popular by the Initial D anime and manga.

Title: Alone Again: The Countryside
description: You live in CaÃ§apava, in an isolated neighborhood, in the countryside. Mysterious creatures move around your house, you canât protect yourself. Reach them or they will reach you...

Title: Star Control I and II
description: Explore a vast universe with pulse-pounding action, side-splitting humor, and hair-raising plot twists in these 2 classic space adventure games.

Title: Merek's Market
description: Merek's Market is a chaotic crafting game about running a medieval shop. Take charge of your shop as you haggle, barter and craft your way through a comical single player campaign or team up with friends in couch co-op to supply the whole town.

Title: Kokoro Clover Season1
description: Plop down on the couch in your comfiest pajamas, grab a big bowl of cereal, and prepare to enter "Kokoro Clover", a 2D platformer inspired by Sunday morning Japanese anime shows of the past! Transformations, cards, dancing, and robots! Let's find out what this wonderful world has in store!

Title: Ruins Seeker
description: An adventurer named Quem is the first person to step foot inside "Heaven's Ladder" in 500 years. But not long after, she's cursed by a strange, shadowy monster. Now she must reach the top of Heaven's Ladder, and hopefully, break the spell.

Title: Falling Blocks
description: Score and survive!

Title: Ollie & Bollie: Outdoor Estate
description: A cute sandbox game about restoring an estate. Work with your (real or AI) friend Bollie to cut trees, catch sheep, build a shed and more in this outdoor autumn sandbox game.

Title: Max Twist
description: In this futuristic Xtreme Sport, you'll mount hover boards and spiral down eye-popping sci-fi tracks full of obstacles. Smoke speed records and set seamless twist scores to a heart-pumping soundtrack. Inspired by games like 1080Â° Snowboarding and F-Zero, Max Twist takes the concept to the space age.
genre: Action, Indie, Racing, Sports, Early Access

Title: King Pins
description: King Pins is a small scale real-time strategy game. Collect resources and expand your territory while defending your main unit: the king! If your king dies, you lose!

Title: Marabundle
description: Play a series of small games of multiple genres, each with a unique playstyle and visuals! Defeat skeletons, play cards, ride a train or fight aerial combat in this collection of indie games.

Title: Seed of Evil
description: Seed of Evil is an epic adventure to uncover the secrets of the Water City, Somonden. Follow Anna as she explores the upper and lower parts of the city to uncover the truth of the defilement plaguing its inhabitants. You won't soon forget this amazing story filled with mystery, drama, and intrigue.

Title: Zion Survivors
description: Customize your ship. Defeat or escape from chase enemies. Destroy city walls. Drive your ship to machine city. Begin to believe.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Star Control III
description: The universe is on the brink of destruction. Itâs up to you to embark on an epic adventure of strategy and diplomacy to save thousands of worlds from total annihilation. But no pressure, right?

Title: Undercat
description: Undercat is a non-restrictive 2D platformer with co-op and PvP modes. Help the Resistance to overthrow the Cats' tyranny and liberate the animal city!

Title: Infernax
description: Infernax is the adventures of a great knight who returns to his homeland only to find it plagued with unholy magic. Uncover the mysteries of the curse and face the consequences of your actions.

Title: Mark of the Void
description: Turn based RPG game with heavy reliance on strategy and item management. Inspiration from older rpg games with more punishing mechanics but more rewarding for patient and strategic players. Any type of player can play and enjoy, but the more dedicated and curious players will find more reward!

Title: Stellar Tactics
description: A Sci-Fi role-playing game featuring turn-based ground combat, space exploration, deep character customization and a massive living universe with over 160,000 star systems. Equip your ships with the best equipment you can find, gather a powerful crew of mercenaries and set out into the void!
genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Sword of the Necromancer
description: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Defeat the guardians to gain enough soul power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost.

Title: Sentinels of the Multiverse
description: You've never played a comic book like this! Control a team of heroes battling evil villains across dynamic environments. Play out epic comic book battles come to life in this exciting adaptation of the hit card game.

Title: Gravity Wars
description: Gravity Wars is an hardcore 90s Arcade local multiplayer game where you have to avoid waves of geometry entities.

Title: Rebels - Under the Spell of Magic (Chapter 3)
description: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 2. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

Title: Ultimate Summer
description: A mix of tower defense with classic shooter. Gather resources, place traps, build towers, and buy weapons to exterminate waves of United Forces of Heaven, Hell, Purgatory, Cthulhu, Carnivores and Aliens.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Archvale
description: Take up your weapon in this RPG bullet-hell world and embark on a journey to right wrongs from long ago. Only you can defeat the evil forces of the Undying guardians and reunite the world with the fabled Archvale.

Title: Ambush
description: Ambush is a party game up to 2-8 local players. Blend in with the crowd, spot other players among the NPC's, and slice them up with your freshly sharpened katana. Strategy and violence will be part of the game.

Title: The Legend of Bean
description: A mercenaries, Kaim! He is going to The Cadiaden Empire with His companion. On the way, they met a girl. She is the princess of the Titeserret Kingdom. So they took the job of escort her back to Titeserret.

Title: CyberTD
description: Mutant viruses threaten the very heart of cyberspace! You'll need the right tactics and the "help" of your support drone to build a deck of terrific upgrades in this innovative deckbuilding tower defense game packed with roguelite elements!

Title: The Oregon Trail
description: The Oregon Trail is back in a beautiful blend of charming pixel art characters, 3D environments, and cutting-edge lighting and visual effects!

Title: Freon
description: Freon is a hotseat cooperative shooter made in retro style. Enjoy with your friends and family members.

Title: Volleying
description: Tired of sports games in which the computer doesnât respect your commands? As a physics-based game, Volleying gives the players more control over their moves, as well as delivers unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

Title: Colors! Platform
description: Colors! Platform is a minimalist casual platform game.

Title: Caveman Warriors
description: Jump back in time and free your inner caveman. Smash heads in this local cooperative platformer game. Play solo or team up with up to 4 players. Inspired by games like New Super Mario, Joe & Mac, Metal Slug and Trine.

Title: Mana Go Round
description: Mana Go Round is a fun colour matching puzzle game for one to six players. Swap mana and rotate circles as you unlock characters in the story mode, take on challenges and puzzles, or play with friends and flood them with more mana than they can handle!

Title: The Eternal Castle [REMASTERED]
description: The Eternal Castle [REMASTERED] is a remake of the original "ETERNAL CASTLE" from 1987, with additional game mechanics, sophisticated sound design, polished 2-bit CGA animated graphics, and modernized game design.

Title: Ghost Croquet
description: A multiplayer platformer where monsters are controlled by the other players!

Title: Thunder Wolves
description: When this âwolf packâ strikes, you hear the thunder roll. The Thunder Wolves attack from the air. They are mercenaries, and the best helicopter pilots in the world. Every one of them is ready for action at all timesâand ready to fight evil, wherever it lurks.

Title: Hiding Spot
description: A difficult puzzle game about isolating yourself. Build a safe place, huddle up and get cozy.

Title: Mystic Melee
description: A great evil is threatening the galaxy, and only a team of arcane wizards can stop it. Master imaginative spells in this fast-paced physics platformer. Take your skills to the arena for fierce multiplayer battles.

Title: Aces of the Luftwaffe - Squadron
description: The Aces of the Luftwaffe have returned! Dodge a hail of bullets and face their fearsome war machines in bombastic air battles and boss fights!

Title: Dungeon Defenders: Awakened
description: Dungeon Defenders: Awakened is co-op Tower Defense combined with epic Action RPG combat. Youâre able to join forces with up to four players to take on a never-ending army of orcs, demons, and dragons! Are your defenses strong enough to save the world of Etheria?

Title: Arcade Sundown
description: Challenge the pinball people! Get shrunk down and play a mad points-scoring game inside pinball machines. Feint, travel, and tackle your way to high score glory â allâs fair under the glass.

Title: Battle Tracks
description: Unleash mayhem in Battle Tracks, a top-down action-adventure game with strategy and puzzle elements. Confront waves of enemies, play with or challenge friends, explore six unique worlds, and earn stars to advance through uncharted territories.

Title: Barony
description: Barony is the premier first-person roguelike with cooperative play! Adventure alone, or gather a party with iconic and unusual RPG classes to face off against the brutal dungeons. Test your resourcefulness, wits, and friendships, on your quest to lift the evil lich's curse!

Title: Alex Jones: NWO Wars
description: Play the OFFICIAL Alex Jones video game! A classic arcade shooter in which you play as Alex Jones and save the world from the evil globalist plot to turn everyone into bug-eating pod-dwelling libtards! Stay tuned for future bonus levels and characters...

Title: Jelly in the sky
description: Experimental approach to 2d artillery genre: everything is realistically destructible, because the game world is a physics simulation. There are no sprites in the game. All you see is made of dynamically simulated matter, and thus can be destroyed. This innovative approach opens the new layer of physics based gameplay features.

Title: Fallen
description: Story of a Father who is in search of his son who has fallen in a cave. You play as Father and fight with monsters,ghosts and deadly animals to save your son. This game has also local multiplayer which can be played upto four players.

Title: Super Volley Blast
description: Super Volley Blast brings back the spirit of the old-school super-fun sport games. Set your friends at the court with the powerful character editor and play with or against them in the story mode or in custom matches and tournaments. It's time to have a blast!

Title: Sole Saga
description: Fast-paced action rogue-Like survival with a touch of Soul-like, Challenging yet rewarding gameplay!, Battle with horde of monsters, Build your favorite hero with powerful skills and weapons in Action Rogue-like style, Fight your way to the epic boss and become a legend.

Title: Darius Cozmic Collection Arcade
description: Darius is one of the pioneers of the side-scrolling shoot 'em genre, and the Steam version replicates the multi-screen arcade experience with 4 different titles and 7 versions filled with aquatic-lifeform-themed bosses and epic, Zuntata-composed soundscapes!

Title: Battle Rocketsâ¢
description: What happens when two genres become one? Battle Rocketsâ¢, that's what happens! In this distinctive "SHMUP Fighter", each player chooses a sideâliterally! Play as one of twelve "Console-tan" fighters, and battle your friends...or foes! Are you "Head-to-Heady"?

Title: Conflict Of The Universe
description: This game is fully built around Steam play together. You and 3 other friends can control a star ship together and fight back enemies that you counter! Different star ships to control, each having their different movement and weapons, and some will have abilities.

Title: Opaline
description: In this 16-bit style RPG, Gallow and Liza are two teenagers gifted with great powers, and that destiny seems to persist in keeping away from each other, however their feelings drive them close. Can the two of them have what it takes to preserve the world from the rise of the Blight?

Title: M.A.C.E.
description: MACE is a classic space shoot âem up, inspired by the legendary Amiga games of this genre. Handdrawn 2D graphics in HD resolutions, parallax scrolling, explosion effects and optimized games mechanics, combined with the proven gameplay are transporting the âSpirit of Amigaâ in todayâs Age.

Title: Secret Photo
description: The player plays as a photographer, owns a photography studio, and works with beautiful models to take photos according to the customized requirements of clients, in order to earn commission.

Title: Elsia War
description: Join the fight to end the never-ending struggle of the Elsia continent. In this classic SRPG, enhance your units' strength with limited resources and achieve victory. Your choices throughout the game will impact relationships, life and death, and the starting forces and plot progression.

Title: Kappa Kanji Adventure
description: "Kappa Kanji Adventure" is an innovative and educational platformer game that combines the excitement of fast-paced jumping challenges with the intricate art of learning Kanji characters. Player embark on a thrilling adventure where their linguistic and platforming skills are put to the test.

Title: Bacon Man: An Adventure
description: Bacon Man! Your claim to the throne is in jeopardy! Expert platforming skills and sheer arrogance are essential for your adventure. Prove your innocence by destroying all who oppose you.

Title: Death Bind
description: Slay zombies in this topdown solo/coop shooter. Both characters are always back to back, try to synchronize with your partner.

Title: ASZG Project: A Shit Zombie Game
description: ASZG is a first-person shooter game with elements of horror, which you must survive the creatures generated by the harmful DK-19 virus. Explore and survive in a completely devastated, apocalyptic environment, encountering increasingly greater challenges as you progress through this atypical story.

Title: Zero-G Gunfight
description: Battle 1-3 friends in the fast-paced & frantic arenas of Zero-G Gunfight. Pickup different guns that change how you move & fight. Dodge enemy bullets & avoid unique hazards as you strive to be the last one standing!

Title: Stranded Deep
description: Take the role of a plane crash survivor stranded somewhere in the Pacific Ocean. Come face to face with some of the most life threatening scenarios that will result in a different experience each time you play. Scavenge. Discover. Survive.

Title: Machina of the Planet Tree -Planet Ruler-
description: Join Cram, Cronos, Retla, and Esty as they discover the secrets behind the great ruins that lie beneath their feet in this combo-based, action packed indie RPG!

Title: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw
description: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw is puzzle game in which you have to combine pictures of sexy anime girls into one image using jigsaw pieces. Relaxing gameplay with beautiful artwork and original lofi music will help you calm down after a hard day at work or study.

Title: Pang Adventures
description: The Pang series is a beloved collection of arcade video games from the early 90s. Guide two brothers on a quest around the world to save humankind from a massive alien invasion!

Title: Spirit Island
description: Become the spirits of the land, and defend the island from colonizing Invaders spreading blight and destruction! Your spirits work with the native islanders to increase your power and drive the invading colonists from your island in this strategic area-control game.

Title: I'm Awesome
description: How awesome are you? This is an action beat'em up game, where you can do a bunch of insane things with people! Punch and kick dwarves and grandpas, dance the Rumba, get the Unicorn Bazooka and have fun. Get a lot of points and reach the TOP!
genre: Sexual Content, Violent, Action, Casual, Indie

Title: Tsukisas Arena
description: The laboratory you've just joined as an assistant is on the verge of closure...! To save the lab, engage in a slapstick science adventure game (with occasional action elements) with "Prof. Shiika", who is a genius but a social misfit!

Title: Sky Force Anniversary
description: Legendary shoot-'em-up makes its way on the PCs! Abundant explosions, truly epic boss fights and beautifully crafted 3D environments are here to keep you entertained. Sky Force Anniversary offers single player experience and local cooperative mode for 2 players.

Title: Splatter - Zombiecalypse Now
description: You like top-down-shooter with a film-noir singleplayer campaign, challenging fights against zombies and monsters, gory splatter effects and destructible level environments? Fight your way through an apocalyptic city in the single player story mode, and test your skills in the survival mode.

Title: GAME.exe
description: You bought a PC that belonged to a suicidal developer, do you dare to run "Game.exe"?

Title: AI Olympius
description: Join forces with rebels and their technologies to have a chance to restore freedom in a world that has fallen to the uncontrolled dominance of supreme artificial intelligence.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Wizardry Squared
description: Wizardry Squared is a physics-based spell-crafting action RPG. You are a young wizard who must fight against the system for revenge and Wizardry Squared.

Title: Lies as a Starting Point
description: The story revolves around a conversation between the main character Kanata and the main heroine Nozomi on a train. The story branches into three different routes (junior high school, high school and university) by following Nozomi's past. The heroine and protagonist differ depending on the chapter.

Title: Bezier
description: Bezier is a dual stick blaster set inside a vast computer built deep underground. The story traces the principal's escape from this "Noah's Ark" gone wrong. A simple shooter on the surface, the deeper narrative pulls in his relationship between evolution and god, family and love.

Title: Adventures of Dragon
description: Unlikely hero is thrust into a crazy world and gets involved in a grand adventure!

Title: Red Zirion
description: Red Zirion is a retro shooting game with upgradeable attributes in the roguelike style. Game inspired by groups of heroes and animated series from the 80s.

Title: Lo-Fi: THEXNERXXM
description: ë¹ì ê³¼ë ë¤ë¥¸ ì¸ê³ì í¸ë¼ì°ë§ ì¹ë£ ì¼í°ìì ì§íëë ì´ì¼ê¸°. Title: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox
description: While imprisoned in Balduq, Adol is cursed and becomes a Monstrum. With his newfound powers, he must stop the Grimwald Nox from consuming the city.

Title: Kunoichi Demon Slayers
description: In the not-so-distant future, demons suddenly appear worldwide, leaving chaos and destruction in their wake. But amidst the despair, a group of ninja warriors emerges to defend humanity and vow to eradicate the demons.

Title: Snake vs Snake
description: Snake vs Snake is a fast paced snake game with an insane battle mode with power-ups and much more. Inspired by old classical Snake but with a much faster arcade pace and local multiplayer support.

Title: Bump and Run Racing
description: Get ready to tear up the streets and smash your way to the finish line! Bump & Run Racing is an ode to classic arcade racers where crashing opponents is not only allowed, but encouraged.

Title: Country Bumpkin Yutaka
description: Yutaka is returning from a month in the countryside at her grandmother's. She's excited to meet her friends and her sister again, but destiny has bigger plans for her...

Title: Volley Pals
description: A chaotic, cartoon style arcade volleyball game with local multiplayer for up to 4 people. It's designed as a party game with each level featuring different themes and mechanics.

Title: Border of her Heart
description: Border of her Heart is a VN about Border control.

Title: City Limits
description: Relax and build cities on a desolate tranquil island. Plan ahead to cover the island efficiently by combining buildings and cementing your place on a tile. Each turn an entity spreads, attempting to take over barren or unstable tiles.

Title: Trigger Tennis
description: Trigger Tennis is a third person shooter with tennis elements where rackets are swopped for guns and tennis balls for bullets

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 6
description: Itâs the wildest Party Pack yet, with the absurd deathmatch Trivia Murder Party 2, the weird word circus Dictionarium, the hidden identity game Push The Button, the comedy contest Joke Boat and the offbeat personality test Role Models.

Title: Daldos
description: Daldos is a game about the confrontation of two players, whose warriors came together in battle on board one drakkar. The game is about cold calculation. The game is about a single winner! You will have to fight with other players in the classic Viking game and show who is the best here!

Title: Tux and Fanny
description: A retro-inspired adventure puzzle game featuring multiple playable characters with interwoven storylines. Explore the natural (and unnatural) world for unique interactions and unlock items to aid you in your quest. There's nothing as simultaneously charming and strange as the world of Tux and Fanny.

Title: Trident's Wake
description: Trident's Wake is an intense co-operative twin-stick shooter in an unforgiving sci-fi setting. Join up to three other players to take back humanity's last hope - the colony ship code-named Trident â from an unknown race of alien invaders!

Title: Shield Impact
description: Shield Impact is an action survival game where a gladiator with only one shield will be challenged by rising hordes of enemies in an arena in ancient Rome.

Title: A Gummy's Life
description: A Gummyâs Life is a local & online party multiplayer with candy-coated physics-based fights. Choose your favorite gummy, customize it to your taste and show who rules over the sugar! Play with friends, family or AIs in multiple manic game modes or battle online - as easy as taking candy from a baby.

Title: Mayor of Defense
description: You are the village chief. Just when you thought the promised slow life was waiting for you... A monster that attacks without end! Almost a one-man operation! Black Village! Work to get materials, money and hire mercenaries to defend your village.

Title: Dungeon's Legion
description: You have been reincarnated as the Demon Lord in another world! Can you lead your forces to victory?

Title: VOSS Turbo
description: VOSS Turbo is a retro styled, on rail, twin stick shooter; with controller and keyboard support. Gameplay difficulty will climb as you visit and conquer new worlds. 30 stages to explore, with secrets to uncover, and bosses to whoop. Explore everything the multiverse has to offer!

Title: Byte Driver
description: Byte Driver, the 1979 revolutionary arcade racer, is back! Drive fast. Hack your enemies. Fight for your life. Survive if you can.

Title: Stigmata of Sacrilege
description: Upon her initiation into the Sisters of Exorcism, Sophie is blessed with a sign from the Lord that she is fated to become the next saint. Now, she must overcome her trials for sainthood and seek blessings from various holy sites.

Title: From Shadows
description: Action-platformer filled to the brim with blood, mayhem, and demons straight from hell! Play solo or with your friends in split-screen, upgrade your beast, and mow down hordes of enemies and their towering lieutenants.

Title: Polylithic
description: The Polylithic is a 3rd person crafting survival set in the Paleolithic/Neolithic era where the player crafts items, unlocks technology, discovers the world, builds bases, and can either grow the tribe and command the settlement or play the game solo.

Title: The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile
description: The followup to 2009's Dead Samurai, The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile is a combo-fueled, fast-paced, stylistic 2D action platformer that features the series' staple gritty, graphic novel-inspired art style, built on a new engine that allows for an even more visually gruesome experience.

Title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
description: Baldur's Gate and Dark Souls had a baby! A thrilling RPG game that blends real-time action with an isometric view, set in a world of magic and monsters. Players must navigate through dangerous dungeons, battle fierce bosses, and uncover ancient secrets to save Plamen from an impending doom!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Slice, Dice & Rice
description: Slice Dice & Rice is an indie fighting game with no health bars. Inspired by Bushido Blade, it revolves around the idea of finding an opening in opponents defense and ending the round with a single, clean hit.

Title: Undefeated
description: 16-bit RPG magic is back! Can you stop the Wastelands from spreading and overtaking the world? Play as Marcus, Bastien and Fela, 3 army conscripts with little liking for their new life, yet who find themselves engulfed in a mystery that could very well cause the demise of their nation.

Title: Soul's Spectrum
description: You wake up in a mysterious dungeon, full of dangerous traps and unlucky inhabitants. Brain cracking puzzles await you while a dark story will slowly unfold in this supernatural place!

Title: Street Heat
description: Four-player arcade racing with a sensational synthwave soundtrack! Take to city streets in local or online mutiplayer and race across hazardous tracks. Boasting an unbelievably satisfying handling model, Street Heat will have you punching the air as you master its seat-of-your-pants drift physics.

Title: Crash Time 2

Title: PixelJunkâ¢ Scrappers Deluxe
description: Clean up the streets of Junktown as a team of robot garbage collectors. Trash your opponents with up to 4 players or go it alone in this beat âem up thatâs also a clean âem up!

Title: Spirit of the North
description: Spirit of the North is a single-player 3rd-person adventure game inspired by the breathtaking and mysterious landscapes of Iceland. Play as an ordinary red fox whose story becomes entwined with the guardian of the Northern Lights, a female spirit fox.

Title: Black Mirror II
description: Enter a dark, captivating world as the massive evil of Black Mirror Castle is reincarnated with over 100 atmospheric locations to explore and 40 different characters to interact with. Will Darren's search lead him to redemption or the hell of insanity?

Title: 100ft Robot Golf
description: 100ft Robot Golf is a fast-paced arcade golf game where you get to control impossibly large robots on their quest for par. Just swing your golf club to smash even the tallest buildings out of the way - or into the way of your robot golfing buddies.

Title: Ellipsis
description: Ellipsis is an action-packed Avoid âEm Up with minimalistic, yet powerful neon styled visuals. Guide your ship through a mysterious universe while deftly avoiding hordes of roaming enemies, spikes, lasers and more.

Title: OVO Smash!
description: What happens when Memory Match meets Deathmatch? OVO Smash!

Title: Lode Runner Legacy
description: Lode Runner Legacy is the latest edition in the popular Lode Runner series. Players control âRunnerâ to recover stolen gold while avoiding enemies and minefields. Enjoy the ingenious balance of puzzle and action gameplay, an updated Voxel visual style and powerful game editors. Ver.2.0 Update is out now!

Title: Black Mirror III
description: Help Darren continue his search to uncover his clouded past. What do his torturous nightmares really mean? Who is the mysterious person that posted the bail to set him free? What demons lie waiting in the crypt?

Title: It's Six Random Characters and a Single Floor Dungeon, That's the Whole Game
description: A roguelike first-person dungeon crawler. Use a random party of six characters to get through a single dungeon.

Title: Redeemer: Enhanced Edition
description: REDEEMER is a intense Brawler where you will punch, hack and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms and even the environment.

description: A rich and challenging physics-based puzzle /logic /construction /programming game! Master ballistics, fluid mechanics, thermodynamics, chemical and nuclear reactions, use automation bricks, build structures, machines, vehicles, produce power, solve puzzles, pierce the fog and defeat CHR$!

Title: Blastboard
description: Billiards-like puzzle game.

Title: Dancing Cube
description: "Dancing Cube" is a multiplayer musical bullet-hell, where players must avoid red obtacles in a giant 3D cube that deforms to the rhythm of the music. Play in solo modes or challenge your friends to see who handles the beat better.

Title: Numina
description: Step through the 4th wallâ¦ into the world of NUMINA! An exciting adventure that fuses many classic RPG aspects, a character-driven story with player choices, a dynamic battle system, puzzles and towns waiting to be explored and other exciting locations.

Title: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 1
description: Welcome to the world of Lewd Idols! Butâ¦ What exactly is a Lewd Idol? Join Kairi, the shy aspiring star, and Ranko, her depraved self-proclaimed producer on this lewd journey! When she comes to, she finds herself, her friend Joe, and 9 other people trapped in a mysterious place.

Title: Space Elite Force
description: Gear up for an intergalactic thrill ride! Space Elite Force is a frenzied space-shooter packed with weapon customization and epic boss battles. Take command of your ship and fight for the survival of humanity!

description: ShotKill - Fight, impose your fps skill on different map

Title: Moto Racer  4
description: Choose from a variety of daring riders and get a taste of adrenaline riding freestyle or on the race course. Show your opponents what you can do with your best drifts and tricks! Show of your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

Title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom - Rehydrated
description: Are you ready, kids? The cult classic is back, faithfully remade in spongetastic splendor! Play as SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy and show the evil Plankton that crime pays even less than Mr. Krabs.

description: Play alone or with friends! A co-op personality test about exploring an ancient, occult world in 5 days. How will you be remembered?

description: Experience a relaxing atmosphere from the comfort of your cozy room by solving small 3D puzzles inside collectible gachapons, and find the original shape of things inspired by Rubikâs style.

description: Follow a young Kewtian called Starter as he barrels through tons of boss fights, explores colorful environments, and meets strange characters in this action-packed Metroidvania adventure!

Title: Mineirinho Shooter DC
description: Miner is back and he called his very beautiful friend Lil' Pauline(Paulistinha) to enjoy a new adventures , they need to overcome the threat of space gluttons !!! Very cool and fun physical shooter style game, a unique game mechanic experience !!!

description: Blast your enemies! Create the ultimate build! Travel to the edge of space, in this epic rogue-lite action packed bundle of chaos inspired by slay the spire & FTL.

Title: harmony
description: out maneuver your opponent without letting them leverage your own pieces against you. play against your friends or the computer to see if you can bring balance to the board.

Title: Timberman VS
description: The game loved by millions of players all around the world - Timberman, now has a brand new, polished axe! Timberman VS - available on PC and consoles, featuring a cross-platform play! Gather your friends and prove that you are a world-class wood chopper!

description: CV Maker makes writing professional curriculum vitae easy. We provide all the tools you need to write a high quality CV that will get the attention of hiring managers. Our career experts track the latest trends in job and talent search practices. We can help you write a CV you can use to apply for jobs and share on social media.

Title: Webventure
description: Webventure is a enchanting two-player co-op game. Join cute spiders on an extraordinary journey. Collaborate, spin webs, and overcome challenges together. Unleash creativity, build a strong bond.

Title: Musical Reflex
description: Musical Reflex is a game as its name suggests where you can test your musical reflex by having fun or trying to improve yourself and try to be the best in the ladder. The principle of the game is pretty simple, press the right keys at the right time all this enbiencer with a music chooses.

description: A roguelike shooter set in a post apocalyptic world, with dynamic narrative happening along your journey. Your goal is to go back home to your wife and kids. But the journey back home is perilous and full of danger. Be careful, your actions and choices along the way could leave you dead.

Title: Harmony's Odyssey
description: Harmonyâs Odyssey is a 3D fantasy adventure puzzle game set on mythical dioramas full of riddles, perky creatures and magic. Embark on a fantastic journey through remote fabled lands tangled by a rowdy cat and bring peace to its inhabitants.

Title: Definitely Sneaky But Not Sneaky
description: Definitely Sneaky But Not Sneaky is a twin-stick action game. Unlock items, customize your loadout, and complete over 200 levels solo or co-op!

Title: Song of the Myrne: What Lies Beneath
description: Explore the island of Namok and its dungeon, both of them full of adventures, dangers and big bosses. Craft new armors, weapons, potions, etc... Meet the crazy townfolks and discover the secrets that lie beneath Namok.

Title: LYNE
description: Deceptively simple. Infinitely complex. LYNE is a minimalist puzzle game that will knot your brain as it calms your soul. Connect the shapes. Fill the board. Lose yourself in the interflowing paths of LYNE.

description: Great Houses of Calderia is a Feudal Grand Strategy game focusing on family dynamics & stories. Use your family strengths to compete against rivals to rise in the ranks of Calderia - produce, trade, scheme, bribe, and battle to build your legacy of power!

Title: Successful business
description: Successful business - A meditative game that will help you relax. You just started a new job and received your first order!

Title: Amaya's Lost Soul
description: Welcome to AMAYAâs LOST SOUL. In this 2d Action Game you play as Amaya the daughter of an all and mighty great âCREATORâ the leader of the out raiders. You Amaya are tasked taking down a kingdom in this choice driven 2d action platformer.

Title: RetroWar: 8-bit Party Battle
description: RetroWar is an 80s arcade multiplayer party battle! Compete against up to 15 of your friends on a very large couch in 7 different games, all inspired by 8-bit classics, each with multiple levels. Customize the games with level editor and mod tools.

Title: Iron Disco
description: A parody of 80s' action films. The game is set on a tropical island. Captain Juan and Dr. Lee challenge the Dark Lord and plan to take over the planet with their army of soldiers, zombies, robots, and creepy monsters.

Title: BOOBS SAGA: Prepare To Hentai Edition
description: Imagine that you're a young woman with some tasty curves; and it can only mean one thing - you're a perfect sacrifice to the Boobs King! Avoid traps, fight monsters or hide from them, solve puzzles, dance. And remember: the main goal is to save your BOOBS! Boobs Saga - is a satirical action.

Title: Critter Crunch
description: Using Critter Crunch's 'Food Chain' mechanic, players will eat their way through a smorgasbord of levels and gorge on a feast of modes, including Co-op and Versus multiplayer.

Title: Cyber Mission
description: Side-scroller, with beautiful 2D pixel art, addictive shooter gameplay, classic levels and weapons that will let you perform a symphony of destruction of the alien base in the black eye galaxy.

Title: Umineko: Golden Fantasia
description: The tag-team fighting game based on the original "Umineko When They Cry" series, finally released on Steam, in English and with improved rollback netplay!

Title: First Racer
description: First Racer - Arcade racing. Compete, overtake, conquer. Upgrade and customize your cars. Embark on a journey from city cars to high-speed supercars. Join the race, alone or with friends, and immerse yourself in a world of incredible speeds.

Title: Magic Runes
description: Magic Runes - An exciting 3D game with adventure elements. You have to go on a dangerous adventure across a mysterious island full of ancient dinosaurs. Your goal is to cleanse the lands of darkness and return peace and tranquility to these lands!

Title: Soccertron
description: Practice soccer and other sports the way they are meant to be played: sitting on a couch with your friends! Soccertron is a local multiplayer sports game for up to 4 players with a simple premise: Kick the ball or your friends to win the match!

description: Mow down thousands of night creatures and survive until dawn! Vampire Survivors is a gothic horror casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against the hundreds of monsters that get thrown at you.

Title: Dark and Bright
description: This is a story about friendship, depression and the constant evaluation of life. Embark on the journey of your friends and learn about their dark and bright times in life - and yours, too.

Title: Sumoman
description: Sumoman is an adventure puzzle platformer with advanced physics, destructible objects and the ability to reverse time. Solve various physical puzzles, trying to keep the unstable Sumoman on his feet in challenging environments.

Title: Achievement Collector: Cat
description: Achievement Collector: Cat in this 2d action / shooter you play as a woman who protects her and her bag against cats. shoot the cats with arrows to protect yourself and your bag

Title: DAGURI: Gambling Apocalypse
description: DAGURI: Gambling Apocalypse is an open world gambling simulator. You must help âDaguriâ pay the debts he racked up during an unintended gambling spree. Roam the world, bet on gambling mini-games, and make some money!

Title: Pixel Car
description: Check your reaction by running two machines on the screen at once. Collect as many bonuses as possible, without bumping into the obstacles of any of the machines.

Title: Lost Remnant: Roaches to Riches
description: A Point & Click Management game of Incomprehensible Entities, Survival and Discovery. Inspired by SCP and Cultist Simulator, with Cosmic Horror elements.

Title: Bloody Rally Show
description: Welcome to Bloody Rally Show - a head-on smash between frenetic top-down arcade racing and hyperviolent reality TV. genre: Action, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports

description: ð¼Being a cat is sometimes so frustrating! Just grab a gun and shoot some furballs. Catnight is an online shooting multiplayer game with many surprising modes. No game will ever be the same. Team up or not it's your choice. Just smashcat your opponents!

description: Acceleration of SUGURI 2 is a lightning-paced duel-style shoot'em'up from Orange Juice, featuring all favorite characters from the SUGURI universe.

Title: Snake Effect
description: This is a very cool role-playing Snake game. Our design focuses on the combat experience of each character, spending a lot of time adjusting scene effects, skill effects, sound effects, and game difficulty. Now each greedy snake has 8 different skills.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: ConnecTank
description: ConnecTank is an action game for one to four players where you step inside a big honking tank. Link conveyor belts together, craft ammo, and put out fires as you battle rival tanks to help Finneas Fat Cat deliver packages. Build new tanks and take jobs in an ever-changing world.

description: Critter Kart is an action-filled racing game featuring a variety of fluffy critters. Players can earn pointstreak rewards as they race to gain access to more powerful abilities. Players may race alone, or with up to three other friends in splitscreen matches.

Title: zoku sonohigurashi vs touhou universe 2
description: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. The shocking work that appeared in 2016 finally appears on Steam! * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

Title: CometStriker DX
description: CometStriker DX is an arcade action shooter featuring dodging, strategic power-ups and intense boss fights!

Title: College Kings 2 - Episode 1
description: College Kings 2 is the highly anticipated sequel to the popular choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. Dive into a world of parties, sex and love as a college freshman and make your wildest fantasies come true.

Title: Project Bridge
description: Project Bridge is a fun roguelike co-op endless runner that can be played in couch mode or multiplayer adventure with up to 4 people. Gather resources, build bridges over procedurally generated levels, upgrade your character's skill set and run as far as you can before the void swallows you!

Title: Rubber Bandits
description: Rubber Bandits is a criminally fun multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. With 8 action-packed game modes, players steal, brawl, and dash to the finish line with the most loot to win!

ONLINE sci-fi Multiplayer ZOMBIE game.It's 2030 AC, Beings from planet Venus are back and they declare WAR to humans with a deadly virus. Use ultimate military weapons, make body parts fly, clear the area from deadly hordes, Great amount of action to play alone or with at least 4 friends.

Title: Volume
description: Pure stealth action and infinite level creation from the award-winning studio behind Thomas Was Alone. Enter the Volume to halt Gisborne Industries' corruption and train the masses to rob from the rich. Features weekly content updates in curated Staff Picks section.

description: Construction Simulator has returned â larger and more impressive than ever! Fulfil your ambition to become a successful construction entrepreneur by establishing your business from scratch, assisted by your mentor Hape.

description: King ân Knight is an arcade platform game that takes place in a medieval fantasy world. Play solo or co-op in this adventure inspired by the games of the 16-bit era.

Games mainly lean on point scores ,speed runs and survival, all to give you the player a sense of pride and accomplishment!

description: No Man's Sky is a game about exploration and survival in an infinite procedurally generated universe.

description: On your marks, get ready to race with Blaze, Pickle, Crusher,Â andÂ moreÂ MonsterÂ MachineÂ friends! From Axle City to the Monster Dome, the world of Blaze is yours toÂ explore.Â Race at blazing speedÂ for theÂ championship orÂ play with up to 4-players in split-screen mode!Â Â

description: Lead a rebellion against tyranny in this open-world, survival sci-fi RPG game. Utilize alien technology to explore, build bases, craft, and farm. Prepare for an unequal combat to rescue humanity from tyranny and a mysterious deadly virus.

Race against the clock, fight wildfires, pirates, and extremely annoying monkeys as you travel around the world and through time. Play online/local co-op and pvp or play solo.

description: In this 2D sci-fi pixel art adventure, you can mine, craft and fight your way through an almost endless universe full of procedurally generated planets.

description: Swap tiles to reveal 5 characters with 20 NSFW jiggle physics images respectively. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

description: Fate, love, death... Can the enigma be solved? ãThe VII Enigmaãis a character-driven sci-fi mystery visual novel. Set in a shadowy world of dystopian conspiracy, you must defy the fabric of reality, navigating the desperate path to the 'true end' against the tyranny of time itself.

Title: GeoJelly
description: GeoJelly is a platformer where you are limited to jumping to escape the laboratory. You'll face the challenge of accurately measuring your jumps to land where you intend to... given you endure the difficulty of the test chambers. To unlock levels you have to collect diamonds.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Strategy

Title: Motorbike Garage Mechanic Simulator
description: Become a professional bike mechanic and develop your business doing something you love. This comprehensive, technical simulation is all about choppers â the manliest motorcycles in the world. Exchange parts, service bikes and assemble them from scratch!

Title: Boxing School
description: BOXING SCHOOL! Take control of a boxing gym in the 80s. Youâll hire the boxers, teach them to fight and climb the ranks. Management game made by the developers of Gladiator School.

Title: Celestial Hearts
description: Celestial HeartsÂ is a yuri jRPG featuring an ATB battle system and the story of a heartbroken young elf and an angel seeking her life's purpose.

Title: Spellslinger
description: Harness the power of the elements and gather spells to defend yourself against hordes of enemies! Dozens of spells with unique functionality and traits that grant unique abilites and powers to aid you in battle. Stand your ground, Wizard!

Title: The Solitaire Conspiracy
description: We need your help, Spymaster. Join a world of near-future spies and take on a supervillain in this supercharged take on classic Solitaire. Precision engineered for replayable espionage action.

Title: Quantum: Recharged
description: Dodge and encircle your enemies in this neon-drenched revival of the one-of-a-kind arcade classic!

description: Serious Sam is back! And this time it's REAL!

Title: Uurnog Uurnlimited
description: Enter the wacky & whimsical world of Uurnog Uurnlimited! Explore a silly, puzzle-filled land full of cubes, bombs, weird people & adorable animals â then steal them all! Play single player or co-op as you jump, grab, throw & teleport your colorful collection back to the Save Room.

description: Can you make a difference with only one bullet? Guilt Battle Arena is a frantic, local multiplayer party game for 1 to 4 players. Make room on your couch for friends, pick an insanely cute character, and turn the competition up to 11!

Title: Obludia

Title: Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator
description: Enter the World of Diesel! Grab some of the biggest four-wheelers. Trick these trucks, flip them for a profit or race against your friends online. This can go hard or this can go diesel!

Title: Robotry!
description: Platforming is much harder when you don't have a jump button! Walk, jump, climb and parkour by directly controlling each leg of a confused baby robot. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, share a multi-legged robot, or compete against friends in minigames!

Title: Path To Gaea
description: Path To Gaea is a turn based puzzle-adventure that follows a simple story between good and evil. Take on the role of Kitsune, solve all the puzzles and discover the secret of Gaea's Crystal.

Title: RPG Maker VX Ace
description: RPG Maker VX Ace improves on every aspect of creating your very own epic adventure. An extremely powerful editor, Ace supports multiple tilesets, offers full control over autoshadow and has a very flexible features system.
genre: Adventure, RPG, Design & Illustration, Education, Web Publishing, Game Development

Title: Hero Trial
description: Hero Trial is a LOW POLY STYLE TOPDOWN light ROGUE game. Players play the role of medieval warriors, defeat monsters and surviveï¼

Title: Injusticeâ¢ 2
description: Build and power up the ultimate version of your favourite DC legends in INJUSTICE 2. This is your Legend. Your Journey. Your Injustice.

Title: Stage of Light
description: Get into the magical world of lighting design. Build huge concert stages in minutes with our carefully crafted tools. Control stage lights, motors or hoists with our integrated DMX controllers. MIDI control is available !

Title: Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix
description: Nickelodeon Kart Racers is back and weâre kicking it into overdrive! In Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix, you can select from 30 playable racers and 70 team members to assemble your ultimate pit crew.

Title: Lost Knight
description: You find yourself in deep dungeon, deep down under castle and you need to find a way up through levels of castle, rooms, catacombs and muÑh more. You feel that there is an exit... You should reach top of the castle using intersting but in same time simple 2D-platformer mechanics.

Title: Labyrinth
description: The aMAZEing Labyrinth now with a completely new look and at long last for PC: for more than 35 years, the simple and unique gameplay of the board game has inspired more than 20 million people worldwide.

Title: Sclash
description: Sclash is a plugân play 2D samurai fighting game full of tension where one hit is enough to kill. Play as a hand-drawn samurai in beautiful painted settings and fight your opponent in epic solemn duels where each move matters. Manage well your stamina, breath and take your time to land a deadly hit.

Title: 8infinity
description: 8infinity (8 infinity) is a dynamic and rhythm game where the player reaches eights â8â - levels of infinity.

Title: PAW Patrol The Movie: Adventure City Calls
description: Big city,Â bigger adventure!Â The PAW PatrolÂ must save Adventure City fromÂ Mayor HumdingerâsÂ selfish schemingÂ â andÂ theyÂ need YOUÂ onÂ TeamÂ PAWsome!Â

Title: Archon Classic
description: Inspired by chess, but adding combat that YOU control, Archon was the original Battle Chess. You must try to outmaneuver your opponent using teams of fantasy creatures or monsters in this epic struggle of Light and Dark.

description: Biscuitts is an arcade game.

Title: Riverbond

Title: Improbable Soccer

Title: GUNGUNGUN

Title: Lost Alone Ep.1 - Sorellina

description: Squarena is a skill-based party game with an emphasis on physics combat. The game mechanics support ease of entry with a high skill ceiling. Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends who the best colorfully decorated square combatant is? Now is your chance!
