description: Wizards Tourney is a party game for up to four players in which different wizards from around the world compete against each other to show who is the most skillful and astute. Test your magical talent and use all your tricks on your rivals to become the best wizard!

Title: Freak Hunter A Retro Type
description: Embark on a nostalgic adventure with Freak Hunter A Retro Type and relive the excitement of old-school platform games. This unique game allows you to become a hunter in a world of zombies and mysterious creatures, whether in single-player or co-op mode.

Title: Crawl
description: Crawl is the local multiplayer dungeon crawler where your friends control the monsters! Battle through dungeons and power up your hero - if a friend kills you they take your place and itâs their turn to crawl. It's a race to gain enough XP and loot to take on the hulking final boss!

Title: The Cathedral: Allison's Diary
description: Two years later from "The Hospital", you are interested in visiting the place where Rachel and Alfredo should have been buried. "The Cathedral" is the second chapter of the Allison's Diary horror saga. In the sacred cathedral of Sant'Andrea there is something frightening waiting to be discovered.

Title: Mystical
description: You are a novice magician at the end of his studies. During a course on the opening of doors at the temple of the Great Wizard, you have clumsily cause the disappearance of all the phials and scrolls that he had so carefully classified over many years.

Title: GameGuru MAX
description: GameGuru MAX is a 3D game-maker that makes the creation of your game simple, quick and easy â no coding required! With all the tools and assets you need in one place you can start making your dream game in minutes! Dream it â Build it â Play it
genre: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Education, Software Training, Utilities, Game Development

Title: Moe Mekuri SP
description: The goal of this game is to turn all the panels to face up. You can choose the level stage from EASY, NORMAL, and HARD. However, in order to play the NORMAL stage, you need to have passed all the EASY stages, and to play the HARD stage, all the NORMAL stages.

Title: Sumerian Blood: Gilgamesh against the Gods
description: A chess like board game, where the units step on the same tile, they go into a real time battle arena. A diverse unit types, each with their own abilities, based on Sumerian mythology.

Title: Avalanche 2: Super Avalanche
description: The award winning arcade platformer! Race to climb falling blocks as you dodge lava, dragons, and space chickens? Fast-paced retro goodness!

Title: LuGame: Lunchtime Games Club!
description: A games clubâs without membersâ¦ or games?! Who is this crazy robot girl? Why am I being harassed by this cute bully? Life may not have a controller, but it certainly feels like a big game!

Title: ANTE
description: Negative space block-stacking. Test and improve your spatial reasoning from two perspectives. Think on your feet, turn obstacles into paths, and practice balance to survive without crossing the caution line in this elegant arcade-puzzler.

Title: Raiders Of The Lost Island
description: Raiders of the Lost Island is a LOCAL co-op party game where up to 4 players compete in looting treasures from a sinking island, while building a boat to survive the final wave.

Title: Escape From Mandrillia: Local Asymmetric VR vs PC
description: Local VR vs PC horror game: 1 VR player controls a lone robot trying to escape an underground lab; up to 2 PC players control giant alien monkeys. Customize your experience with gameplay modifiers, ranging from tense survival stealth to brutal nonstop action!

Title: Gun Brothers
description: "Gun Brothers" is a frantic top down shooter for 1-4 players.

Title: Nippon Marathon
description: Crazy, physics-driven, four-player marathon across Japan. Combining classic racers like Micro Machines and the insanity of TV's Takeshi's Castle, smash through offices and shopping malls and hurl fruit at your opponents in a party game unlike anything you've played before!

Title: Winged Sakura: Endless Dream
description: Discover. Build. Defend. Survive. Escort. Open endless doors, discover endless new rooms, and defeat endless robots. Build towers, form contracts, gain new allies, and survive the Endless Dream.

Title: King's Table - The Legend of Ragnarok
description: In this modern take on an ancient board game similar to Chess, one side must defend Odin against an onslaught of attackers as he makes his escape to one of the corners of the board. Use sharp strategy and tactics to help Odin reach safety before he is caught defenseless between multiple assailants!

Title: Boing Bang Adventure
description: Boing Bang Adventure is a 2D arcade game in the style of the classic arcade game "Pang" Face almost 50 levels, in 8 different world in single player or in local co-op!

Title: Samurai Vandalism
description: The land of Yamato is filled with cruel rebels, oppressive nobles, and dangerous monsters. Fight as a Hozuki samurai to bring justice to the land!

Title: Green Project
description: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

Title: Gravitar: Recharged
description: The cult classic Gravitar has been Recharged. Complete missions in each solar system, navigating a variety of challenging environments, each with varying levels of gravity that will test your skills as a pilot before unlocking new solar systems to explore.

Title: Fleeting Iris
description: Ayame is a beautiful girl from Japan that is living a carefree life in search of happiness. One fateful day, she met Robert, a CIA agent who was in Japan during a mission. They become engaged and move to America together. However, not all is as simple as her previous life!

Title: Loopindex
description: Test your wits on the unique âloop mechanicâ with single player or co-op multiplayer.

Title: Squirrel Sphere
description: Recreational Rodent Rolling feat Spherical Squrrels

Title: WaveCrash!!
description: Head-to-head puzzle brawling action! Match blocks to send waves at your opponent! Dodge their waves or crash them head-on to survive. Unleash unique super attacks and explosive Hype Mode to tip the scales. It's a back-and-forth struggle for arcade puzzling dominance!

Title: Chevalier Historie
description: The fate of a captured princess lies in the hands of a single woman. Using the power of the spirits and a variety of items, the female knight Jeanne must explore the kingdom that's been thrown into chaos to save Princess Lily in this classic-style action RPG.

Title: GuardGrave
description: GuardGrave is an old school styled game in the vein of BurgerTime. Players must close the coffins on each stage before the sun comes up. 7 Worlds, 7 Bosses and 37 Stages of co-op monster bashing mayhem!

Title: Deep Space Gardening
description: In Deep Space Gardening, up to 4 players work hand in hand to grow plants, which are then sent to planets who need help to recover their ecological system. Unique gardens and game elements, a local and online mode guarantee fun for casual and ambitious players of all ages.

Title: VOYAGER
description: Come with us now on a journey through music and space... To the world of VOYAGER â¯â A minimalist, relaxing & atmospheric experience to chill out to for a while.

Title: CoWorker
description: Local co-op tower defense game set in a factory with zombies.

Title: Stubbs the Zombie in Rebel Without a Pulse
description: Be the Zombie. Kick A** and Take Brains.

Title: Fox Girls Never Play Dirty
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. While traveling in the country of Stivale, Ryunosuke bumps into a fox girl named Serena. Before long, he's brawling with the police, and he gets wrapped up in a movement to reform the country.

Title: Alpaca Ball: Allstars
description: Football with Alpacas! Bring the cup home in this hilarious and chaotic physics-based party game. Play with up to 8 players in versus mode, or tackle the career mode either solo or in 2 player co-op! Peru-ve yourself on the Picchu and win those Machus!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports

Title: Platypus Adventures
description: An action packed, third person adventure about a Platypus uncovering a cosmic mystery! Explore an epic story based on Australian animals and landscapes.

Title: Wall protection
description: Protect the kingdom wall. Summon mighty warriors! Each type of warrior has its own characteristics, some attack from afar, some slow down, some heal.

Title: ConSPYration
description: In this showdown of stealth, ConSPYration is the party game of frantic espionage! Sneak around the guards and perils of each stage, collect the briefcase and race to the exit. But beware - rival spies can swipe the briefcase right out of your hands! Be quick to steal it back!

Title: Ling Hun
description: A 2D Platformer Game were Jumping is not affected by gravity (that's what happens when you got your soul stolen). Master the jump to succeed in every level. Enjoy the classic Pixel Art with a mix of Asian ink style in the Background. Change the pace of the game to adapt it to your gamestyle.

Title: Tricky Typing
description: Compete against your friends in this Absolutely Ridiculous Typing game! Using every single button on your controller (and then some), your typing skills will be put to the TEST as you type out each letter to compete in this Extravaganza >:)

Title: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
description: A Resource Management Adventure Game -- Play as Van, a demon lord who has had his power sealed, and has been banished to the world of mortals. Make friends and work towards regaining your former glory!

Title: Cyberpunk sex
description: Cyberpunk sex ð is a game with a lot of sex and quest elements. You can find sex on each step and can easily manage its variants.

Title: Family Tree Heritage Gold
description: Family Tree Heritage Gold 16 provides exciting, easy to use new features, including a new Descendants View, printing of background images on many charts, improvements to the ability to sync with FamilySearchâ¢ Family Tree, recording non-traditional couple relationships, and more!

Title: Space Otter Charlie
description: Adorable characters? Check! Makeshift weapons? Check! Otter dressed in a foam shark suit. Umm. Check?Â Join Charlie and his ragtag team of sea mammals as they jump, float, and rocket through Otter Space in this Zero-G Puzzle Platformer!

Title: Cheesecake Cool Conrad
description: Collect all the Ice Cream Crystals and marry Princess Cheesecake!

Title: The Heart of Darkness
description: Explore the Sanctuary of Darkness, a mysterious dungeon beneath the Kingdom of Haillard. Obtain the soul of the Cursed Saintess waiting in its depths and unravel the truth of this strange world in this sinister turn-based RPG.

Title: Brotherhood United
description: Pick your guns, grab your beer and blast your way through hordes of enemies on this run and gun game as a member of the Brotherhood who leaves no friend behind. Show your enemies that no one messes with the Brotherhood. Unite the Brotherhood !

Title: Racing Juke
description: Compete against cunning and tough rivals racers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

Title: skelets
description: skelets is a local multiplayer skeleton brawler: fight skeletons and plunder gems!

Title: Tales Of Polygonia
description: Tales Of Polygonia - a 2.5D souls-like RPG with crafting and survival elements.

Title: Centipede: Recharged
description: Blast bugs and chase high scores in this glorious revival of an old-school classic, all while jamming to a heart-pounding original score by Megan McDuffee. Play solo or tag in a friend for local co-op across 30 unique challenges or the endless arcade mode.

Title: Super Slam Dunk Touchdown
description: Assemble your squad, grab a ball and demolish the opposing team! All sports combine and up to 6 players compete in the ultimate sports mashup -- locally or with Steam Remote Play! 6 unique sports characters. Epic 3 player Season Mode. 6 player Quick Matches. All the sports and none of the rules!

Title: Lance A Lot: Enhanced Edition
description: Challenge your friends to a glorious duel of rocket jousting for up to four players! Settle rivalries and become the last knight standing in this fast-paced local multiplayer!

Title: Spirits: Ciel Bleu
description: Willard Rouse is an ordinary 17-year high school student who is often by himself. By accident, he discovered that he is a spirit bearer, one who could summon and use the power of spirits. After getting kicked out of Rainvalley Academy, he transferred to Ficaso Academy.

Title: SnakeByte
description: Snakebyte is a fast-pace Snake-like arcade game that will bring back couch-based multiplayer and make your friends scream 'BYTE ME!'. Plenty of bits for every snake.... or are there?

Title: Made to be Crushed
description: Use the map as a weapon and don't lose your focus! Made to be Crushed is a strategic and nervous local multiplayer shooter. Trap or be trapped!

Title: Chest
description: The story of ãChest ã is about Capulet, who has forgotten how to undo the spell after having transformed into a Chest for a time until found by Zong. Having turned back human with Zong's help, Capulet then decided to go on the quest to help those who have also turned into chests.

Title: Sunlight Scream
description: The hero moves to a new city. However, along with him comes a masked killer who begins to kill his friends one by one... Make decisions to build your adventure. Can you stop him before it's too late?

Title: PBA Basketball Slam: Arcade Edition
description: PBA Basketball Slam: Arcade Edition! This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features epic moves, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. Itâs basketball stripped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Title: F.E.A.R.
description: Experience the original F.E.A.R. along with F.E.A.R. Extraction Point and F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate.

Title: Shaolin vs Wutang 2
description: The sequel to Shaolin vs Wutang! Shaolin vs Wutang 2 is a INDIE love letter to Martial Arts and classic Kung Fu films. Made for casual game fans not intended for Hardcore Fighting Game players.

Title: Death Stair
description: Missing the days of split screen multiplayer or wanting to play with actual in-person friends in the same room? Death Stair is a local multiplayer stair climbing game. Play locally with maximum three friends and race to the finish while the fourth, armed to the teeth with an arsenal of unconventional ammo types, does everything to stop...

Title: The Hospital: Allison's Diary
description: "The Hospital: Allison's Diary" is a new horror virtual reality experience, putting the user alone in an abandoned hospital searching for the unknown with only the help of a single torch. You will face true fear in a way you had never thought possible.

Title: SUMETRICK
description: Sumetrick is a mind training minimalist design game that's chained to the symmetry. Simple gameplay - you need to fill gameboard in symmetry way by clicking on framed cells. Do that faster and be as good as Chack Knorris. But don't forget to eat sometimes...

Title: Dino V. Xeno - Tower Defense
description: Dino V. Xeno is a casual, straight to the point, yet deeply crafted tower defense game, where you can enlist 10 upgradable dinos, plus 14 additional special towers, to battle alien hordes. With randomized elements, 51 levels and 20-40 hours of gameplay, DVX is a tailor made for tower defense lovers.

Title: Northend Tower Defense
description: Unique Tower Defense game. Mix different builds, Battle with different Soldiers, Experiment with a lot of perks. Special zombies mode mixed in delivers new experience!
genre: Action, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Little Jack's Adventures
description: Join the adventures of Little Jack. You will need to solve many interconnected puzzles that involve finding keys, pushing crates in order to reach the exit door. The game will have 4 difficulty levels so that each person regardless of its skill level can enjoy this game.

Title: LEGOÂ® Harry Potter: Years 1-4
description: Build the adventure from Privet Drive to the Triwizard Tournament and experience the magic of the first four Harry Potter stories â LEGO style! Explore Hogwartsâ¢ School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, learn spells, brew potions and relive the adventures like never before with tongue-in-cheek humor and creative customization that is unique to...

Title: Bumper Tanks
description: Take control of a tank and dash into the fight in this couch multiplayer, fast-paced, twin-stick shooter game! Collect various power-ups to hook around the destructible environment and blast your friends with whatever it takes. Remember: One shot, One kill!

Title: Call fur Help
description: Call for Help immerses you in the exciting world of firecat firefighters. Save the city as a brave feline firefighter! Tackle fires, clear obstacles, and showcase your courage in cooperative mode with friends. Action awaits around every corner!

Title: The Language Game
description: The Language Game is a 2 player quiz-style game that will improve your vocabulary and pronunciation as you play. Our innovative system lets you learn from any language to any other language, so each player can learn a different language.

Title: F.E.A.R. 3
description: F.E.A.R. 3 delivers all the hallmarks that define the F.E.A.R. brand: terrifying paranormal experience, frenetic combat and a dramatic storyline.

Title: Charlie Murder
description: Itâs a punk rock apocalypse! Team up with your friends to lead embattled punk rock band Charlie Murder in their epic quest to save the world from rival death metalers Gore Quaffer and their legions of evil.

Title: Riding Seas
description: Climb aboard various, colorful and fun boats to prove your piloting skills in frenzied races with current cartoon graphics! Be careful in RIDING SEAS there is no room for chance!

Title: TOON
description: TOON is a First Person Shooter game.

Title: Trollhunters: Defenders of Arcadia
description: Explore the Trollhunters universe and save the world as Jim Lake Jr. in this action-packed game!

Title: Bacon Quest - Lovers' Beef Special Edition
description: Bacon Quest: Lovers' Beef is a light-hearted dungeon crawler featuring Syren a sexy succubus and her cute friend Aoi. Battle through each stage finding hidden gallery images, loot and hentai scenes.

Title: Jets'n'Guns 2
description: Jets'n'Guns 2 is a side-scrolling space shooter with insane levels of action and destruction. Travel the galaxies and unleash an arsenal of the deadliest weapons and devices to save the universe from its inevitable doom.

Title: The Black Heart
description: The Black Heart is a VS 2d fighting game in the tradition of Street Fighter or Mortal Kombat, where 6 creatures face each other in cruel battles with gothic aesthetic.

Title: Mana Spark
description: A challenging action RPG with deep souls-like combat and rogue-like elements. Explore a dreadful dungeon and fight smart enemies that will plan and collaborate between themselves to defeat you.

Title: Off-Road Paradise: Trial 4x4
description: Off-Road Paradise is the 4x4 trial game featuring the most realistic off-road experience under extreme paradisiacal and impressive environments created for you to enjoy from the first minute in the most spectacular way.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Sports

Title: Pocket Bravery
description: Inspired by classic fightingÂ games from the 90's such as Street Fighter, Fatal Fury and The King of Fighters, 'Pocket Bravery' channels the 'Neo Geo Pocket' aesthetic for a modernÂ fighting game with a retro twist!

Title: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2 - Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description: The girls are back! Join Kairi, Ranko, and brand new member Yuki in these two new lewd adventures at the beach and hot springs. Hotter encounters, hotter conversations, hotter scenes and lots of girlsâ love!

Title: Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition
description: Nongunz is a roguelite action-platformer. Battle grotesque creatures, kill quickly to maintain your combo meter, and rescue worshipers to become part of your idle army to buy upgrades.

Title: Perverts Society
description: Perverts Society is a simulation strategy game, where you become a leader of a Perverts Society and needs to balance three factions influences and manage your budget.

Title: Natural Soccer
description: Natural Soccer is a highly playable arcade soccer game with fast-paced action, accurate physics and intuitive controls, inspired by classics like "Kick Off" and "Sensible Soccer".

Title: Isle of Skye
description: Five clans are fighting to rule over the Isle of Skye. Only the chieftain who develops the best clan territory and trades wisely will be king!

Title: Space Overlords
description: After escaping imprisonment, begin a destructive rampage of galactic proportions to restore your honour and bring vengeance to those that betrayed you.

Title: BlazBlue Centralfiction
description: Combining a 2D fighting game with a visual novel, the BlazBlue series continues on with massive fan support! The latest installation, BlazBlue: Centralfiction, serves as the ending to the Azure Saga, revealing the hidden truth of the world!

Title: Quantum Flux
description: Quantum Flux is an old school style rogue-like following the Artemis. A prototype vessel aiming to save humanity from destruction, to do so it must find a way through a difficult and hostile universe to create a new home for the human race.

Title: Violet Kingdom
description: A single player RPG adventure

Title: 12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power
description: Help Megara free the hero and then accompany him in all of his adventures, including the forest of the Amazons and Mount Olympus in 12 Labours of Hercules III: Girl Power!

Title: Q2 HUMANITY
description: he smash hit game âQ REMASTEREDâ, which became extremely popular amongst users in Japan in early 2023, is now coming back! "Q2 HUMANITY" is finally available as Early Access! In "Q2" the sequel to "Q1" you can play as a character yourself. You can fly, jump, run, draw, grab, throw, and so on.

Title: Polymino
description: A fast-paced puzzle game for 1-4 players. Match blocks by color to build up combos and cause huge amounts of destruction!

Title: Signal Decay
description: Assemble a cyber agent team to infiltrate procedurally-generated bases in this co-op stealth roguelike adventure. Master highly tactical combat, a cache of cyber weaponry, and teamwork to save humanity from mind-control.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Rose Action
description: Players take on the role of a female secret agent and complete a series of manhunt missions.

Title: Axis Football 2023
description: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

Title: River City Girls Zero
description: Join Kunio, Riki, Misako, and Kyoko for bone-crunching, 16-bit, co-op beat-'em-up action - newly translated and released outside of Japan after 28 years! The original 1994 graphics, soundtrack, and gameplay are augmented with new motion-comic cutscenes, a new animated intro, and new music!

Title: Signal Ops
description: Greetings Officer-Cadet o249,Are you ready to be put to the test? If deemed worthy, you will be assigned as an officer in the shadowy halls of Facility 7C. You will remotely lead a squad of operatives on daring espionage missions to plant evidence, steal secrets, assassinate targets, and perform sabotage for the glory of the Dark Father.

Title: YAPP2: Yet Another Pushing Puzzler
description: A weird 3d puzzle game.

Title: Scars of Summer
description: A slice of life RPG. Due to family circumstances, Keita finds himself living with his childhood friend Ryoka for the summer. Explore a contemporary Japanese setting, and enjoy spending time with Ryoka.

Title: Prison Run and Gun
description: The recent events in a state prison, involving Jake from Team Hot Guns was a perfect moment for some prisoners to escape - you are one of them.

Title: Jigsaw Bestiary
description: Let's put the pieces together and meet amazing creatures. Here, the true mythologies behind the monsters are explained after solving each jigsaw. The beasts were illustrated by Alexandre Rocha (@semdizer) in his unique artistic style.

Title: Brave Alchemist Colette
description: Colette has been living a happy life as an apprentice alchemist, but when a mysterious stranger pays her master Priscilla a visit, Priscilla sets out on a journey. With her master gone, it's up to Colette to inherit the workshop and help those in need while also embarking on adventures of her own!

Title: Koatl the defender : The Lost Tunnels
description: Koatl the Defender, the Lost Tunnels is an action platform video game set in the Koatl the Defender universe, published by Codex Studio.

Title: Machine Gun Fury
description: On a bold and potentially dangerous mission to revive the classic Arcade military shooter. Fully loaded with addictive top-down and side-scrolling run-and-gun gameplay, pixel-perfect 2D graphics, explosive SID soundtrack and massive destruction! Fight on foot and in heavily armed vehicles.

Title: Supermarket Shriek
description: Join man and goat in this chaotic, award-winning couch-co-op adventure! Tackle outlandish obstacle courses, complete rewarding challenges and dodge deadly obstacles in a hectic race to the checkout! Packed with a frantic 38 stage campaign and 3 hilariously fun PvP party modes for 2-8 players.

Title: Balloon Chase Journey
description: A cute art style, 2D scroll casual action adventure game, you need to play animals flying in the air on a balloon, fight and trample the balloons of others to win. You will see diverse natural scenery, face unknown challenges, start a joyous adventure, bring back the balloon fight fun of childhood.

Title: AI Roguelite
description: World's first RPG in which all entities are AI-generated and all game mechanics are AI-directed.

Title: Tumblestone
description: Tumblestone is the first original action-puzzle game of the past fifteen years -- completely reinventing the genre into a deep and cerebral puzzle solving experience that you won't forget.

Title: Bloody Trapland
description: Bloody Trapland is a fast-paced multiplayer platformer where the levels are filled with dozens of dangerous traps and tricky jumps that stand in your way! Play co-op with your friends or take on the challenges on your own. With support for up to 4 players at once, local and/or online.

Title: DOWNFALLEN
description: DOWNFALLEN is a short adventure game that tells the story of a civilian in a battlefield where everything takes a turn for the worse.

Title: OniBushi VR
description: Samurai Action Slasher for VR Defend your Castle from invaders using your fencing, ninja, archery skill.

Title: de Blob
description: The evil I.N.K.T. Corporation has declared 'Color is a Crime!' and leeched Chroma City of all its beauty and interest. The race to rescue Chroma City has just begun, and only de Blob can save the world from a black-and-white future with his unique abilities to color the world back to life.

Title: Graceful Explosion Machine
description: Skillfully pilot the Graceful Explosion Machine, a fighter ship armed with a ludicrously overpowered quad-weapon array! Lost in deep space, you'll shoot, dash and combo your way through jewel-hued uncharted planets, fighting an alien armada to find a way home.

Title: Sausage Sports Club
description: Sausage Sports Club is a physics game about floppy animals playing sports!

Title: GrowRilla VR
description: You're the world's hungriest ape and must eat to grow bigger and stronger. Sneak, climb, throw, punch and shoot to become a giant monster and defeat your enemies.

Title: Apprehend;Girlfriend
description: Apprehend;Girlfriend is a Yuri Visual Novel about two young women living together under the same roof.

Title: Project First Contact
description: Hundreds of UFOs have subjugated Earth nations and the aliens began their so-called "Project First Contact": conquest of the entire planet.

Title: Hentai DarkElf
description: Hentai DarkElf is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of golden wear dark elf and 24 unique sexy girls Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

Title: Within a Dead City
description: Within a Dead City is a tiny RTS / autobattler inspired by Majesty. Hire autonomous heroes to search for gold and glory. Build shops where they can spend their hard-earned loot. Place bounties on monsters to influence their behavior. With skill and strategy, you will find riches in the fallen city.

Title: Editor's Hell
description: You just became the editor for a newspaper in a troublesome country. After months of unemployment; you just had to took it. First, you have to make a choice. Will you support the government or will you go against it? Dreams, nightmares, donât matter anymore; you have a new opportunity in your life.

Title: Hnefatafl
description: The ancient boardgame of the Vikings. Thousands of variants, offline and online cross-platform play with leaderboards and tournaments. Are you ready for the challenge? Prepared to earn your way to Valhalla?

Title: Fremdganger - The Cheating Demon
description: In this twisted meta-game, you follow four friends on their cursed journey of love and betrayal, told through a long-forgotten Storyteller. Solve puzzles, make meaningful decisions, and unravel the mystery behind the Storyteller with the help of a reality-breaking RETURN-mechanic.

Title: PolyZen Drive
description: Dive into PolyZen Drive's sandbox of possibilities! Your road, your rules, and endless freedom. Immerse yourself in cozy atmospheres and drive through relaxing scenery, capture moments with your camera, or rush through dense traffic, you dictate your gameplay! The ultimate in driving freedom awaits!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: Gwen The Hen 64
description: Gwen the Hen 64 is a tiny 3D platformer collectathon, with precise controls and many different movement options.

Title: CyberLink PhotoDirector 14 Ultra
description: Create breathtaking compositions and artistic masterpieces with powerful AI tools, eye-catching visual effects, advanced color controls, and intuitive layer editing.

Title: Swords and Soldiers 2 Shawarmageddon
description: Take command of mighty Vikings, sly Persians or brutish Demons! Destroy your opponentâs base while defending your own in this action-packed side-scrolling RTS!

Title: Wait - Extended
description: "Wait" is a mystery horror game, inspired by the works of H.P Lovecraft and the Silent Hill series. The gameplay is put together by elements of exploration and riddle solving. Experience horror without jump scares or fighting monsters, but with the fear of the unknown and unimaginable.
