description: Immerse yourself in Andrew's story and feel the pressure of being a sniper. Find and eliminate the target in the crowd before he runs away.In living environments, designed exclusively for this fantastic game, you will not have a second chance, precision is everything!

Title: Oh...Sir! The Hollywood Roast
description: The boys are back , and they look better than ever! Ohâ¦Sir! The Hollywood roast is a brand new spinoff to the surprise indie hit 0f 2016, Ohâ¦Sir!! The Insult Simulator. This time around weâre taking tinsel town down a few notches, whilst classing up the joint.

Title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
description: The critically acclaimed RPG that raised the bar, from the creators of Baldur's Gate 3. Gather your party. Master deep, tactical combat. Venture as a party of up to four - but know that only one of you will have the chance to become a God.

Title: Lion Quest
description: Take Jethro the Lion on a magical journey, traversing space and time to prevent the imminent collapse of the universe. Oh and your friend Ronald the Bear is missing, maybe you can find him whilst youâre out exploring?

Title: Disharmonia
description: Disharmonia is a first person exploration game. Your decision will play a big role in the development of the whole game. You will play as Tony, you will explore and discover special places beyond your reality. You will try to find an end, but the game will never end.

Title: Pyre
description: Pyre is a party-based RPG from the creators of Bastion and Transistor. Lead your band of exiles to freedom through a series of mystical competitions in the Campaign, or challenge a friend to a fast-paced ritual showdown in the head-to-head Versus Mode.

Title: Robo Revenge Squad
description: Robo Revenge Squad is a co-op action game for 1-4 players, where everything is a weapon. Fight alien robots using Robos made of everyday objects: fridges, disco balls, baseball bats, and more!

Title: DollKart
description: Drive your ragdoll through an infinite number of difficult tracks, against time in single player, your friends in split screen and randoms online.

Title: Alcyon Infinity
description: Destroy hordes of ever-improving enemies and their Mothership. Alcyon Infinity is a fast shooter/bullet hell with dynamic movement and risk management with crazy electro-neo-classical music. Up to 4 Co-Op players with Controllers.

Title: Mira and the Mysteries of Alchemy
description: After making a big mistake while trying to craft a potion at the alchemy university, the apprentice alchemist Mira finds that she has exposed herself to an elixir that made fundamental changes to her body. Now she must go in search of the ingredients in order to craft the antidote.

Title: Snakeez
description: SNAKeez is a simple "snake" classic style game but with different physics.Here you have to collect not apples but eggs and snake's tail grows much faster.

Title: LEGOÂ® MARVEL's Avengers
description: Avengers Assemble! The best-selling LEGOÂ® MARVEL videogame franchise returns with a new action-packed, Super Hero adventure.

Title: Tasty Blue
description: Tasty Blue is an underwater side-scrolling eat 'em up game. You start as a small goldfish with an insatiable appetite. After being overfed by your owner, you'll escape into the ocean and eat everything that you encounter. The more you eat, the bigger you get!

Title: Otome the Exorcist
description: When the city of Himori is struck by nests of terrifying Voracites, the only ones who can counter the scourge are individuals known as Exorcists.

Title: Shards of Infinity
description: Shards of Infinity is the follow-up to the award winning deckbuilding game, Ascension. Build your armies by recruiting allies and champions from four unique factions. Launch surprise attacks on your foes by instantly deploying mercenaries. Unlock limitless power by mastering the Shard of Infinity.

Title: Detective Girl of the Steam City
description: Play as Sophie, a private investigator not unlike Sherlock Holmes. It's up to Sophie to uncover the hidden truths of London through her investigations. What mysteries and intrigue await her? Find out in this steampunk RPG!

Title: Dark Swords Firelink
description: Embark on an epic adventure in the vast kingdom of Lordhem. Unleash the power of the dark sword to defeat enemies and save the kingdom. Explore a pixel art medieval fantasy world full of creatures and dangers. Are you ready to save the kingdom?

Title: Super Gosu Cars
description: Arcade racing action mixed with kart racing combat! 4 player splitscreen! 8 player top-down! Lots of different vehicles, drivers and tracks to try out and more yet to unlock! Go for gold in the Grand Prix! Hone your skills in Time Trial! Run wild in Custom Tournaments! - It's Super Gosu Cars time!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Early Access

Title: My Lovely Wife
description: My Lovely Wife delves into the depths of a manâs grief after the sudden death of his beloved wife. Explore the notions of oneâs willingness to do anything for love and the importance of letting go in this mix of dating, management, and alchemy simulators.

Title: Explorer of Yggdrasil
description: After rescuing an armless mage during a chance encounter, the explorer Mei embarks on a journey to reach the top of Yggdrasil, and to uncover the mystery of her forgotten past.

Title: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend
description: The second entry in the critically acclaimed BlazBlue franchise, BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend adds a number of gameplay modes, story scenarios, new moves, and an all-new playable character to further enhance the BlazBlue experience and solidify its status as one of the all-time great 2D fighters

Title: It's Quiz Time
description: It's Quiz Time lets up to 8 players compete against each other to find out who the true quiz master is! Presented by Salli, the latest and greatest in quiz hosting technology, this game has over 30,000 questions ready for you, covering all the popular films, songs, books, and video games!

Title: Super Kill-BOI 9000
description: A bullet heaven where you cooperate with Kill-BOI 9000 (your friend and toaster). Forge a beautiful bond and bring destruction - together. Give him saws! Give him drones! Then give all the drones saws! AND THEN SET THE SAWS ON FIRE.

Title: Battle Snakes
description: Battle Snakes is a 2-4 player local multiplayer arcade game where you compete with your friends in different arenas to be the last snake standing.

Title: So May It Be: A Witch Dating Simulator
description: Play as a witch hanging out with your witchy friends, ditch school, contact the dead and fall in love.

Title: Dam Busters
description: Destroy the dam, or save the dam. Your choice. Play the aggressor and destroy the dam brick by brick. Or play the defender and command your work force to repair any damage done to your dam. A reimagining of the Magnavox OdysseyÂ² Game Videopac 29 - Dam Buster

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 4
description: The fourth pack in this storied party game franchise features Fibbage 3 and its new game mode, Fibbage: Enough About You; the twisted web game Survive the Internet; the dating contest Monster Seeking Monster; the deranged debate match Bracketeering; and the one-up art game Civic Doodle.

Title: Mega Knockdown
description: A fast-paced fighting game that anyone can play... because it's TURN-BASED! Strike, evade and punish! Knock 'em down and press the advantage! Meet wacky characters, and challenge your friends to an epic battle of wits!

Title: Hooklings
description: Hook, pull, jump and do combos to clear 100 screens of enemies, alone or with your friends in this platformer inspired by arcade classics from the 80s.

Title: Digital Dungeon Tiles
description: An extremely quick to use dungeon tile-based mapping tool to build battle maps for âScreen In Tableâ and "Print" (or Online) based play! Fully orthographic so you can play as if your Miniatures are in the map.

Title: Q REMASTERED
description: This game "Q REMASTERED" is a simple puzzle game that anyone can enjoy! You can freely draw lines and shapes on the screen. The drawn object will fall down due to gravity. You will use the object to solve more than 1200 missions. Can you get the ball out of the cup? Let's challenge!

Title: Wave Break
description: Wave Break is the world's first skateBOATING game, inspired by arcade skateboarding classics. Grind, grab, kickflip and shoot your way through an explosive 80s crime-filled Miami Vice themed world.

Title: Move or Die
description: Move or Die is an absurdly fast-paced, 4-player local and online party game where the mechanics change every 20 seconds. The very definition of a perfect friendship-ruining game.

Title: Tales of the Elements
description: Tales of the Elements, a game adaption of the album of the same name, is a mixture of Hip Hop, JRPG, & party-style goodness! Featuring Mega Ran, K-Murdock, and Last BeNeVoLeNcE, experience a fast-paced 2D Japanese-style action RPG for up to 4 players!

Title: Guacamelee! Gold Edition
description: Guacamelee! Gold Edition is a Metroidvania-style action-platformer set in a magical Mexican-inspired world. The game draws its inspiration from traditional Mexican culture and folklore, and features many interesting and unique characters.

Title: The Recurrence
description: Explore an open-ended nightmare using paranormal equipment to survive an onslaught of evil spirits that await your return.

Title: Puzzler World 2
description: The highly anticipated sequel to last yearâs PC hit, Puzzler World 2 brings more puzzles, new games, fun rewards and an all new Master Mode.

Title: ATOM RPG: Post-apocalyptic indie game
description: ATOM RPG is a post-apocalyptic indie game, inspired by classic CRPGs: Fallout, Wasteland, Deus Ex, Baldur's Gate and many others.

Title: Kitten Lost Her Box
description: Help tiny Kitten get back her favorite paper box only with her agile actions. In this tight platformer kitten brave hand-crafted challenges, meet cute creatures and finally fight with her old enemy!

Title: Don't Cut Your Hand 2
description: Chef can't work without his hand. So, please cut food carefully.

Title: C64 & AMIGA Classix Remakes Sixpack 2
description: Get some of the classic games from the 80s and 90s back on your home PC - as a remake.

Title: Dorfs: Hammers for Hire
description: A co-op crafting platformer where your friends prove worse than any enemy. Craft weapons and armor from your dwarven workshop, help your patron's army win the battle, and make your way up the Iron Mountain!

Title: Onsen Master
description: Onsen Master is a hot spring customer management game where players must create ingredients to match the various customer ailments, across the fantasy island of Izajima!

Title: Jumpala
description: Jumpala is a fast-paced action puzzler with heavy fighting game vibes. While the core mechanics are simple, each game is a test of skill and strategy as you try to outscore and outplay your opponents. Features both local and online play.

Title: Brawlout
description: Brawlout is the platform fighting game, designed for couch play, online ranked matches and competitive tournaments. Now at 2.0!

Title: Super Grav
description: Super Grav is a retro gravity cave flyer for 1-4 players, featuring single player or co-op multiplayer missions, racing and dogfighting. Back by popular demand, Super Grav is the official sequel to the 1998 Net Yaroze coverdisc hit, Gravitation.

Title: Kung Fu Grand King
description: Once a great hero and a servant of the Emperor, Lan Mei now enjoys a quiet life running a dojo. However, when a new evil appears, she is called back into the world of martial arts to take part in a tournament that will determine the true Kung Fu Grand King!

Title: Hot Pieces
description: Hot Pieces is an Erotic Puzzle. 15 girls, with many puzzles for each one, and also a special bonus mode! The soundtrack consists in relaxing live recorded classical music. All the fictional girls here depicted are over 21 years old. This game is destined for adult public.

Title: Legend of Grimrock 2
description: Legend of Grimrock 2 is a dungeon crawling role playing game with a modern execution but an oldschool heart. A group of four prisoners have shipwrecked on the secluded Isle of Nex. The island is filled with ancient crumbled ruins, mysterious shrines and a vast underground network of dungeons.

Title: Serious Sam: The Random Encounter
description: Choose your weapons and take aim at the most random Serious Sam adventure yet!

Title: ibb & obb
description: ibb & obb is a two player cooperative game set in a puzzle filled world where gravity goes both up and down. You can only succeed by working closely together. Find a friend for some true local co-op couch fun or match up online.

Title: The No-Name Project
description: Welcome to 'The No-Name Project,' where limitless freedom awaits! Adopt various characters, from animals to NPCs, even resurrecting them with necromancy. Explore, mine, and interact with the world's secrets. Frequent updates ensure endless adventures!

Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Cowabunga Collection contains thirteen prior released classic games. This collection is a great place for gamers to experience these popular titles on Steam.

Title: The Last Faith
description: A dark, gothic fusion of metroidvania and soulslike. The Last Faith thrives on merciless and precise combat with a huge range of weapons, firearms, and custom executions at your disposal. Let nothing stand in your way.

Title: Blocked!
description: Couch multiplayer is back - Blocked! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 people that is all about being easy to pick up and start playing. Outsmart your friends in various classic and unique minigames.

Title: Unbearable
description: A story inspired by old school survival horror. Play alone or together on split screen. Delve into dark environments; hide or run; fight melee or with guns; climb and solve puzzles to discover the story of Unbearable.

Title: Yars: Recharged
description: Shoot from affar or get nibble away up-close and personal in a boss-rush, bullet-dodging revival of the 1982 Atari classic title, Yars' Revenge. Take on 60 unique enemy encounters alone or with a friend in local co-op.

Title: Epics of Distant Realm: Holy Return
description: Epics Of Distant Realm: Holy Return is a Turn-Based Combat and Story Sci-Fi game that delves into the mythologies of the universe, the terminal of the universe, the Planet of Destiny.

Title: DayDream Mosaics 2: Juliette's Tale
description: Join Juliette on an epic mosaic puzzle quest! Solve spot the difference and hidden object minigames, gather crystals and restore the sanctuaries of tranquility.

Title: BattlefieldCars
description: A shooting game with cars where you can play in split screen local multiplayer or in single player mode .

Title: Maze Gold Run
description: Embark on a Time Challenge Runner adventure with easy-to-master controls. Navigate through a dimly lit labyrinth, collecting gold to speed up your pace and brighten your path. Transition from cautious exploration to a high-speed sprint, racing against both the clock and your dwindling life force.

Title: ICEwall
description: An action roguelike shoot 'em up. Draft power-ups between levels to become stronger and build crazy combos. Several player ships to unlock, multiple game modes; including Endless Mode and Arcade, leaderboards and achievement challenges!

Title: Chains of the Goddess
description: Chains of the Goddess is a delivery mechanism for uncomfortable existential questions, cleverly disguised as a roguelite game. Our lawyers warn that you should not follow financial or medical advice dispensed by the Goddess.

Title: Goroons
description: GOROONS is a teamwork-based adventure where you have to combine your unique skills and overcome tough-as-nails puzzle challenges.

Title: OlliOlli2: Welcome to Olliwood
description: Drop in to Olliwood and prepare for finger-flippinâ mayhem in this follow up to cult skateboarding smash OlliOlli.

Title: Spooky Halloween in the Voxel World
description: Welcome to the Voxel World! Halloween is about to begin and you are excited for your adventure! But remember, in this period, Voxel World is a dangerous place... Hunting season has begun! Don't forget your sword and always follow grandma's advice. The monsters won't go away alone...

Title: Slave Lord: Elven Conquest
description: You have captured a sexy pair of elven maidens. Train them to be your faithful, cum-guzzling slaves. Will you be a cruel or kind master? The choice is yours. Visual Novel with point-and-click and management elements.

Title: Towertale
description: Fight your way up a Tower of bosses and unveil the mystery that lies up in its peak. Play four intertwined storylines and unlock multiple endings. Now with co-op up to 4 players!

Title: Mayhem Heroes
description: Mayhem Heroes is a frenetic beatâem up where you have to take down as many opponents as possible and, ideally, be the last one standing. Use punches, kicks, special moves and power ups to send your opponents flying out of the arena. Play with up to 4 friends and show them whoâs the boss!

Title: Wanted Raccoon
description: WANTED RACCOON is a 3rd person raccoon simulator with a storyline and extensive research space. Steal food, ride a skateboard, be inconspicuous, fight with people, create equipment, upgrade skills, lead resistance and find a kidnapped family!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Path to Magehood
description: A roque-lite rpg bullet heaven.Use available mechanics at the right time! Walk (shift) to double your mana regeneration and shoot more. Blast your enemies with a shockwave (space) right before they get too close and gain an attack speed bonus.

Title: Hyper Jam
description: Battle it out local and online in this neon-soaked arena brawler full of lethal weapons, stackable perks, furious combat and a killer synthwave soundtrack.

Title: Monster Academy
description: There's a school for monsters where they learn how to blend in to the human world. Everyone there is secretly a monster. Apart from one man who is actually a human and must now figure out to safely escape.

Title: Galactic Wars EX
description: Galactic Wars EX is a pixel perfect co-op retro arcade shmup retrogaming experience for modern pcs

Title: Animaddicts 2
description: Animaddicts 2 is a Beat Em Up Game based on the 80s Cartoon for 1-4 players.

Title: Battle Billiards
description: Battle Billiards is a billiards game where no one takes turns and everyone goes at the same time.

Title: And All Would Cry Beware!
description: 90s-style shooter meets Metroidvania. Step through a portal to a mysterious alien world, and discover the fate of the Lost Expedition.

Title: Physical Exorcism: Case 01
description: When the two exorcists, Brucie and Jade, were starving to death, a high school student named Lucy was kind enough to share food with them and hire them to protect her friend from an evil spirit. However, it turns out that the spirit has an unusual past.

Title: HaHa
description: Are you ready for an adventure in a visually appealing, arena shooter roguelite style where you can survive against hordes of incoming enemies? You can bravely engage in battles against the oncoming enemies alone, or if you prefer, you can play cautiously.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Retro Classix: Joe & Mac Returns
description: Joe & Mac return in this frantic and zany single-screen arcade action platformer from Data Eastâ¢. The local cave women have been kidnapped once again, so itâs up to these stone-age superstars to rescue them. Grab your club and get ready to dish out serious prehistoric pain!

Title: The Tribe Game
description: The Tribe Game is a story-driven roleplaying game where the player creates their own custom character to explore an atmospheric post-apocalyptic world (where hope prevails) and to be instrumental in creating a better future. Inspired by the classic cult-hit TV series, 'The Tribe'.

Title: ShadowSide
description: ShadowSide is a First Person Exploration game. A policeman Alex Carter has been watching over the tranquility in the town for many years. He protects the people from robbery and crime. Nothing but a routine.

Title: Watcher Chronicles
description: Become a glutton for punishment and persevere, alone or with a friend, against 20+ merciless bosses and legions of skeletal nightmares in this savage yet charming 2D souls-like.

Title: Bibi Blocksberg â¢ - Big Broom Race 3
description: This is only just the beginning of a wild witch rally: Bibi and her friends saddle their broomsticks and set off to discover exciting worlds. Using secret witchcraft potions and daredevil flight manoeuvres they travel back to the age of dinosaurs, the Orient and Transylvania. Wit-Wit, off you go!

Title: Super Markup Man
description: Super Markup Man is the ultimate fun way to practice web development and learn the basics of HTML and CSS. No coding skills needed!

Title: Rocket Fist
description: Rocket Fist is an arena game with crazy robots in chaotic rocket fist battles. Aim against your frenemies and prove your dexterity by killing each other with rocket propelled fists in this frenetic mix of dodgeball and billiards!

Title: The Tale of Doris and the Dragon - Episode 1
description: The Tale of Doris and the Dragon is an episodic, point-and-click adventure game series featuring an elderly lady named Doris who finds herself in Purgatory after passing away on earth.

Title: Pulling No Punches
description: A classic 2D arcade action game animated frame by frame. Survive a fictional pandemic in a city filled with madness and denial.

Title: Death Road to Canada
description: Control a car full of jerks as they explore cities, recruit weird people, rescue dogs, argue with each other, and face gigantic swarms of slow zombies. Randomly generated for a new story and rare events every time you play!

Title: G-Darius HD
description: You will see the creation of new lives... Capture enemies and fire them back at their allies as enormous beams of energy in this horizontally scrolling shooting game, featuring 5 versions of G-Darius with new features, enhancements, and Steam exclusive extras!

Title: Candy Arkanoid
description: Candy Arkanoid is more than just a simple arcade game - it also includes RPG and Rogue-like elements, allowing players to level up their Arkanoid and customize its abilities. So why wait? Satisfy your sweet tooth and soon blast your way through the candy cosmos!

Title: Motorbike Video Puzzle
description: A jigsaw puzzle with videos shot on motorbikes. Enjoy this unique experience to the sound of Rock 'n' Roll

Title: Fallen Angel
description: Tossed aside and cast out. It's time to claim your birthright. Rise as Lucifer and battle the armies of the afterlife and ascend through the weird and warped realms of heaven and claim vengeance.

Title: Never Alone (Kisima Ingitchuna)
description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and Fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known.

Title: SAS
description: SAS is an Open World Multiplayer PVP and CO-OP Survival Game. Set in a vast environment that features Building, Crafting, Taming, Riding, Flying and Exploring Wildlife, Dinos and Dragons as well as Horrific Creatures and Instances with the ability to Morph into Spirit Animals.
genre: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Jet Set Corps
description: You are a "Jet Pack Marine" of the famous "Jet Set Corps". Rescue Colonists, Save Colonies and Earth from Aliens Attack! Get ready, mission starts NOW! "Jet Set Corps" is a tribute to the best times in arcade games history.

Title: Cue Club 2: Pool & Snooker
description: Experience pool and snooker like never before, thanks to the stunning HD graphics, fantastic playability and ultra realistic ball physics. Challenge a variety of stylish new opponents of different ability from beginner right up to pro level!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Wizard of Legend
description: Wizard of Legend is a no-nonsense, action-packed take on wizardry that emphasizes precise movements and smart comboing of spells in a rogue-like dungeon crawler that features over a hundred unique spells and relics!

Title: Soulstone of Hope
description: Embark on a heroic journey in this captivating fantasy turn-based JRPG. Choose your path as a fearless Warrior, cunning Rogue, or powerful Mage, each with unique abilities. Form unbreakable bonds with your companions and uncover the secrets of the forgotten catacombs.

Title: LEGOÂ® Brawls
description: Dream up the ultimate Minifigure brawlers and bash your way through all of your favorite LEGOÂ® themes in the first team action brawler set in the LEGO universe. Play with friends at home or around the world and see how you stack up against the competition.

Title: Learn Programming: Python - Remake
description: An interactive text-based game for learning and practicing how to program in Python.

Title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
description: The first hi-res 2D fighter from the creators of the Guilty Gear series! BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters participate in a duel.

Title: Stunt Kite Party
description: Stunt Kite Party is a family-friendly single player and couch-coop multiplayer game with an exciting storyline and endless fun in numerous game modes.

Title: Western Press
description: Based on a true story, Western Press is the most historically accurate frontier dueling game available for PC and Mac. Probably. Up to 16 players (or bots) compete in a tournament of 1v1 sprints to press a random string of ten buttons the fastest.

Title: ForRace GT2D
description: Experience a realistic race that you have not experienced in 2D. You can race with hundreds of cars on dozens of tracks. You can earn money and buy and sell cars. You can modify your cars. You can get a driver's license to participate in races. It is a very comprehensive huge 2d racing game.
Publisher: Kanuni Games OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA Ticaret Limited Sirketi

Title: Vegas Party
description: The game takes the player into the gambling-friendly universe of this over-the-top version of Las Vegas city. Played as a race, the goal is to reach the end of the Strip before anyone else. Trust no one and forget the meaning of the word "mercy" because it does not apply here!

Title: Wildlife Park 2
description: Nowâs the chance to build the Zoo of your dreams! Just like in a real Zoo, your animals must receive complete care. Feed them, train them, cure them and even relocate them. Observe their realistic interactions with one another, the landscape, the play equipment and even Zoo visitors.

Title: Bizarre Mushroom Cycle Simulator
description: Let's become members of the mushrooms and enjoy life as mushrooms! With the mushrooms, you can watch enchanting fireflies, listen to the sounds of the forest, and experience a life that is unique to mushrooms. Living as a mushroom might not be too bad after all.

Title: Potion Blast : Battle of Wizards
description: A fascinating couch-multiplayer versus game where you embody a wizard mixing, sipping and unleashing magical potions to blast your opponents with a mesmerizing array of spells. Only the craftiest, luckiest, and most skilled wizard will emerge victorious!

Title: Noelle Does Her Best!
description: After an unfulfilling childhood in the countryside, Noelle jumps at the first opportunity to move out and live on her own. Little does she know, her new home comes with the world's worst housewarming gift: a debt to the tune of a million gold, which she only has 10 days to repay! It's time for Noelle to do her best!

Title: Conclave Virtual Tabletop
description: Conclave aims to not only replicate the TTRPG experience, but also enhance it with a wide array of tools, effects, and atmospheric settings. It's never been easier to start a session; with just a single copy of Conclave, the whole party can play and create together whether local or online.

Title: Rascals
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Rascals, the VR board game where you take first person control of your pieces to play tricks on the opposition. It plays much like any other board game where you throw dice to move your pieces, until you sneak up on one of your opponents and shoot him in the head.

Title: Ultra Pig
description: This is a fun and mobile pixel pig platformer. The task of the pig is picking up coins at levels, passing extermination of biting dogs and trying not to fall from the ledge down.

Title: MotionMuse
description: MotionMuse is a powerful yet easy to use toolset for creating & editing 3D character animations. This includes animation transfer, spline based motion-editing, fast IK solver, sketching for easy posing, image overlays, curve editor and more, to help quickly and easily bring your characters to life.
genre: Animation & Modeling, Game Development, Early Access

Title: Insanity's Blade
description: Take a fatherâs journey to hell in order to save the souls of his wife and child. Insanity's Blade: The Chronicles of Thurstan is the first in a series of games based around the journey of a sword possessed by a father's powerful grief and hatred. This is the tale of the sword's creation.

Title: Sector Sweep
description: Choose your character from many Sector Sweepers and clean the next planets from ever-growing enemies in this top-down action roguelike shooter. Unlock new sectors by defeating enemies and upgrading your weapons or hero powers. Be the best Sector Sweeper the company ever had!

Title: Strip Fighter ZERO
description: The bawdy spoof filled origin game of the "Strip Fighter" series of 90's style 2D fighting games finally hits the scene! An underground fighting tournament filled with deadly fighters and martial artists. Their fierce battle for supremacy is about to unfold!

Title: Pupper park
description: A cute sandbox game about dogs in a park. Fetch balls, run around, scare frogs, play football, and earn bones!

Title: True or False
description: Take a quiz to test your intuition and knowledge - and learn some interesting and specific facts along the way!

Title: Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition
description: The definitive version of the smash hit Metroidvania-style action-platformer, Guacamelee! STCE adds new levels, powers, challenges and refinements to the sprawling, ridiculous, Mexican-inspired adventure of the original Guacamelee! Gold Edition.

Title: Destroiders
description: No nonsense, action packed, 2.5D, Asteroids inspired shooter. Scream around speeding rocks narrowly avoiding an untimely death as you obliterate rocks whilst harvesting their valuable resources. See how far you and your friends can get. Best played with mates but also pretty fun on your own.

Title: Rebellion
description: Rebellion is a souls like and roguelite action game about your revenge saga. Unfairly imprisoned, you seek to cross swords with the King again, for the last time! Escape the jail, explore the castle and it's different areas and layouts, find and recruit allies, choose to fight or sneak from enemies.

Title: TrickStyle
description: Grab your board, surf through the air, show your stuff, and win eternal glory with your off-the-chain skills. Re-Live this Dreamcast Classic Today!

Title: de Blob 2
description: In de Blob 2 Comrade Black and the Inkies are back with a whole new plot to rid the world of color. Set off on an action-packed color adventure where custom paints, patterns and music bring the world to life. De Blob 2 is a creative evolution driven by your imagination.

Title: Secure the Skies
description: Music-based aerial combat.

Title: Neon Drive
description: Neon Drive is a slick retro-futuristic, '80s inspired arcade game that will make your brain melt. You've been warned.From beautiful cityscapes and ocean roads to exploding enemy spaceships, Neon Drive has it all.

Title: Bondage Play
description: Ting, a female college student, received a strange message. She would receive a generous cash reward for accepting and completing a task. Curious Ting came to the agreed place, open the designated black box is a pair of handcuffs, the first requirement of the task is to ask her to put the cuffs on.

Title: Dungeon Rummage - Tiqee's Escape
description: Join Tiqee, a Human/Goblin half breed, on her adventures to escape the dungeon of Echeia.

Title: Super Bomberman R
description: Bomberman is back and stronger than ever! The 8 Bomberman heroes journey to space to face the Evil Emperor Buggler! Classic Battle Mode is back! Challenge players around the world in online battles!

Title: Cat Rescue
description: Cat Rescue is a casual 2D Platformer game about a cat finding it's way back home. Can YOU complete the journey?

Title: Mahjong Valentine's Day
description: An unforgettable adventure awaits you in a world of love and romance! Complete 120 unique levels of Mahjong!

Title: Muddledash
description: Join your friends on a mad-as-a-squid, couch-multiplayer race to the most bopping octopus party of the year. Slap your friends down with your tentacles to wrestle the only present out of their grasp, and make it to the party first. Guaranteed to make you smile!

Title: Basketing
description: Basketing is the youngest sibling of Volleying! Thus, as another physics-based game, it also gives the players more control over their moves, delivering unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

Title: How to Build a Magnificent Kingdom
description: The once prosperous kingdom of Avon now lies in tatters with nothing left in its coffers and a pitiful four citizens to its name. Yet even in its darkest hour, Princess Ariadne is determined to restore it to its former glory. Will her perseverance carry her through?

Title: StudioS Fighters: Climax Champions
description: An entire generation of StudioS characters all fighting to be #1! Fight your way to the top with satisfying and easy to execute combos! A unique retro-style game inspired by 90s era handheld fighting games!

Title: Ducks' Wrath
description: Play as a fearless Duck, burp and push your "friends" while hot dogs fall from the skies. Compete for the leaderboard highest score in the single player challenges. Oh, and don't fall from the slippery ice!

Title: Apollyon: River of Life
description: Choice-based RPG in a dark fantasy world. Apollyon is narrative-driven, and features occult magic, spirit summoning, a deep universe, playable characters, and story progression alone or in multiplayer!

Title: Cyber Lemur
description: Have you every dreamed of maneuvering an intricate mechanical beast across daunting obstacles? Or fighting other mechs in hand-to-hand combat? If so, this may be the game for you! Cyber Lemur shines as a local multiplayer party game with coop character control and a variety of game modes.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: The Treehouse Man
description: A horrible corruption has forced the children of the forest into hiding. They confide in the Treehouse Man, but their prayers remain unanswered. Baptized into the group, you must take the hallowed boat on an odyssey to save your brothers and sisters before the silence kills them.

Title: Monica e a Guarda dos Coelhos
description: MONICA E A GUARDA DOS COELHOS is a couch co-op game for 1 to 4 players. Playing as a group with heroes from the Brazilian IP Monica and Friends, everyone must play a role and defend the castles!

Title: Off-Road: Redneck Racing
description: Yeehah! Stop yer grinnin' and drop yer linen, cause the slam bangin'est, mud-flappin'est off-road driving game ever created is comin' to Steam! Motor trucks 'n Buggies over the most brutal Southland terrain ever seen in a racing game.

Title: The Great War 3032
description: We are in the year 3032. For some time now, there has been a war between the Northern and Southern nations. Choose a side and enter the battle as an advanced combat robot. Play against friends in multiplayer deathmatch or team up with up to three others in co-op mode.

Title: Missile Command: Recharged
description: Defend your cities from an assault of missiles, planes, tanks, and more! Play solo or with a friend in co-op in this modern reimagining of the arcade classic.

Title: EscapeMONO
description: Point & click to interact with strange creatures, find items, and solve puzzles in a dark, locked lab. Then just escape...?

Title: Skydrift Infinity
description: Skydrift Infinity is an action-packed arcade game focusing on the experience of flying alone, and with others, in a light, quick, fast-paced style.

Title: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099
description: Spy on strangers through security cameras, invade their privacy and discover their secrets in this digital voyeur simulator. Welcome to the future of The Primate Observation Club. Even in 2099 the rule about messing with your unlucky subjects still remains in this sequel: DO NOT feed the monkeys!

Title: PEOPLEDOWN
description: PEOPLEDOWN is a "Hotline Miami" style top-down stealth action game. A short experimental game.

Title: Murder Is Game Over
description: Join the investigation in Murder Is Game Over, a pixel art point-and-click game where you and Cleo try to solve the murder of a famous game designer. Can you uncover the clues and catch the killer before it's game over?

Title: Legendary Eleven: Epic Football
description: Legendary Eleven is an âepic arcade football game inspired by the golden age of football spanning the 70's to the 90's. Choose from 36 teams full of glorious haircuts, moustaches and legends in short shorts. Lead them to glory and win the World Cup!

Title: Gang District
description: Gang District is a local multiplayer shooter party game with a share screen mechanism. Pick up a weapon and start blasting and kick some tail!

Title: Doughbee
description: A real time wave based roguelike about battling doodle creatures and collecting perks along the way, with ranging effects from elemental damage to things like rammer Doughbee and even a scorpion mech, see how far you can make it through this bullet hell of a nightmare.

Title: Spooky Station
description: Welcome to Spooky Station! Prepare to be amazed and bewildered by our enigmas and puzzles, afraid of our deadly enemies and extremely challenging bosses. Tons of exciting stories and distinct fictional worlds await for you in this mysterious pack!

Title: Castlewatch
description: Castlewatch is a classical Tower Defense Game

Title: Good Knight
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the depths of Filipino mythology in this Buttclenching One-Button Bullet-Hell. Test yourself through a relentless onslaught of bullets and beautiful patterns. Experience the intense action and headbanging soundtrack in this must-play game for all indie fans!

Title: The Finnish War
description: In a time when the Napoleonic Wars were raging in Europe, another minor theatre took place in the far north. In the lands of the Kingdom of Sweden, in modern-day Finland, the Finnish War was a conflict in a dangerous land that saw stories, battles, and heroes unlike anywhere else in the continent.

Title: The Superfluous
description: "The Superfluous" [soo-pur-floo-uh s] A cave-diving, sci-fi, rogue-lite, platformer with jet packs and lots of explosions. Help stop an apocalyptic asteroid on collision course with Earth. Lead a squad to the center of the asteroid and blast it into space dust.

Title: Dark Witch Music Episode: Rudymical
description: Jump and Slash to the rhythm! The popular spin off from Dark Witch Story is now available on STEAM Play the 1 player STORY MODE and defeat all the bosses! Play the VS MODE to battle against your friends, and the CO-OP MODE to cooperate!

Title: Hentai DevilGirl
description: Hentai DevilGirl is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of devil girl and 24 unique sexy girls Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

Title: Maiden and Spell
description: Maiden & Spell is a magical girl battle game, set in a cutesy fantasy world. Select from one of eight young ladies to battle 1 on 1 with a friend, or fight your way through a series of bosses and learn the secrets of The Kingdom of Stars.

Title: Dear Agony Aunt
description: Congratulations! You're on your way to becoming a professional agony aunt! All you have to do now is get through the trial period. Respond to messages using a retro 2006 email client. The replies you send will determine whether you are hired or fired at the end of the week. Good luck!

Title: The Bastonnes
description: The mobsters's meeting bursts, your family must survive. Plan your actions to beat the other families, but play carefully they may have a different plan for you!

Title: Our Summer Sports
description: It's time for some summer fun! The competition heats up in this series of sports contests!

Title: Endustry
description: Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources. Try to survive with or without enemy waves depending on which game mode you play.

Title: Nice Disc : The Last Hot Blood
description: Hot-blooded action game where you steal, throw, and fling discs to take down your opponents and leave your mark in the vaulted halls of Nice Disc! Up to four players can join the fray in this local multiplayer sports brawler, with both controller and keyboard support.

Title: Hellfire
description: Trigger-happy aliens are closing in! Only you can burn the invaders to a crisp with the ultimate starship: HELLFIRE! Discover Toaplan's first side-scrolling shooter, known for its stunning graphics and strategic gameplay. Now on PC with quality-of-life extras!

Title: Vaccine Rebirth
description: Enter once again into the world of Survival Horror.

Title: Guns, Gore & Cannoli
description: Guns, Gore & Cannoli - An over-the-top, comical and fast-paced action game with hand-drawn graphics set in the Roaring Twenties. An all-you-can-shoot fest where you embody Vinnie, a mobster with a mission in a city controlled by gangsters and plagued by zombies. Featuring up to 4-man local co-op.

Title: Mad Streets
description: Mad Streets is a hilarious multiplayer party game with an emphasis on brutal yet comical fist fighting throughout a multitude of modes, local and online, where players battle it out in wild physics driven chaos to determine who is the baddest player in town!

Title: Heavy Metal Titans
description: Heavy Metal Titans is a modern-retro Run nâ Gun Shoot âem up that takes players on a blood-soaked time traveling quest to defeat General Glen Planamento and retrieve the stolen time crystal, a powerful relic that can manipulate time and reality.

Title: Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers
description: UFOs! Aliens! Aircrafts! Resistance! SHOOT 'EM UP! Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers is a spaceship shooter with 2D gameplay and 3D environment. Enjoy a smart combination of a fast-paced shooting experience and the 1950's sci-fi movies aesthetic, with live-action cutscenes.

Title: Nonozle
description: A number logic puzzle game. Solve nonograms to form pixel-art images. Features 300 hand-made puzzles.

Title: Desktop Soccer 2
description: A fun-filled soccer game for everyone! Get set for the ultimate kickoff!

Title: Office Elevator
description: Today might be just a regular workday, or you might end up in a complete alternative reality. Office Elevator is a survival horror game with puzzles that takes place in a dark universe.

Title: Mr. Sun's Hatbox
description: Mr Sunâs Hatbox is a slapstick, roguelite platformer about getting the job done at all costs. Upgrade your HQ, your team, and your tools so you can take on increasingly dangerous (and ridiculous) missions, wearing hats with amazing (or questionable) potential.

Title: Aegis Defenders
description: Take on wild beasts, ruthless soldiers, and ancient gods in this 2D Action-Platformer inspired by Tower-Defense combat.

Title: Pig Eat Ball
description: Pig Eat Ball is a top-down, action-adventure about eating, getting fat, and barfing on things to solve levels. Explore 20 giant space stations to find different Disguises, and using their Pros and Cons, fight and solve your way through over 200 action-puzzle levels using new, arcade-style mechanics.

Title: Mr. Fast
description: Mr. Fast is a top-down shooting game with a bullet time twist! Enemy's time moves more slowly than yours. You're fast enough and you can kill others with one shot.

Title: Promethium
description: Inspired by classic Commodore 64 and arcade games, Promethium is a hard-as-nails retro inspired side-scrolling shoot-em-up that takes place over numerous levels that get harder and harder. If youâre after a nice calm casual game this isnât it!

Title: Endgame: Road To Salvation
description: A high-octane road trip through a besieged world during a demon-infested zombie apocalypse. Rescue survivors, form a caravan, call in various support drops or air strikes, loot random structures for supplies or craft them yourself, modify common vehicles into post-apocalyptic machines of war.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Pixel Puzzles 2: Space
description: Pixel Puzzles 2: Space is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game in a universal style, each piece uniquely shaped like no physical puzzle could be.

Title: Ideology in Friction
description: Ideology in Friction is the story of two knights, Clacier and Annette. They're forced into an impossible situation where they must make a decision that will change their entire lives. What does this destiny have in store for them? Find out in Ideology in Friction!

Title: Puck Buddies
description: Puck Buddies is a bouncy multiplayer sports game that combines the best elements of hockey and minigolf into non-stop fun. Challenge your friends to pass, shoot, spin and bump into things in this chirpily competitive deflection derby. It's time to bounce!

Title: ASTLIBRA Revision
description: Confront time and fate in the 2D action RPG, Astlibra Revision. Explore meticulously crafted worlds, fight brutal boss battles, and upgrade your skills to take down enemies lurking around every corner.

Title: Extra Case: My Girlfriend's Secrets
description: Your girlfriend seems to be hiding something. Will you respect her privacy or pry into her secrets? Don't worry, though. This is a horror dating sim with a time loop, so you can try again...and again...and again...

Title: Milky Quest II
description: You find yourself in a world full of cute monster girls! The only problem is you lost your memories and all the monster girls want to eat you for nourishment! How will you survive!?

Title: Miner Ultra Adventures 2
description: Our friend Miner is back !!! Amazing adventures with extreme difficulty, this 3d platform game will surprise you and give you a lot of satisfaction to overcome all the challenges !!! Be versatile and have quick reflexes to be the best !!!

Title: Tidalis
description: Tidalis is a block-based puzzle game with casual appeal, hardcore depth, and an addictive new "streams" mechanic. The game is brimming over with riffs and variants on that core mechanic with 20 game modes, dozens of special blocks and items, and 115 levels in the adventure mode alone.

Title: Trenchfoot
description: If you enjoy old-school local multiplayer games, you're going to love Trenchfoot! Trenchfoot is a fast paced party game for up to 16 players locally!

Title: Revenge on the Streets 2
description: Revenge On The Streets 2 is a beat 'em up, with a very original art style, art was all hand-drawn, the player will have to control one of the 3 playable characters to take down various crime bosses.

Title: Skinny & Franko: Fists of Violence
description: Brutal next chapter of Amiga's legendary beat'em up 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge' is here. It's time to clean the streets of shit. The iconic game finally gets a sequel it deserves. Are you ready? They are coming!

Title: Mea`s saifu collection party
description: A fan-made game for Vtuber Kagura Mea. Protect yourself and Halloween gifts amidst a storm of fierce attacks! Face off against 40 waves of enemies and a variety of bosses.

Title: 8-Ball Pocket
description: Enjoy 8-Ball Pocket with friends and family.

Title: Button Button Up!
description: "Button Button Up!" is a platformer party game. Players need to use limited resources to help their partner passing different laser obstacles. The bros are going share their weal and woe to complete a fantastic adventure by the lead of Mr. Bunny.

Title: The Conquest of Go
description: Learn and play Go, the classic board game that has been played for thousands of years, and compete in the race to conquer the most land in the in-game world, or compete online against opponents around the real world.

Title: Miner Warfare
description: 8 players local multiplayer bonanza with only 4 controllers!In Miner Warfare you dig for gold. But you'll spend most of the match shooting in your friends's face, mining holes with laser cannon, throwing buggers and detonating atomic bombs. WARNING: excessive use can destroy friendship.

Title: A=B
description: A=B is a programming puzzle game with only one instruction: A=B, which means replacing A with B.

Title: Buddies in Boxes
description: Eat, promote, and show off your skills against this adorable cast of characters as you compete for the title of "Most Appealing" in this unconventional and wacky turn-based strategy game.

Title: Casual Challenge Players Club- Anime Bilhar game
description: If you like anime and pool, then this game is for you. Play the story mode or have fun playing with your friends and family.

Title: Anime - Space Sniper
description: Become the legendary assasin in the Space. Play single-player across large exotic maps. Think tactical, be quick against the time and enjoy the long distance headshots!

Title: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth)
description: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth) is interesting puzzle game for everyone. Get ready to face different types of challenges in the game.
Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: It's a match!!
description: Unlock the hearts of stunning anime beauties in this unique puzzle card game. Use a virtual mobile app to discover their interests and deepen your connections. Your choices shape your relationships. Are you ready to win their affection?

Title: Fleshport
description: In this horror-adventure game, you play as a child lost in a dystopian parallel dimension where human flesh is a commodity and outsiders are on the menu. You must flee from, hide from, and misdirect various threats as you search for a portal that will bring you back home.

Title: Speedway Racing
description: In Speedway Racing, you will enjoy the fastest, most spectacular races at over 350 Km/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 20 rivals.

Title: Demon Scrolls
description: Stop the Primagen before he can find the Demon Scrolls to usher in an Age of Darkness in this Single Player RPG

Title: Tank Mayhem
description: Tank Mayhem is an intense local multiplayer tank shooter with many unique power-ups and game modes. With a 3D environment and real-time lighting, this game aims to add a modern twist to classic 2D tank shooters. Have fun blasting your friends and trying out all of the exciting weapons :)

Title: Tasty Planet Forever
description: Bigger. Better. Tastier.

Title: The Villa: Allison's Diary
description: A villa, a daily routine and an apparently happy family. Here is where everything began. Relive through flashbacks, immersive cinematic effects and terrifying jump scares, the night Allison killed her parents in 1956.

Title: Magical Diary: Wolf Hall
description: Design your own wizard to attend a magical school. Learn spells, explore dungeons, make friends, and find a date for the May Day Ball. But be careful, everyone has secrets - including you!

Title: RiffTrax: The Game
description: RiffTrax: The Game is a multiplayer party game where players compete to make bad movies funny. Do you have what it takes to be the next movie riffing genius? Grab your friends and make fun of some of the worst cinematic abominations ever created.

Title: Bunny Hill
description: Carve the slopes of the Bunny Hill on your skis in this fast paced physics racing game. With up to 8 player Online Multiplayer, dodge bushes and tag flags on randomly generated maps to reach infinite scaling speed with your friends.

Title: Milling machine simulator
description: Milling machine simulator will inspire novices and experts alike. Realistic physics and movements allow you to familiarize yourself with the machine in a 3D workshop setting. Enjoy playing around, learning and prototyping in Free milling mode. Or challenge yourself in Career mode.

description: Super Dashmatch is a one-screen Multiplayer Party Game, in which players control fighting orbs on a shape-shifting arena. Players have to dash their opponents out of the game to win. Super Dashmatch is a local and online multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players.

Title: Beat Hazard 2
description: Experience your music collection as never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter. Each of your songs will have its own unique ebb and flow based on the music.

Title: Corgi Warlock
description: Corgi Warlock is a 1-4 player side-scrolling fantasy action game, where one brave Corgi will take on the Skeleton Bunny King's army! Against the power of Narwhals, Fencing Bears, and Crazed Unicorns, it takes more than your average Corgi to survive the King's onslaught... it takes a CORGI WARLOCK.

Title: Wytchwood
description: Wytchwood is a crafting adventure game set in a land of gothic fables and fairytales. As the old witch of the woods, explore a strange countryside, collect magic ingredients, brew sorcerous spells, and pass judgement upon a capricious cast of characters.

Title: The Jackbox Party Starter
description: Get the party started with The Jackbox Party Starter! Featuring three updated titles: Quiplash 3, Trivia Murder Party 2 and Tee K.O., this starter pack is sure to entertain!

Title: FireTry
description: FireTry is a 2D overhead co-op tank game. Steer your tank with your keyboard, gamepad or your own codes. Design levels, defeat your enemies and push the limits. Play now for an immersive tank experience!

Title: Marle: The Labyrinth of the Black Sea
description: The discovery of ruins near the Island of Isola has caught the attention of many adventurers, including Archmage Marle. However, what she finds there is unlike anything she has seen before. A labyrinth which seals away the strength of any who may enter it...

Title: Rogues Like Us
description: Rogues Like Us is a hack n' slash rogue-lite unlike any other! Stand against a resurging threat by yourself or with a friend in local co-op. Collect weapons, armor, enchantments, and more by exploring dangerous locales and defeating powerful bosses! Stop the constructs, save the town.

Title: Dark Matter
description: Dark Matter is a 2.5D side-scrolling survival horror game, set in a derelict spaceship besieged by a sinister alien presence, and infested with deadly parasites. As the Ensign, you must explore fetid hallways and abandoned facilities, scavenging for parts and blueprints, expanding your arsenal to up to four deadly weapons and freely...

Title: Alice and The Ancients
description: Advance forward, surpassing all the Ancients on the battlefield!

Title: The Rumble Fish +
description: "+" means new possibilities... The arcade version of The Rumble Fish + has returned with new features!

Title: Contagion
description: Contagion isn't your average Zombie Shooter but instead takes a more realistic and different approach to the popular genre with unique characters, environments, weapons, items, and a built in system that makes every round completely unpredictable with resources, objectives, and paths ever changing.

Title: RULES OF GRAVITY
description: Move the hands and arms of an astronaut and push, pull and turn through a physically simulated space, where without gravity nothing is immobile, nothing is safe and nothing is easy.

Title: Crashlands
description: Fight and tame alien beasts, craft resources into menacing weaponry, befriend the outlandish locals, and go toe-to-chin with a world-domineering maniac.

Title: Serious Sam Classics: Revolution
description: Serious Sam is a high-adrenaline arcade-action shooter heavily focused on frantic action. In a world where cyberpunk meets fantasy-fiction and advanced technology is mixed with black magic and psycho-powers, Sam travels through four beautiful worlds, confronting countless foes on his way to Mental's base.

Title: Deadstone
description: Based on the inhospitable frontier world of Mars, against the backdrop of a bacterial outbreak, Deadstone offers a compelling blend of frantic combat and tower defense, backed by a highly nuanced character development system and strategic elements of resource management.

Title: Shoot Shoot Mega Pack
description: Shoot Shoot Mega Pack is a minimalist party game/2D shooter for up to four players. You can choose a preset game, create your own rulesets, or let the game do it for you. However you decided to play, just make sure you do it with friends!

description: After the shipwreck in Africa, Bud and Terence save a village from criminals and make their way home on a raft loaded with bananas. But of course it wouldn't be a Bud and Terence adventure if everything went according to plan.

Title: Flipon
description: Join Kat and her crew in an epic quest in Flipon, a juicy, fun and fast-paced arcade puzzle game!

Title: Slayer Of Sin
description: Slayer Of Sin is a 2D action platformer with simple hack-and-slash mechanics, incorporating arcade-like combat and art. Slayer Of Sin follows an unnamed hero's quest to save the human realm from the seven distinct demons, The Seven Deadly Sins.

Title: Apparition
description: First-person survival horror with ghosts and demons. Find yourself smack in the middle of a haunted forest in the dead of night. Talk to spirits through your Spirit Board. Capture evidence of the paranormal, but beware, fiercely aggressive demons are on the hunt.

Title: BattleBlock TheaterÂ®
description: Welcome to BattleBlock Theater! Youâve got no where to go but up...on stage. Play single player or co-op to free your friends and save Hatty Hattington! Jump, solve and battle your way through a mysterious theater inhabited by highly technological felines.

Title: Shaolin vs Wutang
description: Shaolin vs Wutang is a INDIE love letter to Martial Arts and classic Kung Fu films. Made for casual game fans not intended for Hardcore Fighting Game players.

Title: Highlaundry
description: Highlaundry is an intense cooperative laundry game for up to four players. Join your friends to wash and dry as many clothes as you can before time runs out. Each level, a new element plays against you!

Title: Staring Contest
description: Till your eyes pop out... literally! Will you become the ultimate champion of Staring Contest? Alberto can't wait! ðð¨ð§ðð¿ð¥ð¦ð

Title: Commandos: Behind Enemy Lines
description: Commandos: Behind Enemy Lines is a real-time tactics game set in World War II that puts you in command of a small squad of elite troopers. Send them behind enemy lines on a series of hazardous missions, and bring them back alive. Clever strategy has never been so furiously action-packed.

Title: Alder's Blood: Definitive Edition
description: Alder's Blood is a tactical strategy game with stealth-based combat, RPG elements, crafting, resources gathering, and management, exploration, and a rich storyline. Set in a grim world, where mankind killed their God and is facing extinction.

Title: Mashed
description: Compete over 13 challenging and diverse environments using whatever means necessary to batter and bruise your opponents into submission, and claim victory for yourself!

Title: Apocalich
description: Apocalich is an RPG where you race against time to defeat the Lich King, alone or couch co-op with friends!

Title: Commandos: Beyond the Call of Duty
description: You have been selected for active service in the Commandos Corps, and must now mobilize in a series of 8 new dangerous missions. You may come with experience of action 'Behind Enemy Lines' or perhaps you are just a rookie - whatever you are, you will be given the opportunity to push your daring and tactical ability to the limit.

Title: Platfuzzles
description: Platfuzzles is a game with short levels where you need to figure out how to reach your powers and use them to get to the goal. It's a platformer with puzzle elements. Jump, dash, pound, shoot, turn invisible and slow down objects to achieve victory!

Title: Sine Mora EX
description: Sine Mora EX is a side-scrolling shoot'em up that provides a unique challenge, where time is the ultimate factor. Mixing classic shooter sensibilities with contemporary presentation, Sine Mora EX is a gorgeous shoot'em up offering both a Story Mode that weaves an over-the-top tale and an Arcade Mode that provides deep, satisfying...

Title: 1001 Jigsaw. Home Sweet Home 3
description: Soft cozy atmosphere of a nice home.

Title: Crashy Laps
description: Crashy Laps is an arcade racing game, with all the track visible on the screen, designed for playing in Single Player and Local Multiplayer modes. Based on classic games, there are isometric and top-down selectable camera views.

Title: Dungeon Crawler Daniel
description: Daniel and a group of adventurers must complete the Ravana Dungeon to win the ultimate prize so he can buy his house back from his parents.

description: Commandos 2: Men of Courage is a tactical action/strategy game set against the backdrop of World War II. Take control of an elite group of commandos who must venture deep into enemy territory and utilize their combined expertise to complete a series of mission-based objectives.

Title: Dashpong
description: Dashpong is a high energy arcade local multiplayer game where you dash all around the maps at full speed. Create paddles to defend your goal and shoot the ball at your opponent to score. Enjoy the game up to 4 players in local multiplayer.

Title: Red Wings: American Aces
description: Red Wings: American Aces is a thrilling warplane arcade shooter with online and local multiplayer modes. Whiz and swish through vibrant comic book-style skies solo or with friends and win the day!

Title: Chicken Invaders 3
description: Chickens. For centuries we have oppressed them, grilling, roasting, stewing, and stuffing them in buns. The time has come for us to pay. Intergalactic chickens are invading Earth, seeking revenge for the oppression of their earthly brethren!

Title: Yozora Rhapsody
description: Sorata Hoshikawa just got a promotion at his work. Perfect opportunity to spend an unforgettable vacation on a tropical island with his pretty wife Kotoko and his cute daughter Hotaru!

Title: Trench Run
description: Trench Run is a mayhem-filled, laugh a minute casual 4-player action game brought to you by the makers of King Arthurâs Gold and Soldat.

Title: ChaosMetaverse
description: The game offers more than 10 local games, hundreds of webgames, a full-fledged mmo shooter with tens of thousands of characters built in, game coins earned through the shooter to buy almost everything, and racing, a large mmo, similar to palworld mechanics are being made
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Racing, Sports, Strategy

Title: Iffy Institute
description: Iffy Institute is a fast-paced maze action game for 2-4 players, in which the five most high-profile lab animals fight for survival in a mad scientists lab. Build explosion chains with powerful directional bombs and roast your enemies with super-mighty special skills.

Title: Commandos 3: Destination Berlin
description: Commandos 3: Destination Berlin is a game of real-time tactics that places you in command of an elite unit of Special Forces behind enemy lines in the European theater of World War II. From the shores of France to the heart of the Third Reich, strike fast from land or sea infiltrating hostile territories and conducting raids to disrupt...

Title: Paradise Checkers VR
description: "Paradise Checkres" is a board game put in VR enviroment, The game consist of two dificulty levels - "min" to beginners and "max" for more advanced players. You can also choose colour of your pawns as black or white Your pawns are at the bottom of the board.

Title: Terrible Laboratory
description: The pretty and talented scientist, Konica Yaegaki, must earn money to save her lab from competing companies and peers who seek to destroy her reputation. However, she won't go down that easily. Follow Konica in this slice-of-life RPG as she tries to save her laboratory!

Title: DEAD END
description: Trapped in a hallucinatory, liminal-space style underground passageway, explore and unravel the endless "dead-end" paths to find a way forward. "Dead Path is a short ambient horror puzzle game that references Exit 8, but with a completely different core mechanic.

Title: Balance 100
description: Now you need to control your hands to set those slightly skewed objects straight.It may drive you crazy once in a while.But don't worry.You'll probably be able to do it.

Title: Warships 3D
description: Warships 3D is customizable battleship-like game done in 3D environment with animations and cutscenes. Players can define their own rules like map size, which ships are available and at which events what weapons will be granted to player(s).

Title: Spookermarket
description: A survival horror that takes place in a supermarket. Collect all the items on your shopping list and make it out alive.

Title: How to Take Off Your Mask Remastered
description: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Take Off Your Mask" returns as a remastered version. One day, Lilia wakes up as a girl with cat ears and a tail! How could this happen, and how will her love story with her childhood friend, Ronan, unfold?

Title: Woah Dave!
description: From the folks behind the BIT.TRIP series comes the frantic insanity that is WOAH DAVE! Help our hero, Dave Lonuts, survive an insane alien invasion and line his pockets with shiny pennies. Hurl alien eggs, skull bombs, and explosive WOAH blocks to stay alive and sky rocket yourself to high score fame and fortune.

Title: Monster Garden
description: Befriend strange monsters as you explore the surreal magic of the monster garden and discover its secrets!

Title: The Jackbox Party Pack 5
description: Itâs the biggest Party Pack yet, including the return of the classic pop culture trivia mash-up YOU DONâT KNOW JACK: Full Stream; the game of hilarious hypotheticals Split the Room; the lyric-writing, robot rap battle Mad Verse City; the inventive drawing game Patently Stupid; and the outer space fling-fest Zeeple Dome.

Title: Star Valor
description: Choose your own destiny as you explore an open-world procedurally generated galaxy where anything is possible. Become a miner, a trader, a bounty hunter, a pirate, or perhaps a jack of all trades. Start off small and build your way to the top but remember with every action, comes consequences.

Title: Spinshot Party
description: Join the excitement of a real-life table football game! This game is easy to learn, but challenging to master, making it perfect for players of all skill levels. It's a family-friendly game that's sure to liven up any party.

Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: The Legend of Santa

Title: GROOD
description: GROOD is an indie 2.5D Shoot 'em up made with spare robot parts and Heavy Metalð¤ð». The gameplay blends classic Shoot 'em up mechanics with modern low poly graphics, particles, shaders, and a hardcore soundtrack. Annihilate an army of machines, and afterward, annihilate their bossesâgo all the way to confirm that your battle paid off.

Title: XiJiang Shipyard
description: Create freely in the virtual world.

Title: LEGOÂ® Marvelâ¢ Super Heroes
description: LEGOÂ® Marvelâ¢ Super Heroes features an original story crossing the entire Marvel Universe. Players take control of Iron Man, Spider-Man, the Hulk, Captain America, Wolverine and many more Marvel characters as they unite to stop Loki and a host of other Marvel villains from assembling a super-weapon capable of destroying the world.

Title: Heave Ho
description: Heave Ho tasks up to four players with a simple goal â donât fall to your death! Players will use their own two hands and the outstretched grip of their friends to grapple across each level on their way to victory.

Title: Trivia Party
description: A mix of trivia and a classic board game. What else can you ask from a game to enjoy with your friends and family? Trivia Party is a local multiplayer game that mixes a ludo game and a trivia competition. Obtain better results in the trivia, and get a better dice for the ludo. Check it out!

Title: Armada 2526
description: Guide one of 12 races on their first interstellar journey from a single planet, until it becomes a mighty pan-galactic empire.

Title: Barry of Wrath
description: A fantasy adventure that will take the players on a journey they wanted nothing to do with!

Title: Octo Gravity
description: Jump and run in an octagon full of obstacles and overcome your own records!

Title: Spartoi Meadow

description: Woodle Tree Adventures is an old school platform game with a catchy and unique art style! Explore a total of 6 worlds and save the lands with the magical water drops you'll find through your journey, bringing back peace and balance and finally becoming the new hero!

description: Run around the maze collecting coins while being chased by spooky monsters. Outsmart the enemies in 4-player co-op games, or play the versus mode as a monster to prevent the other team from stealing all the gold from the castle.

Title: PAC-MAN 256
description: PAC-MAN 256 is the maze that never ends. But the Glitch is coming for youâ¦

Title: Bomb Dolls
description: an endless gay road trip through an apocalyptic wasteland! 3-player co-op! eat burgers, pop pills, slam soda, inhale donuts! collect lost souls and trade them for cute outfits! kiss your girlfriends to share life energy! fend off enemies, navigate minefields, outrun the storm, try not to explode!

Title: Bullet Casters
description: Embark on an epic Bullet Hell adventure in a fantasy world filled with bizarre monsters and eccentric magicians!

Title: Slave's Sword
description: Slave's Sword is the story of Luna, a former aristocratic knight of the Empire. Now living peacefully as a mercenary, she quickly becomes involved in a scandal that results in her enslavement. Can Luna recapture her freedom and escape from her predicament?

Title: The Witness
description: You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

Title: Finding Light

Title: Voidigo
description: A vividly animated action roguelite focused on boss hunting. Unleash an array of diverse weapons and powerups to combat the corruption of the Void.

Title: Slide - Animal Race
description: Play up to 8 friends (or enemies) together in this couch multiplayer racing game with cute sliding animals. Dive and jump to avoid obstacles, use bonuses and master the sliding mechanics on the crazy tracks to outrun the horde!

description: A short "classic" JRPG. Play the role of the Dark Lord's sister, slay the Hero King, and take the first step in conquering humankind.

description: PAKO - Car Chase Simulator is a tough as nails arcade driving game where you try to survive as long as possible without crashing your car in a police chase situation. Controls are simple, there is constant acceleration and choice to boost or brake a bit. One hit and you are dead.

description: Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Rise of the Owlverlord is a blistering platformer with morphing worlds, featuring seven brand new levels, a new boss and new gripping tracks from Chris HÃ¼lsbeck and Machinae Supremacy! Dash through tricky levels and transform the whole world at will in this fast-paced platformer.

Title: Night Janitor

description: R-COIL is a multi-directional shooter with a unique single button control scheme. Use the stick to aim and a single button to fire and thrust. Tap to fire. Hold to thrust. Yeah, it's hard.

Title: Eternal Samurai

Title: BAYANI - Fighting Game
description: BAYANI is a 1-on-1, indie fighting game that is heavily inspired by the Philippinesâ rich history, culture, and mythology. The game features a combination of 2D fighting and full 3D graphics and simplified 6 button controls with fast-paced gameplay.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

Title: Shell Shuffle
description: A unique puzzle game that's easy to learn and hard to master. It's pure game design at its finest.

Title: Dungeon Defenders

Title: Seventh Star

Title: Achievement Collector: Space
description: Achievement Collector: Space in this 2d action / shooter you play as a spaceship that kills spaceman that escaped. shoot the spaceman with LASERS! to protect your ship

Title: Maximum Action

Title: Tiny Lands

genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Color Escape: VR Coop
description: An asymmetric VR game where you will have to cooperate in order to solve puzzles.

Title: Graveball

Title: Black Future '88
description: Black Future â88 is a Synth-Punk roguelike 2D action Shooter. Vertically climb an always evolving procedural tower to reach the top and kill its insane ownerâ¦before your heart explodes. Shoot, slash, dash and upgrade yourself to survive the endless waves of Homicidal AI, Traps & Colossal Wardens.

Title: Broforce
description: Broforce is an action-packed side-scrolling run ânâ gun ode to freedom, putting you in control of an under-funded, overpowered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force.

Title: Spooky Heroes
description: Play as a knight who tries to unveil the mystery behind the spooky events occurring lately : Undead rising at night, hordes of goblins, orcs, tritons, elves, yetis and heretics suddenly becoming hostile, monstrous creatures blocking the path of travelers... Enroll new heroes on the way, each with their own powers and way to play.

Title: 7 Girls War

Title: Ninja Party
description: Ninja Party is a 2-4 player local multiplayer game! Play as one of four ninjas in disguise and blend in with the townsfolk. Identify your friends and take them out... or enlist the help of an aggressive yet adorable dog to do the dirty work for you.

Title: Enter the Gungeon

description: Sunny wants to bring the magic of Maretime Bay Day festival back to Equestria â but some pony is out to spoil her plans! Save the celebration by putting on fashion shows, rescuing cute animals, flying with Pegasi and more, with a helping hoof from your new MY LITTLE PONY friends.

Title: SPITLINGS
description: Frantic Gameplay, Juicy Visuals, Hypnotic Beats: SPITLINGS is a cute but unforgiving Hardcore Arcade Game for 1 - 4 players in which you waggle through a gauntlet of bouncy bubbles.

Title: Paperman: Adventure Delivered

Title: Tachyon Project
description: Tachyon Project is a dual stick shooter heavily inspired by classic shoot'em ups. Weâve combined many unique enemy types, a large variety of weapons and power-ups with innovative gameplay to ensure a long lasting challenge and discovery at every new level.

Title: The Scarlet Demonslayer
description: Agnis, the Scarlet Demonslayer, is the strongest of the demon eradication warriors battling against the calamities that plague the world. But after losing her powers, the nation is defenseless against the otherworldly attacks! To recover her lost magic, she must depend on her assistants to help her!

Title: Morps
description: Morps game is 2D pixel art strategy with simple principies of fight and defense. Use your king to control MorpÂ´s world. The future of little creatures and end tyranny of king Gark is in your hands.

Title: ButcherBoy
description: Butcher Boy is a simplistic casual arcade game that is easy to learn, but hard to master.

Title: Fight of Animals: Arena
description: Meme animals strike again!! Let the meme battle goes into NEXT LEVEL!! With varied stages, items and support up to 4 players local and online, âFight of Animals: Arenaâ will bring you a brand new Brawler experience!! Let the fight begin!!

Title: ZONERS
description: An unusual cast of queer & quirky aliens battle it out in the galaxy's favourite sport using their signature skills & traits. Featuring an incredible soundtrack, unique stage gimmicks, custom match settings, bonus games, tons of unlocks & insanely detailed pixel art, it's time to get into the zone!

Title: Bloodhounds

Title: Jerking Off In Class Simulator
description: We all knew that one pervert that would jerk off in the back of the classroom. You ARE that pervert!

Title: Mahluk:Dark Demon

Title: LOVE 3

Title: Radiis

Title: Verdungo

Unlike other football management games, you can easily complete a season in less than 60 minutes if you wish. This makes this game ideal for a quick round or two when you only have a few spare minutes.

The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider: unprecedented realism, in your hands.

Title: Krautscape
description: Krautscape is an action-packed racing game with bird-like flying cars and procedurally built racetracks.

Title: Miss Lisette's Assassin Maid
description: After being classified as a demon by the church, Lisette Blanchard is abducted by a mysterious group. Now her maid, Forty, a former assassin, is on a mission to rescue her master, and restore honor to the Blanchard family.

description: My Ex-Boyfriend the Space Tyrant is a traditional point-and-click adventure which stands out for its gay cast and eye-catching visuals.

Title: Wildermyth
description: Wildermyth follows heroes over their whole careers, from their pitchfork days to their powerful primes, and on into old age and memory. Itâs a party-based procedural storytelling RPG where tactical combat and story decisions will alter your world and reshape your cast of characters.

Title: Pro Strategy Football 2024
description: PSF 2024 - even more customizations! Sports Ticker! Waiver Draft! More stats! Improved AI! Improved Editor! Career can have 1 to 16 conferences and up to 140 teams! Fatigue and Injury sliders! More rules and overtime options!

Title: Bloodwych
description: A dark fantasy role play adventure that pits your strategic thinking against an insane ruler and his mystical forces.

Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Succubus

Title: Fort Triumph

Title: Welcome to the Adventurer Inn!

Title: Serious Sam: Kamikaze Attack!
description: Step into the boots of Serious Sam's most iconic foe, the Headless Kamikaze, and chase down the vile Serious Sam in this action packed arcade runner

Title: Goat's Tale 2

Title: Police Stories
